loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy house building materials like iron corrugated sheets, etc. for the construction of a dwelling house for his family

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy dozens of shoes to add to her current stock

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy building materials like iron corrugated sheets, sand, nails, cements, etc. for the construction of a dwelling house for his family

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy baskets of dried fish to add to her current stock

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay for one year of tuition fees and living expenses at Maharishi Ezemvelo Rural University (MERU).

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy cooking ingredients like rice, palm oil, tomatoes, onions, margi, etc. in bulk.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy rice, gari, cooking oil, ground nuts, etc. in bulk to add to her current inventory

loans.name: Jugderragchaa

texts.en: Mr. Jugderragchaa, 49 years old, lives with his wife in Darkhan, second largest city of Mongolia. He has been working as a car driver at university of technology since 2004. His wife is a physician and works at a hospital. Their children all are married and live separately. He and his wife live in an old apartment, which hasn't been renovated since they moved there. So he is requesting a loan of 4000000 MNT to buy building materials such as bricks, cements and fiberglass to renovate. As a result, he and his wife will live in comfortable and warm place where less coal is burned and less pollutants are released into air.

loans.use: to renovate his apartment rooms

loans.name: Carlos

texts.en:
Carlos is a Kubo financiero’s client and this is his story:

Carlos is 30 years old, and is single and lives in his parents’ house. He makes a living by selling shoes in a market nearby his house, and during his spare time he enjoys watching all types of movies and exercising.

In his stand he offers all kind of shoes for all the family. It is located beside a movie stand and an ice cream stand; which makes a transited stand in the market. 

He asks for this loan to improve his stand, give it a better look and attract more clients. 

With the effort Carlos puts into his work, he aspire to buy his own house in the near future so he can leave his parents’ house.

loans.use: to improve the stand where he sells shoes to give it a better look

loans.name: Ceferina

texts.en:
Ceferina is 57 years old and married with nine children. With one child still in school, Ceferina works very hard to provide for them.

Ceferina runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 19000 loan through NWTF to buy additional items like canned goods, cooking oil, snack foods, noodles, biscuits, detergent soap, etc. to sell.

Ceferina has been in this business for 10 years and sells a variety of items. 

Ceferina would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy additional items like canned goods, cooking oil, snack foods, noodles, biscuits, detergent soap, etc. to sell

loans.name: Ma. Elena

texts.en:
Ma. Elena is 42 years old and married with five children. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. 

Ma. Elena has a general store business in the Philippines. Ma. Elena requested a PHP 17000 loan amount through NWTF to purchase more stock to sell in her general store.

Ma. Elena has been in this business for 4 years. Ma. Elena would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase more stock to sell in her general store

loans.name: Genevieve

texts.en:
Genevieve is 21 years old and married with one child.

She earns a living by raising livestock in the Philippines. Genevieve is borrowing PHP 12000 through NWTF to buy additional livestock, feed and other supplies for her business.

Genevieve has been raising livestock for 2 years and also earns additional income from native hat weaving.

She is working tirelessly towards the attainment of her dream: to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy additional livestock, feed and other supplies for her business

loans.name: Julia

texts.en:
As a married parent of three children, Julia works hard to support her family.

She raises livestock in the Philippines and earns additional income from a general store.  Julia is borrowing PHP 12000 through NWTF to buy vitamins, feed and other supplies for her livestock business.

Julia has been sustaining her business activities through her past 5 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy vitamins, feed and other supplies for her livestock

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy a sewing machine, embroidery machine, and fabric.

loans.name: Khalzankhuu

texts.en: Mr. Khalzankhuu, 63 years old, lives with his wife and son in Ulaanbaatar, capital city of Mongolia. They live in a Mongolian traditional ger (portable felt dwelling) on a plot of land. He and his wife have retired from work and get a state pension. Their son renders transportation services to local people using his own microvan. During winter, the ger they live in becomes frozen so they burn lots of coal in order to stay warm. For this reason, he is requesting a loan of 3000 USD to install an electric heater into his ger and insulate its walls with fiberglass. He is confident these measures can be beneficial for both his family and environment. As the ger's heat preserving capacity increases, they will burn less coal for heating and it means less pollutants in the air.

loans.use: to install an electric heater and insulation

loans.name: Otgontsetseg

texts.en: Mrs.Otgontsetseg, 29 years old, lives with her husband and two children in Ulaanbaatar, capital city of Mongolia. She has been working as beautician at a beauty salon since 2013. Her husband works at the train station. They moved into old apartment one year ago. The apartment's windows are vulnerable to winds and rains. So she is requesting a loan of 3000000 MNT to buy and install vacuum insulated windows in her apartment. As a result, during winter, her family will live in comfortable and warm place.

loans.use: to buy and install vacuum insulated windows

loans.name: Tsetsegbayar

texts.en: Mrs. Tsetsegbayar,39 years old, lives with her husband and three children in Ulaanbaatar, capital city of Mongolia. She has been running a cafeteria since 2005 and she herself works as cashier at her cafeteria. Her husband is a mining engineer and currently staying at home due to the economic recession. Their three children go to high school. She is requesting a loan of 3000 USD to repair the cafeteria's roof and buy new tables and chairs. As a result, people will be attracted to her cafeteria and her income will be increased. The borrower is very hardworking individual who strives for a better future.

loans.use: to repair the roof and buy tables and chairs

loans.name: Miguela

texts.en:
Miguela is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a glass retailing business in the Philippines. 

She is borrowing PHP 30000 through NWTF to purchase additional materials/glass for her business.

Miguela has been in this business for 4 years. Miguela earns additional income from general store.

Miguela has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts with the help of the loans from NWTF. She dreams to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional materials/glass for her business

loans.name: Leocadia

texts.en:
Leocadia is 55 years old and married with seven children, two of whom are currently in school, Leocadia works very hard to provide for them.

Leocadia runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 16000 loan through NWTF to purchase more groceries like rice, cereals, milk, coffee, detergent soap, shampoo, sugar, etc. to sell. Leocadia has been in this business for 8 years. 

Leocadia would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to purchase more groceries like rice, cereals, milk, coffee, detergent soap, shampoo, sugar, etc. to sell

loans.name: Angelina

texts.en:
Angelina is 56 years old, married, and has eight children, one of whom is still in school.

Angelina is in the agricultural business, raising livestock in the Philippines. Angelina requested a PHP 10000 loan through NWTF to purchase feed, vitamins, etc. for her livestock.

Angelina has been raising livestock for 28 years now and has borrowed 4 times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

Angelina would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase feed, vitamins, etc. for her livestock

loans.name: Nena

texts.en:
Nena works hard to support her family. Nena is married and has a livestock business in the Philippines.

Nena requested a PHP 15000 loan through NWTF to buy vitamins, feed and other supplies for her business.

Nena has been in this business for 20 years now.

Nena would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy vitamins, feed and other supplies for her business

loans.name: Rosena

texts.en:
Rosena is 49 years old and married with two children. 

Rosena is in the agricultural business, raising livestock in the Philippines. Rosena requested a PHP 10000 loan through NWTF to purchase additional livestock and other supplies for her business.

Rosena has been raising livestock for 8 years now and has borrowed 5 times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

Rosena would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional livestock and other supplies for her business

loans.name: Melodina

texts.en:
Melodina is 29 years old and married with five children.

She earns a living by having a pig fattening business in the Philippines. Melodina is borrowing PHP 10000 through NWTF to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs.

Melodina has been in pig fattening for 4 years and also earns additional income from buying and selling ready to wear.

She is working tirelessly towards the attainment of her dream: to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to school.

loans.use: to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs

loans.name: Vilma

texts.en:
Vilma is 40 years old and married with has three children, all of whom are in school.

Vilma is in the agricultural business, pig fattening, in the Philippines. Vilma requested a PHP 16000 loan through NWTF to purchase an additional piglet, feed and vitamins for her business.

Vilma has been in pig fattening for 5 years now and has borrowed 5 times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

In the future, Vilma would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase an additional piglet, feed and vitamins for her business

loans.name: Merlita

texts.en:
Merlita is 45 years old and and married with three children, all of whom are in school.

Merlita is in the agricultural business raising pigs in the Philippines. Merlita requested a PHP 20000 loan through NWTF in order to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs.

Merlita has been raising pigs for 18 years now and has borrowed 19 times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

In the future, Merlita would like to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs.

loans.name: Agripina

texts.en:
Agripina is a married woman with five children. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. Agripina is 49 years old and has two children who are currently in school.

Agripina has a charcoal and firewood vending business in the Philippines. Agripina requested a PHP 20000 loan amount through NWTF to buy additional stocks of firewood to sell.

Agripina has been in this business for 6 years. In the future, Agripina would like to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy additional stocks of firewood to sell

loans.name: Erdenesaikhan

texts.en:
Mr. Erdenesaikhan, 48 years old, lives with his wife and four children in Erdenet, the third largest city in Mongolia. They reside in a traditional Mongolian traditional ger (a portable felt dwelling) on a plot of land. He has been driving a bus for a travel agency since 2008. His wife is unemployed, and stays at home looking after their youngest child. Their eldest daughter works for a state bank as a teller. Also one of his sons studies at college, and this year has advanced to second year. 

He is requesting a loan of 3,000,000 MNT to buy building materials such as planks, cement, and bricks for building a barn next to his ger. The barn will serve as an extension, as well as protection against blowing wind. 

In addition, his family will burn less coal as the ger becomes less vulnerable to heat loss. Burning coal is considered a main source of air pollution, so a decrease in coal usage is beneficial to both the family and the environment.

loans.use: to build a barn next to his home

loans.name: Jorgelina

texts.es:
La Sra. Jorgelina es madre soltera, tiene un hijo que ya está casado y vive en su casa propia. La Sra. Jorgelina tiene una despensa hace varios años con clientela formada, se dedica también a la venta de sábanas a vendedores ambulantes de la zona. Dichas sábanas ella manda confeccionar a modistas de la zona para lo cual compra telas en grandes cantidades y con variados diseños y colores.
La Sra. Jorgelina pide este préstamo para la compra de insumos varios para poder surtir su despensa con verduras, frutas, carnes y demás productos, y de esa forma poder seguir con sus ventas, luchando por mejorar.
texts.en:
Jorgelina is a single mother with a son who is already married and who lives in his own home.  Jorgelina has had a general store for several years with established clientele, and she also sells sheets to street vendors in the area. She buys cloth in bulk of various designs and colors and commissions local seamstresses to make these sheets.

Jorgelina requests this loan to purchase more goods to stock her store with vegetables, fruits, meat products and other products, and thus be able to continue with her sales, fighting to improve.

loans.use: to buy vegetables, fruit, meat and other products for sale.

loans.name: Charles

texts.en:
Charles is applying for a second loan to support his studies through his graduation in December 2014 at Maharishi Ezemvelo Rural University (MERU). He has provided the following update on his progress since receiving the first loan:

“I have been progressing very well. My academic results were a big achievement and so far I am happy to state that “I will be graduating”. Kiva has supported me financially and it is good. I have managed to pass my subjects and I am happy about the progress that I have made.”

loans.use: to pay for one year of tuition fees and living expenses at Maharishi Ezemvelo Rural University (MERU).

loans.name: Angelie

texts.en:
Angelie is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a vegetable selling business in the Philippines. 

She is borrowing 17,000 PHP (Philippine Pesos) through NWTF (Negros Women for Tomorrow Foundation, Inc.) to buy more vegetables to sell in her vegetable stall for her business.

Angelie has been in this business for five years. She earns more income from pig fattening and working at the general store.

Angelie has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts with the help of the loans from NWTF. She dreams of saving money to expand her business in the future.

loans.use: to buy more vegetables to sell in her vegetable stall.

loans.name: Hilda Mercedes

texts.es:
Hilda tiene 46 años de edad, estudió hasta 3er grado, es soltera y vive con 3 de sus hijos, pues una de las muchachas ya se le acompañó. El mayor le ayuda económicamente y con los trabajos que realiza en el campo.

Hilda es una mujer trabajadora y que siempre busca la manera de salir adelante, actualmente se dedica a realizar oficios domésticos, trabajo que lleva 15 años haciendo y en el cual le ha ido muy bien. Inició cuando su esposo la abandonó y entonces decidió que tenía que buscar la forma de mantener a sus hijos y fue cuando inició con dichos trabajos.

El préstamo solicitado es para trabajar l tierra y sembrar maíz, comprará los insumos como fertilizantes, insecticidas, fungicidas, etc.

Ella sueña con ver que sus hijos se superen y lleguen a ser personas de bien y que puedan gozar de una buena calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Hilda is 46 years old, and went to school until third grade. She's single and lives with three of her children, as one of her daughters is already in a relationship. The oldest helps Hilda economically, and with the work they do in the field.

Hilda is a hardworking woman who's always looking for ways to move forward. Right now, she earns a living doing domestic work. She's been doing this work for 15 years, and she's done very well by it. 

She started when her husband abandoned her, so she decided she would have to find a way of supporting her children. This was when she started doing this work.

The loan she's asked for is to work the land and plant corn. She will buy inputs like fertilizers, insecticides, fungicides, etc. She dreams of seeing her children achieve and become good people who can earn a good quality of life.

loans.use: to work her land and plant corn, and to buy inputs like fertilizers, insecticides and fungicides.

loans.name: Arlene

texts.en:
Arlene is a married woman with six children. She is a very hard-working entrepreneur. Arlene is 44 years old and has three children who are currently in school.

Arlene has a business selling coconut lumber in the Philippines. Arlene requested a 13,000 PHP (Philippine Pesos) loan amount through NWTF (Negros Women for Tomorrow Foundation, Inc.) to purchase additional stocks of coconut lumber to sell.

Arlene has been in this business for 15 years. In the future, Arlene would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase additional stocks of coconut lumber to sell.

loans.name: Arsenia

texts.en:
Arsenia is a married woman with six children. She is a very hard-working entrepreneur. Arsenia is 50 years old and has three children who are still in school.

Arsenia has a business directly selling personal products in the Philippines. Arsenia requested a 10,000 PHP (Philippine Pesos) loan amount through NWTF (Negros Women for Tomorrow Foundation, Inc.) to purchase more personal products to sell to her customers.

Arsenia has been in this business for five years. In the future, Arsenia would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase more personal products to sell to her customers.

loans.name: Delma

texts.en:
Delma works hard to support her family. She is married and has a business selling ready to wear clothing in the Philippines.

Delma requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to buy more stocks of ready to wear like t-shirts, blouses, etc. to sell.

She has been in this business for 10 years now.

Delma would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy more stock of ready-to-wear like t-shirts and blouses to sell

loans.name: Estela

texts.en:
Estela is 34 years old and has three children. She is married and has three children who are in school.

Estela is in the agricultural business of fattening pigs in the Philippines. She requested a 10,000 PHP (Philippine Pesos) loan through NWTF (Negros Women for Tomorrow Foundation, Inc.) to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs.

Estela has been in the pig fattening business for four years now, and has borrowed once in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

In the future, she would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs.

loans.name: Daniesa

texts.en: Daniesa is 42 years old and has eight children. She is married and has three children who are currently in school. Daniesa is in the agricultural business of pig fattening in the Philippines. Daniesa requested a PHP 22,000 loan through NWTF to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs. She has been in pig fattening for five years now, and has borrowed eight times in the past from NWTF to sustain it. Daniesa would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs.

loans.name: Flora

texts.en: Flora works hard to support her family. She is married and has a manicure/pedicure service business in the Philippines. Flora requested a PHP 16,000 loan through NWTF to purchase additional materials like nail polish, nail cutters, nippers, etc. for her business.  She has been in this business for 25 years now. Flora would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional materials like nail polish, nail cutters, nippers, etc. for her business.

loans.name: Meyling Suyapa

texts.es:
Tras haber culminado un curso técnico magisterio, Meyling  una joven con visión de futuro y muchas ganas de triunfar profesionalmente, razón principal por la que ahora está a punto de finalizar su  quinto año de la carrera de Biología Química. Tiene 24 años de edad, está soltera y tiene muchos ánimos de transmitir el conocimiento adquirido en clases. Su familia ha sido su principal fuente de apoyo, su padre le envía remesas para brindar soporte en la economía familiar, debido a esto se siente motivada en salir adelante y cumplir sus metas.
Ella solicita el crédito para cubrir los gastos de titulación y graduación de su carrera profesional. Meyling deposita su confianza en el financiamiento puesto que gracias a este logrará cumplir uno de sus sueños, ser reconocida como licenciada en Biología Química. Anhela tener más oportunidades de empleo en los que pueda poner a prueba todos sus conocimientos y habilidades.  Su meta principal es obtener su titulo y enorgullecer a su familia.
texts.en:
After having completed a technical course in teaching, Meyling is a young woman with a vision for the future and a strong desire to succeed professionally. That is the main reason she is now about to complete her fifth year of a degree in Chemical Biology. She is 24 years old, she is single, and is excited to apply the knowledge she has acquired in her classes. Her family has been her main source of support. Her father sends her allowances to show support financially, and because of this she feels motivated to get ahead and reach her goals.

She is requesting the loan to cover the costs of degree courses and graduation into her professional career. Meyling puts her confidence in this financing because thanks to the loan she will achieve of one her dreams, to be recognized as licensed in Chemical Biology. She wants to have more opportunities for employment where she can put her knowledge and abilities to the test. Her main goal is to receive her degree and make her family proud.

loans.use: to cover the costs of degree courses and graduation into her professional career.

loans.name: Francisca

texts.en: Francisca works hard to support her family. She is married and has a used clothing sales business in the Philippines. Francisca requested a PHP 29,000 loan through NWTF to buy additional bundles of used clothing to sell. She has been in this business for nine years now.  In the future, Francisca would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy additional bundles of used clothing to sell.

loans.name: Eduard

texts.ru:
Эдуард использовал предыдущую сумму финансовой помощи от КИВА для того, чтобы сделать ремонт в офисе. С момента вложения дополнительных финансовых средств в бизнес у Эдуарда увеличился доход. 
Эдуарду в этот раз нужна сумма в 50 000 гривен для того, чтобы закупить материал , а именно золото на сумму в 22 500 гривен,  а также технику для работы: вибростол и муфельную печь. Необходимые инструменты достать трудно, но Эдуард нашел через знакомых, где можно их купить, нужны лишь дополнительные средства. За счет новой техники он сможет делать более сложные ремонты ювелирных изделий.
texts.en:
Eduard used his previous financial support from Kiva in order to make renovations in his office. After making an additional investment in his business, Eduard has increased his revenue.

This time Eduard needs 50,00 UAH in order to buy supplies, specifically gold for 22,500 UAH, as well as work equipment: a vibrating table and a muffle furnace. It is hard to obtain the necessary equipment but through to his friends Eduard has been able to find a supplier. He just needs additional funds. Thanks to the new equipment he will be able to perform more complex jewelry repairs.

loans.use: to purchase supplies and equipment for his work.

loans.name: Gertrudes

texts.en: As a married parent of three children, Gertrudes works hard to support her family. She has a food vending business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from a general store. Gertrudes is borrowing PHP 10,000 through NWTF to buy ingredients for her food vending business. She has been sustaining her business activities through her past one loan from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for her food production business.

loans.name: Janet

texts.en:
As a widowed parent of four children, Janet works hard to support her family.

She has an abaca weaving business in the Philippines  and also earns additional income from buying and selling root crops. Janet is borrowing PHP 10000 through NWTF to buy additional raw materials for her abaca weaving business.

Janet has been sustaining her business activities through her past 13 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to school.

loans.use: to buy additional raw materials for her business

loans.name: Sugey Victoria

texts.es:
El esposo de Sugey de 24 años, regresó de trabajar en Costa Rica hace tres años, con la intención de apoyar a su mujer en sus sueños de convertirse administradora y comerciante de su propio negocio de elaboración de calzado. Con el ahorro obtenido en el país vecino, pudieron comprar una máquina, la cual le dio inicio a toda una evolución en la vida de esta joven pareja con un hijo de 4 años, el cual recibe una educación formal, gracias a este negocio. A pesar trabajar constantemente, nunca dejó la educación y se convirtió en toda una profesional. Ahora su desempeño es excelente, por lo que poco a poco las ventas fueron creciendo hasta llegar a comercializar su producto en Managua, Boaco y Jinotepe.
Sugey no es una simple mujer de negocios, es toda una emprendedora, quien también trabaja como profesora de un preescolar. Sus metas principales son seguir expandiendo su negocio, llegar a más departamentos de país y ofrecer mayor variedad de calzado. Por esta razón es que necesita de un préstamo para comprar cuero, cordones, pega, hilo, entre otros materiales para ofrecer un producto de excelente calidad.
texts.en: The husband of Sugey, who is 24 years old, returned from working in Costa Rica three years ago, with the intention of supporting his wife in her dreams of becoming a manager and seller of her own business in making shoes.  With the savings earned in the neighboring country, they were able to buy a machine which revolutionized the life of this young couple with a 4 year old son.  Their son receives a formal education thanks to this business.  Despite working constantly, she never stopped learning and turned herself into a professional.  Now that her work is excellent, her sales have been slowly growing to expand in markets such as Managua, Boaco, and Jinotepe.  Sugey is not just a businesswoman, but is quite an entrepreneur.  She also works as a preschool teacher.  Her main goals are to continue expanding her business, to expand to more areas of the country and to offer larger variety of shoes.  For this reason she needs a loan to purchase leather, lace, glue, thread and other materials in order to offer a high quality product.

loans.use: to buy leather, lace, glue, thread, and other materials.

loans.name: Maria

texts.en: Maria, is aged 43, married to a farmer and blessed with two children. Maria has owned and managed a food stall at the back of school campus for almost three years. Her net income from this business is PHP 300 for five days. Due to insufficient capital funds from her business, she would like to avail a loan amounting to PHP 7,000 to purchase food ingredients and seasonings to use for cooking. Her cooked food immediately sells in her food stall. She's hoping that her requested loan will be granted so that she can improve her business to earn more income.

loans.use: To purchase food ingredients and seasonings to use for cooking.

loans.name: Gracelyn

texts.en: Gracelyn is a married woman with two children. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. Gracelyn is 27 years old and has one child who is currently in school.  She has a charcoal vending business in the Philippines. Gracelyn requested a PHP 28,000 loan amount through NWTF to purchase more sacks of charcoal to sell to her customers.  She has been in this business for eight years. Gracelyn would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase more sacks of charcoal to sell to her customers.

loans.name: Jojielyn

texts.en:
Jojielyn works hard to support her family. Jojielyn is married and has a native basket weaving business in the Philippines.

Jojielyn requested a PHP 17000 loan through NWTF to buy more raw materials for her business.

Jojielyn has been in this business for 5 years now.

Jojielyn would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy more raw materials for her native basket business

loans.name: Joyce

texts.en:
Joyce is 39 years old and married with three children, one of which is currently in school.

Joyce is in the agricultural business, pig fattening in the Philippines. Joyce requested a PHP 26000 loan through NWTF to purchase feed and vitamins for her pigs.

Joyce has been in pig fattening for 6 years now and has borrowed 13 times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

She successfully repaid her previous loan and is now requesting a new loan to further build her business.

In the future Joyce would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase feed and vitamins for her pigs

loans.name: Juditha

texts.en:
Juditha is 51 years old and married with eight children.

She earns a living by farming vegetables in the Philippines. Juditha is borrowing PHP 10000 through NWTF to buy fertilizer and other farm supplies.

Juditha has been farming vegetables for 2 years and also earns additional income from pig fattening.

She is working tirelessly towards the attainment of her dream: to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and other farm supplies

loans.name: Juditha

texts.en: Juditha is 48 years old and married with six children. She earns a living by farming bananas in the Philippines. Juditha is borrowing PHP 11,500 through NWTF to purchase fertilizers and other farm supplies. She has been farming bananas for 20 years and also earns additional income from root crops vending. She is working tirelessly toward the attainment of her dream, to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizers and other farm supplies.

loans.name: Reynaldo Missael

texts.es:
El valor, la buena conducta y la perseverancia han permito a Reynaldo a salir adelante, estudia su quinto año en Biología Química en modo sabatino  y desde hace cuatro meses inició a laborar como docente en educación secundaria. Tiene 23 años, está casado y tiene tres hijos. Es un joven disciplinado, trabajador y excelente padre, su principal soporte ha sido su familia, quienes velan por el triunfo de él, razón por la que quiere luchar para enorgullecerlos. 
Reynaldo solicita el crédito para cubrir los gastos de titulación y de graduación. Confía plenamente en el financiamiento puesto que gracias a este logrará obtener su titulo como Licenciado en Biología Química y así logrará cumplir una de sus más preciadas metas. Anhela seguir prosperando y encontrar excelentes ofertas de trabajo en las que pueda desarrollar todo su conocimiento. Sus hijos son su fuente de inspiración y por ellos quiere trabajar arduamente para ofrecerle un hogar estable y seguro.
texts.en: Courage, perseverance and good conduct have allowed Reynaldo to move forward.  He is studying in his fifth year in Chemical Biology (on Saturdays) and four months ago started to work as a teacher in a secondary school.  He is 23 years old, married, and has three children.  Reynaldo is a disciplined young man, hard working, and an excellent father.  His main support has been his family, who are so supportive of his triumphs and they are the reason he wants to work hard to make them proud.  Reynaldo is requesting a loan to cover the costs of his certification and graduation.  He has full faith in this financing as thanks to this, he will be able to obtain his degree in Chemical Biology and accomplish one of his biggest goals.  He hopes to continue to prosper and find great offers for work in which he can develop his specialty.  His children are his source of inspiration and he wants to work hard for them so that he can offer them a stable and secure home.

loans.use: to cover the costs of certification and graduation.

loans.name: Andrea Carolina

texts.es:
Andrea es una persona muy sacrificada y luchadora que se esta esforzando por poder salir adelante, comenta que su préstamo anterior lo uso para poder surtirse con productos varios para la venta, lo cual le fue de mucha ayuda. Es una que lucha día a día para poder crecer.
Pide este nuevo préstamo para poder comprar comestibles varios, frutas, lácteos y demás, ya que de esa forma podrá seguir trabajando como lo viene haciendo.
texts.en: Andrea is a woman who works very hard and sacrifices a lot so that she can continue striving to move forward.  She says that her previous loan was used to stock various products for sale, which was of great help to her.  She is a woman that fights day by day to be able to grow.  She is requesting this loan in order to be able to buy various groceries, fruits, dairy products and more, so that she can continue working as she is doing now.

loans.use: to purchase several groceries, fruits, dairy products and more.

loans.name: José Cristino

texts.es:
José tiene 39 años de edad, es una persona muy dedicada a sus labores como muy buen agricultor, está casado y su esposa se dedica  a los oficios domésticos, además le gusta la crianza de pollos, tiene 3 hijos que estudian en la escuela de la comunidad.


José es agricultor, su padre le enseñó a cultivar la tierra, es por eso que hoy tiene muchos conocimientos sobre la actividad, además, él ha estado presente en capacitaciones sobre como manejar la tierra de menor forma. 


El préstamo lo necesita para comprar fertilizantes para los cultivos de maíz, esto le permitirá tener buenos cultivos con muy buen desarrollo y por ende una buena producción y buena alimentación para su familia. 


Sus planes hacia a futuro son tener  parcelas de maíz más grandes para adquirir buenos ingresos a la hora de comercializarlo.
texts.en:
José, 39, is very dedicated to his work as a farmer. He is married and his wife takes care of the home, as well as raising chickens. They have three children who are in the local school.José learned about agriculture from his dad, who taught him to work the land. This is why he knows so much about the activity. He also has attended trainings about the best way to manage his land.

He needs this loan to buy fertilizers for his corn crop, which will allow him to get better development of his crop and better production in the end, and food for his family. His plans for the future are to have bigger pieces of land to grow corn on so that he can get more income from the sales.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers for his corn crop.

loans.name: Trancito Franklyn

texts.es:
Trancito de 31 años de edad, estudio hasta segundo grado en el centro escolar de la comunidad donde reside, por motivos familiares tuvo que abandonar sus estudios, pero siempre siguió sus objetivos de salir adelante para apoyar a su familia. Se caso hace doce años, ha procreado tres hijos de once, seis y cuatro años de edad, dos de los niños estudian segundo y primer grado en la escuela.
Su esposa se dedica a la venta de antojitos (enchiladas, pastelitos, atol, frescos, y otros) vende todas las tardes en la orilla de la calle principal de la comunidad donde reside, para apoyar a su familia y junto con su esposo trabajar para darles a sus hijos una mejor calidad de vida.

Trancito trabaja en su lugar de origen desde que tenia doce años de edad, su padre le enseño a trabajar en la agricultura (siembra de maíz y frijoles), hace tres años se decidió a trabajar de albañil por si solo gracias a que un amigo le enseño el oficio.
Trancito solicita un crédito en la institución para pagar le estructuración de un terreno,  lo cual le permitirá de esta forma tener su propio terreno donde vivir en mejor ya en un lugar propio.

Trancito planifica hacer un muro de contención en el terreno que esta legalizando, ya que esta propenso a deslave debido a la escorrentía de agua debido a las lluvias en el invierno. Además, tiene en meta darle el estudio a sus hijos, pues él no tuvo la oportunidad de estudiar, y a la vez ayudar a su esposa con el negocio de la venta de antojitos.
texts.en:
Trancito, 31, completed second grade in the local school.  Due to family reasons he had to leave school, but he continuously strives to get ahead so that he can support his family.  He was married 12 years ago, and he has fathered 3 children aged 11, 6, and 4.  Two of his children are in 2nd and 1st grade in school.

Trancito's wife has a business selling snacks (enchiladas, pastelitos (stuffed, fried tortillas), atol (a traditional beverage), drinks and other items).  She sells every afternoon on the side of the main street in the community where they live so that she can support her family. Together with her husband, they work to give their children a better quality of life.

Trancito works in the place where he was born.  He has worked ever since he was 12  years old; his father taught him how to farm (how to cultivate corn and beans).  Three years ago, he decided to start working as a bricklayer on his own, thanks to a friend who taught him this trade.

Trancito is requesting a loan from the institution to pay to restructure some land.  This will enable him to have his own land where he could live better, because he would have his own place.

Trancito plans to build a retaining wall on land that he owns, because it is prone to landslides due to water runoff during the winter rains.  In addition, he wants to provide his children with an education since he did not have the opportunity to attend school, and he wants to help his wife with her snack business.

loans.use: to restructure some land

loans.name: Mercedita

texts.en: Mercedita is a hardworking entrepreneur who has an abaca weaving business in the Philippines.  She is borrowing PHP 12,000 through NWTF to buy additional raw materials like abaca fiber, etc. for her weaving business. Mercedita has been in this business for 23 years. She also earns more income from a general store. Mercedita has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts with the help of the loans from NWTF. She dreams to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy additional raw materials for her business like abaca fiber, etc.

loans.name: María Magdalena

texts.es:
María de 43 años de edad, madre soltera de dos hijos quienes estudian en el centro escolar de donde vive, ella creció junto a su padre pues su madre murió joven, durante su infancia trabajo muy duro a la par de su hermana para apoyar a su familia. Su hermana mayor murió debido a causas naturales y fue ella quien ahora esta a cargo de su sobrino que dejo su hermana. María estudio hasta sexto grado en. Ahora de ella depende su padre, sus dos hijos y su sobrino.

María  se dedica a la venta de productos de primera necesidad, desde los quince años, su madre les enseño a trabajar para salir adelante. Antes trabajo en la venta de productos de primera necesidad ambulante, ahora en día tiene su propio negocio en la casa de habitación. Le ayuda a vender sus hijos cuando ellos regresan de la escuela.

María solicita un crédito en credicampo, para la compra de mas mercadería (aceite, maíz, frijoles, azúcar, huevos, verduras y otros productos de primera necesidad) además invertirá $300 en un cerco que tiene que hacer en un terreno que les han otorgado en la alcaldía del municipio a las familias sin propiedad.

María sueña con construir su vivienda de adobe, lo que le permitirá tener una mejor condición y calidad de vida, además quiere apoyar a sus dos hijos y a su sobrino para que salgan adelante en los estudios. Las ganancias las invierte en ir surtiendo poco a poco su tienda, también esta ahorrando para construir su casa de adobe.
texts.en:
María, 43, is a single mother of two kids who are in the local school. She grew up with just her father, as her mother died young, and she studied until 6th grade. As a child, she and her sister worked very hard to support their family. Her older sister died from natural causes, and Maria took charge of the care of her nephew. Now Maria has many people depending on her - her father, her two children and her nephew.

Maria has a store selling basic necessities. Starting at age 15, her mother taught her how to work to get ahead. She used to be in door-to-door sales, but now she has her own business out of her home. Her kids help her in the store when they get out of school.

Maria asks for a loan from Credicampo to buy more merchandise (oil, corn, beans, sugar, eggs, vegetables and other necessities). In addition, she will invest $300 in building a fence around a piece of land that the mayor has given to families without property. Maria dreams of building her own adobe home, which will allow her to have a better quality of life. She also wants to support her kids and nephew to finish their schooling. Her earnings are invested in stocking her store little by little, and she is also saving to build her home.

loans.use: to buy oil, corn, beans, sugar, eggs, vegetables and other basic groceries; as well as to invest $300 in building a fence around the property that the mayor has given to landless families.

loans.name: Flamboyan Ii Group

texts.en:
Flamboyan II has completed the first cycle of the Kiva loan program. All went smoothly and well. They have repaid the loan properly. Their efforts are increasingly better. These loans are very useful for the welfare of their families. However, there is sad news from this group, Ms. Nurul, the leader of this group, died some time ago, specifically in February. This group has deep sadness because they lost a good leader. Currently, the group is led by a young mother named Yunita, who replaced Ms. Nurul. The loans in this cycle will be used by members to add to the types of food and buy equipment to replace equipment that has been damaged.

Yunita, the new leader of this group, is very unusual with her youthful spirit. She is very excited to support the members to add any type of business. She has a snacks business selling arem-arem and Klepon. She also opened hawker stalls at a school near her house. The benefits of this loan from Kiva are very meaningful to Yunita's life because she still has two children whose education costs a lot. Yunita hopes that this loan can help her to add to the types of food she sells and increase the stall. Yunita also hopes this loan can improve the welfare of each member of the group and her family.

loans.use: to buy more snacks to sell

loans.name: Benjamín

texts.es:
Benjamín de 36 años de edad, estudio hasta cuarto grado en el centro escolar de su comunidad, se acompaño hace once años con su esposa quien es la que esta a cargo de la tienda que tiene en la casa de habitación. Sus dos hijos estudian en la escuela del municipio, él los va ha dejar todos los días de lunes a viernes por las mañanas y su esposa los va ha traer, ya que esta a un kilometro y medio de donde viven.

Benjamín tiene una tienda en la comunidad, y él sale cinco días a la semana a la venta  de frutas y verduras en las zonas aledañas de donde reside, tiene cinco años de experiencia de tener el negocio y le es rentable, sale en el carro por las mañanas a vender la mercadería, ya es conocido por los pobladores donde llega a vender sus productos, su esposa le apoya con el negocio en la casa de habitación.

Benjamín solicita un crédito en credicampo, para la compra de una vaca,  la cual la comprara a un amigo de su comunidad. Así pretende ir trabajando en otro rubro del cual ya tiene experiencia.

Benjamín sueña con incrementar su negocio en la casa de habitación, ya que le es rentable y también es una de las pocas que hay en la zona donde reside y hay un buen numero de familias, lo que le permitirá poder tener mayores ingresos económicos para la familia. Espera de las ganancias comprar otro vehículo para salir a vender las verduras y las frutas y productos de primera necesidad para las familias.
texts.en:
Benjamin is 36 years old, and he acquired a 4th grade education in the local school.  He has been married for 11 years.  His wife is in charge of a store that they have in their home.  Their 2 children study in the municipal school.  He drops them there every weekday in the mornings, and his wife picks them up, because the school is a kilometer and a half from where they live.

Benjamin has a store in the community, and he goes out 5 days a week to sell fruits and vegetables in the areas surrounding his neighborhood.  He has 5 years of experience with this business, and it is profitable.  He goes out in a car in the mornings to sell his merchandise, and he is well-known by the residents of the areas where he goes to sell his products.  His wife helps him with the business that is located in their house.

Benjamin is requesting a loan from CREDICAMPO to buy a cow.  He will buy this cow from a friend in the community.  This way, he plans to continue working in this other line of work in which he already has experience.

Benjamin dreams of expanding the business in his house, because it is profitable and also because it is one of the few stores in the neighborhood where he lives, which has a good number of families.  This would enable him to have more income for his family.  He hopes that with his earnings, he can buy another vehicle to use with his business selling fruits and vegetables and staple consumer goods.

loans.use: to buy a cow

loans.name: Mema

texts.en: Mema is 38 years old and from Ozamiz City. She wishes to avail the various products and services of the Cooperative.  She has two children who are in school. Now, she is applying for a loan to finance the repair of their motorcycle and for the renewal of the annual registration. Her plan after this loan is to change her motorcycle unit into a new and additional one, in order for long lasting operation, and to lead them to a higher quality of life, and for their children's future.

loans.use: to pay for motorcycle repair and registration renewal.

loans.name: Renita

texts.en:
As a married parent of two children, Renita works hard to support her family.

She has an abaca weaving business in the Philippines and earns additional income from her general store. Renita is borrowing PHP 19,000 through NWTF to purchase more materials for her weaving business.

Renita has been sustaining her business activities through her past four loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream of building and expanding her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to purchase more materials for her weaving business

loans.name: Rosalinda

texts.en: Rosalinda is 54 years old and married with eight children. She earns a living by farming vegetables and root crops in the Philippines. She is borrowing PHP 10,000 through NWTF to buy seeds, seedlings, fertilizers and other supplies for her business. Rosalinda has been farming vegetables and root crops for two years and also earns additional income from pig fattening. She is working tirelessly toward the attainment of her dream, to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy seeds, seedlings, fertilizers and other supplies for her business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more spices to sell and tule to make crafts.

loans.name: Rosevilla

texts.en: Rosevilla is a hardworking entrepreneur who has an abaca weaving business in the Philippines. She is borrowing PHP 10,000 through NWTF to purchase more materials for her abaca weaving business. Rosevilla has been in this business for eight years. She also earns more income from farming vegetables. Rosevilla has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts with the help of the loans from NWTF. She dreams to save money to expand her business in the future.

loans.use: to purchase more materials for her abaca weaving business.

loans.name: Satesa

texts.en:
Satesa is 54 years old and married.

She earns a living by farming vegetables in the Philippines. Satesa is borrowing PHP 10,000 through NWTF to purchase seeds, fertilizers and other supplies for her farming vegetables business.

Satesa has been farming vegetables for two years and earns additional income from pig fattening.

She is working tirelessly towards the attainment of her dream of building and expanding her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to purchase seeds, fertilizers and other supplies for her farming vegetables business

loans.name: Teresita

texts.en:
Teresita is a married woman with seven children. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. Teresita is 44 years old and has two children who are currently in school.

Teresita has an abaca weaving business in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 15,000 loan through NWTF to buy more raw materials like abaca fiber for her business.

Teresita has been in this business for 17 years. In the future, she would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy more raw materials like abaca fiber for her business

loans.name: Amparo

texts.en:
Amparo is 63 years old and married with 10 children. Amparo works very hard to provide for them.

Amparo runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 25,000 loan through NWTF to buy additional items like canned goods, spices, biscuits, cooking oil, coffee, sugar and other groceries to sell.

Amparo has been in this business for 21 years and sells a variety of items such as canned goods, spices, biscuits, cooking oil, coffee, sugar and other groceries. 

She successfully paid back her previous loan and is now requesting a new loan to further build her business.

In the future, Amparo would like to repair and renovate her family home.

loans.use: to buy additional items like canned goods, spices, biscuits, cooking oil, coffee, sugar and other groceries to sell

loans.name: Abelino

texts.es:
Abelino de 61 años de edad, no tuvo la oportunidad de estudiar debido a que sus padres no le dieron la oportunidad, creció a lado de su madre mayormente ya que su padre murió por consecuencias de la guerra que había en esa época en el país, cuando él tenia catorce años, se creció con sus tres hermanos de los cuales él era el mayor. Su esposa se dedica a los oficios domésticos, se casó hace más de treinta años, padre de seis hijos tres varones y tres hembras, cinco de los cuales ya tienen vidas apartes pues ya se acompañaron, en su casa solo vive su esposa y dos hijos, la menor estudia cuarto grado en la escuela de la comunidad.
Abelino trabaja en la agricultura (siembra de maíz, frijoles y maicillo) desde que quedo a cargo con sus hermanos. Cuando él se casó su esposa le enseño hacer hamacas de mezcal y desde entonces se dedica a ambos trabajos. Sus hijos le ayudan en los diferentes trabajos de la agricultura.
Cuando regresa de los trabajos agrícolas,  Abelino comienza las labores de artesanías de hamacas de casacarilla, donde le ayuda su esposa, hamacas que luego van a comercializar a las comunidades aledañas.
Abelino necesita el crédito para la compra de seis sacos de abono para los cultivos de maíz y frijoles, también comprara 100 libras de hilo de seda para la elaboración de hamacas de seda y de poliseda, hamacas que luego las venden para obtener ingresos económicos para tener mejores condiciones y calidad de vida. También pagara el alquiler de la tierra donde tiene los cultivos agrícolas.
Parte de las cosechas las vende en el mercado que hay en el pueblo donde vive.
Abelino sueña con mejorar su vivienda, piensa repellarla con cemento y arena por fuera y por dentro, además espera en el futuro ponerle ladrillo a su vivienda. También espera seguir ayudando a su hija para que siga estudiando y llegar a verla convertida en una profesional en el futuro, manifiesta que a la niña le gusta mucho el estudio.
texts.en:
Abelino, 61, didn't go to school because his parents didn't give him the opportunity. He grew up mostly at his mother's side, because his father died when he was 14 as a result of the war during that era. He was the oldest of his three siblings. His wife works in the home. They have been married more than 30 years and have six children, three boys and three girls, 5 of whom are now grown. In his house now it is just him, his wife and two children, the youngest of whom is in 4th grade.

Abelino works in agriculture, planing corn, beans and sorghum. He has been in this trade since he became the caretaker for his siblings. When he got married his wife taught him to make hammocks from mezcal, and since then he has done both jobs. His children help him with different aspects of the farm work. When he comes home from the farm, Abelino starts to make the artisan hammocks from husks, with help from his wife, which he will later sell in nearby communities.

Abelino needs the loan to buy 6 sacks of compost that he will use for his corn and bean crops, as well as 100 pounds of silk thread to make hammocks of silk and silk blend. He will later sell these to make money that will improve his living conditions and quality of life. He will also pay the rent on the land where he grows his crops. Part of his harvests are sold in the town market.

Abelino dreams of improving his home. He would like to plaster t with sand and cement both inside and out. He also hopes to be able to add brick some day. He hopes to continue helping his daughter so that she can stay in school and become a professional one day, since she really enjoys her studies.

loans.use: to buy 6 sacks of compost for the bean and corn crops, as well as 100 pounds of silk thread to make silk and polysilk hammocks which will be sold for extra income; also to rent farmland.

loans.name: Bebelina

texts.en:
Bebelina works hard to support her family. She is married and has a general store business in the Philippines.

Bebelina requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to purchase more groceries to sell in her general store.

She has been in this business for five years now.

In the future, Bebelina would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more groceries to sell in her general store

loans.name: Editha

texts.en:
As a married parent of five children, Editha works hard to support her family.

She has a business selling tobacco in the Philippines and earns additional income from her general store. Editha is borrowing PHP 20,000 through NWTF to buy more stocks of tobacco to sell to her customers. 

Editha has been sustaining her business activities through her past 15 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream of saving enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy more tobacco to sell to her customers

loans.name: Felisa

texts.en:
Felisa is 56 years old and married with seven children. 

She is in the agricultural business of pig fattening in the Philippines. Felisa requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to buy additional piglets, feeds, and vaccines for her business.

Felisa has been in the pig fattening business for three years now, and has borrowed four times in the past from NWTF to sustain her business.

In the future, Felisa would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy additional piglets, feeds, and vaccines for her business

loans.name: Josephine

texts.en:
Josephine is 44 years old and has four children. She is married and has one child who is currently in school.

Josephine is in the agricultural business raising pigs in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to purchase feed and vitamins for her pigs.

Josephine has been raising pigs for four years now and has borrowed seven times in the past from NWTF to sustain her business.

She would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to purchase feed and vitamins for her pigs

loans.name: Corina

texts.es: Corina tiene 43 años de edad y habita en casa propia junto a su compañero de vida y sus hijos. Corina se dedica  a la venta de pollos desde hace mucho tiempo y es así como colabora con la economía del hogar. Corina desea construir un baño con ducha por lo que solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de loa materiales necesarios como: cemento, arena, ladrillo, hierro, grava, etc. Espera contar con dicho financiamiento y así dar a su familia mejores condiciones.
texts.en:
Corina is 43 years old and resides in her own home along with her life companion and their children. She has been selling chickens for a long time, which has enabled her to contribute to the household finances.

Corina wants to build a bathroom with a shower, so she is requesting this loan from FUSAI. She will invest in the purchase of needed materials such as cement, sand, bricks, iron, gravel, and other items. Corina hopes to receive this loan so that she can provide better conditions for her family.

loans.use: to buy construction materials in order to build a bathroom with a shower.

loans.name: Dul

texts.en:
Dul, 59 years old, lives in a rural area of Prey Svay Chek District, Banteay Meanchey Province, Cambodia. Dul has been working as a farmer in a small rice field near his house for nearly 30 years. In total, Dul can make USD 3 per day from his farming operation.

Dul is borrowing a loan from HKL to build a hygienic latrine for the sake of his family members. Through this loan, Dul hopes that it will help him to promote healthy living conditions. Dul thanks lenders for the financial support via HKL, which provides him with a much lower interest rate than its general loan product.

loans.use: to build a hygienic latrine

loans.name: Maricel

texts.en:
Maricel is 33 years old and has two children. She is married and has two children who are in school.

Maricel is in the agricultural business fattening pigs in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 13,000 loan through NWTF to buy additional piglets, vaccines, vitamins and feed for her business.

Maricel has been in the pig fattening business for four years now and has borrowed five times in the past from NWTF to sustain the business.

In the future, she would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy additional piglets, vaccines, vitamins and feed for her business

loans.name: Rocio Esperanza

texts.es:
San Miguel de los Bancos el Cantón del amor se encuentra ubicado al noroccidente de la provincia de Pichincha, este Cantón es un atractivo turístico muy visitado debido a su gran cantidad de flora y fauna silvestre es el lugar perfecto para venir a descansar, el clima es cálido húmedo lleno de gente amable y trabajadora en este Cantón vive la señora Roció una mujer luchadora de 45 años ella mantiene una sólida relación de casada de la cual tienen 4 hijos, el esposo trabaja como maestro albañil.
Solicita el crédito para emprender en una pequeña granja de cerdos aprendió de este negocio en su niñez ya que fue criada en una finca y ahí se aprende todo sobre el cuidado de animales como ganado vacuno y porcino, con esta inversión mejoraran sus ingresos económicos y el nivel de vida de su familia mejorará, la señora Roció agradece a Fundación Alternativa y a Kiva por el apoyo y las oportunidades brindadas.
texts.en:
San Miguel de Los Bancos is a lovely canton that is located in the northwestern section of Pinchincha Province. This canton is a tourist attraction that is often visited because of the wide variety of native plants and animals, thus making it the perfect place to come and relax. The weather is warm and humid. This area is full of friendly and hardworking people. Sra. Rocio, age 45, lives in this canton. She is a determined woman who has maintained a solid marriage. Roció has four children and her husband is a master bricklayer.

She is requesting a loan so that she can start a small pig farm. Roció learned this business during her childhood since she grew up on a farm. Roció came to know everything about caring for animals, such as cows and pigs. This investment will improve her earnings and her family’s standard of living. Sra. Roció is grateful to Fundación Alternativa and Kiva for their support and the opportunities they have provided.

loans.use: to start a small pig farm.

loans.name: Ana Patricia

texts.es: Ana patricia es una humilde señora quien ha procreado seis hijos los cuales ya son independientes, aun habitan en su casa para ella fue una dura tarea sacarlos adelante, hoy en día Ana Patricia se dedica a hacer tortillas para vender todos los días por las mañanas y tardes, negocio que le ayuda a mejorar sus condiciones de vida poco a poco, solicita el crédito para mejorar el techo de su vivienda el cual tiene hoyos y cuando llueve el agua se mete al interior del hogar, gracias al financiamiento podrá comprar los materiales como laminas de zinc y perlines para empezar la obra, lo que le permitirá más tranquilidad y confort junto a su familia.
texts.en:
Ana Patricia is a humble woman who has six children who are already independent. They still live at home, so it is a hard task for her to keep moving forward. At the moment, Ana Patricia makes tortillas that she sells every day in the morning and in the afternoon. Her business helps to gradually improve her living conditions.

She is requesting a loan in order to repair the roof of her home, which has holes that cause rain to seep inside. Thanks to his loan, she will be able to buy materials, such as zinc sheets and crossbeams, so that she can begin the work. This will enable her and her family to live peacefully and comfortably.

loans.use: to buy materials for repairing the roof of her home.

loans.name: Sanley

texts.en:
Sanley is 31 years old and married with two children. With two children currently in school, Sanley works very hard to provide for them.

Sanley runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 12,000 loan through NWTF to buy more stock like eggs, coffee, sugar, shampoo, detergent soap, noodles, etc. to sell.

Sanley has been in this business for 6 years and sells a variety of items.

Sanley would like to build and expand her business to secure future provision for her family.

loans.use: to buy more stock like eggs, coffee, sugar, shampoo, detergent soap, noodles, etc. to sell

loans.name: Angelyn

texts.en:
Angelyn works hard to support her family. She is married and runs a small pig farm in the Philippines.

Angelyn requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs.

Angelyn has been in this business for 4 years now. In the future, Angelyn would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs

loans.name: Rosa Mistica Group

texts.es:
Rosa Mistica se llama este grupo, están haciendo la encuesta de eliminación de la pobreza, a través de la cual podrán conocer la situación de pobreza de cada una de ellas. Donde una de las integrantes es la Sra. Felipa 
Entre el trabajo que ella hace cuenta que se dedica a la venta de dulces hecho a base de maní, y con lo cual busca u tiene los medios para poder ayudar a su familia. Es una persona muy trabajadora y luchadora.
La Sra. Solicita de este préstamo para la compra de más dulces de maní para vender, lo que le ayudará a tener a concretar su plan de negocio, el cual le ayudará a mejorar sus ingresos. Agradece por esta oportunidad que está recibiendo que le serpa de mucha ayuda.
texts.en:
Rosa Mistica is the name of this group which is participating in the poverty elimination program to determine each one's poverty level.  One of the members of the group is Felipa.

Part of the work she does involves selling peanut fudge to earn income to help the family.  She is a very hard working, determined person.

Felipa is requesting a loan to buy more fudge to sell which will help build her business and inmprove her income.  She is grateful for this opportunity which will be of great help to her.

loans.use: To buy peanut fudge to sell.

loans.name: Antonio

texts.es:
El Sr. Antonio está  casado con la Sra. Amada y tienen 3 hijos, por quienes ambos han luchado para poder darles todo lo que ellos no pudieron tener.
Antonio tiene en su casa una despensa bien surtida, y por su parte su esposa también es comerciante y vende ropas de varios modelos y marcas, es una pareja muy trabajadora y por sobre todo muy luchadora.
Antonio pide este préstamo para poder invertirlo en la compra de verduras, frutas, comestibles, lácteos y demás, y de esa forma poder seguir con sus ventas como lo viene haciendo. Agradece por la oportunidad que está recibiendo de poder seguir creciendo.
texts.en:
Antonio is married to Amada and they have three children who they struggle to provide for so they have everything they themselves did not have.

Antono runs a well-stocked store and his wife is also a merchant selling different brands and designs of clothing.  They are a hard-working couple and, above all, very determined.

The loan Antonio is requesting is to buy vegetables, fruit, groceries, dairy products and other items.  This is so he can continue with sales.  He is grateful for the opportunity to continue expanding.

loans.use: To buy vegetables, fruit, groceries, dairy products and other items.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy medicines and pay for medical consultations.

loans.name: Kokuere Group

texts.es:
El grupo Kokuere está en el 3er ciclo, es un grupo que están iniciando con muchas expectativas que quieren invertir para poder tener más ingresos y así poder salir de la pobreza.
Marina es una de las integrantes, quien se dedica a las ventas, comenta tiene una despensa donde vende todo tipo de productos, tiene un negocio muy surtido en el que trabaja todos los días desde muy tempranas horas del día. Es una mujer muy trabajadora y sacrificada que lucha por poder salir adelante.
Ella pide este préstamo para poder invertirlo en la compra de verduras, frutas, carne, pollo y demás, con lo cual podrá surtir su negocio, y de esa forma poder seguir con sus ventas como lo viene haciendo. Las integrantes están muy entusiasmadas de poder trabajar y crecer juntas.
texts.en:
The Kokuere Group is in its third loan cycle.  It is in its beginning stage with many hopes of investing to earn more money and get out of poverty.

One of the members is Marina who works in retail sales.  She has a store and sells all kinds of products.  It is very well-stocked and she works every day starting out very early in the morning.  Marina is a hard-working, selfless woman who struggles to get ahead.

She is requesting a loan to buy vegetables, fruits, meat, chicken and other items to stock her store.  This is so she can continue with her sales volume.  The members of the group are very enthusiastic about working and growing together.

loans.use: To buy vegetables, fruits, meat, chicken and other items.

loans.name: Rodrigo

texts.es:
Rodrigo es estudiante de Universidad, está cursando el segundo año de Administración de Empresas. Sus padres son personas muy trabajadoras y luchadoras, su objetivo es administrar la fábrica de ropas de sus padres y quiere hacerlo por medio de sus conocimientos.
Rodrigo está esforzándose al máximo para poder cumplir con su meta de ser un profesional útil a la sociedad.
Pide este préstamo para poder invertirlo en pagar su matrícula, ya que de esa forma podrá cubrir ese gasto que tiene y seguir con sus estudios.
texts.en:
Rodrigo is a university student who is in his second year of a degree program in Business Administration. His parents are hardworking and determined individuals. Rodrigo’s goal is to manage a clothing factory with his parents and draw upon their knowledge. He is striving to do his best in order to achieve his goal of becoming a useful professional to society.

Rodrigo is requesting this loan so that he can invest in the payment of his tuition. Since the loan will cover this expense, he can continue his studies.

loans.use: to pay his university tuition.

loans.name: Buenaventura

texts.es:
Buenaventura tiene 53 años de edad, es una persona muy conocida por su personalidad respetuosa con los demás, es viuda ya que su esposo murió de una enfermedad terminal, ella vive con su único hijo y con sus nietos.


Buenaventura tiene experiencia en la crianza de pollos de engorde desde hace 10  años, este trabajo lo aprendió de su madre, y es así como Buenaventura tiene negocio de pollos.


El crédito lo necesita para comprar los insumos y alimentos para los pollos de engorde, esto le permitirá obtener mejores ingresos, ya que tendrá  la granja en buenas condiciones. 


Ella sueña con tener una granja muy grande para incrementar sus ingresos y pode darle buena educación académica a sus nietos.
texts.en:
Buenaventura is 53 years old. She is well-known because of her respectful personality with other people. Buenaventura became a widow after her husband died of a terminal illness. She lives with her only son and her grandchildren.

Buenaventura has 10 years of experience in raising and fattening chickens. She learned this trade from her mother, which then led to her business. The loan she is requesting will be used to buy supplies and feed for fattening her chickens. This will enable her to earn more income and have a farm that is in good condition.

Buenaventura dreams of having a larger farm so that she can increase her earnings and provide a good education for her grandchildren.

loans.use: to buy supplies and poultry feed.

loans.name: Darwin Antonio

texts.es: Darwin, tiene 21 años de edad, vive en unión libre con su esposa con quien tiene un hijo, y reside en el municipio de Tela, Atlántida. Hace un año decidió establecer su propio negocio donde vende variedad de cosméticos como ser cremas, tintes para cabello, pelucas, carteras, desodorantes, lociones, joyas de fantasía, maquillajes ropa etc. Este negocio lo instaló en un local que alquila. Ha decidido solicitar este préstamo por 8,000 Lempiras para surtir de productos de belleza como ser tintes, maquillajes, fantasías, cremas, carteras, ropa, etc. y poder aumentar las ventas. Su plan es mantener el negocio en crecimiento para poder construir un local propio para su tiendita.
texts.en:
Darwin is 21 years old. He and his wife are in a common-law relationship and they have one child. Darwin resides in the town of Tela, Atlántida.

A year ago, he started his own business where he sells a variety of cosmetics and accessories such as crèmes, hair dyes, wigs, purses, deodorants, lotions, costume jewelry, makeup, clothing, and other items. This business is located in a rented space.

Darwin decided to request a loan of 8,000 HNL so that he can restock with beauty products such as dyes, makeup, crèmes, as well as costume jewelry, purses, clothes, and other products in order to increase his sales. His plan is to keep his business growing so that he can build a space for his small shop.

loans.use: to buy dyes, makeup, costume jewelry, crèmes, purses, clothing, and other products to sell.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay for labor costs, tractor use and inputs

loans.name: Khan

texts.en:
Khan, 69 years old, lives in a remote area of Batheay District, Kampong Cham Province, Cambodia. She is a lovely mother of two children who are already married. To make a living, she works as a farmer with her husband in a small rice field that is located near her house.  So far, it has been about 40 years that she has been involved in this farming business, which can earn a net profit of USD 5 per day.

Currently, she is lacking money to afford the farming supplies. Therefore, she is applying for a loan from Kiva to buy fertilizers, insecticides and other related materials. She would like to thank lenders for the financial support via HKL, which provides her with a much lower interest rate than its general loan product.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers, insecticides and other related materials

loans.name: Phe

texts.en:
From a remote area of Kampong Cham Province of Cambodia, Phe, 44 years old, is a hardworking farmer on a small farm. She has worked as a farmer for nearly 20 years.  The net profit that she can earn from her farming business is USD 5 per day.

Currently, she is lacking money to afford the farming supplies. Therefore, she is applying for a loan from Kiva to buy fertilizers, insecticides and other related materials. She would like to thank lenders for the financial support via HKL, which provides her with a much lower interest rate than its general loan product.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers, insecticides and other related materials

loans.name: Josephine

texts.en:
As a married parent of two children, Josephine works hard to support her family.

She has a food vending business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from general store. Josephine  is borrowing PHP 19,500 through NWTF to purchase ingredients like meat, fish, vegetables, spices, etc. for her food vending business.

She successfully paid back her previous loan and is now requesting a new loan to further build her business.

Josephine  has been sustaining her business activities through her past loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase ingredients like meat, fish, vegetables, spices, etc. for her food production business

loans.name: Restituta

texts.en:
Restituta is a married woman with six children. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. Restituta is 49 years old and has four children who are currently in school.

Restituta has a business raising cattle in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 13,000 loan through NWTF to buy additional cattle, vitamins and vaccines for her business.

Restituta has been in this business for three years. In the future, she would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy additional cattle, vitamins and vaccines for her business

loans.name: Diego

texts.es:
Diego es el hijo único hijo varón de la familia, hace 12 años que su papa falleció, y él se encarga de poder ayudar a la familia.
Tiene tres hermanas, una casada y las otras trabajando. Está estudiando la carrera de administración de empresas agropecuarias, y comenta que su meta es culminar su carrera para obtener un mejor trabajo y asi cumplir con su realizacion personal.
Pide este préstamo para poder invertirlo en pagar sus cuotas de la universidad, y de esa forma poder seguir con sus estudios como lo viene haciendo. Agradece por la oportunidad que recibe de poder cumplir con sus metas.
texts.en:
Diego is the only son in his family. His father died 12 years ago and, since then, he has been responsible for helping the family.

Diego has three sisters: one is married and the other two work. Diego is studying the management of farming businesses and says that his goal is to finish his degree in order to find a better job and attain his dreams.

Diego is applying for this loan in order to pay university fees. With this loan, he can continue with his studies.

Diego is grateful for this opportunity to try to achieve his aims.

loans.use: to pay university fees.

loans.name: Ailen

texts.en:
Ailen is a married woman with two children. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. Ailen is 34 years old and has two children who are in school.

She has a business selling purified drinking water in the Philippines. Ailen requested a PHP 18,000 loan amount through NWTF to purchase more containers of purified drinking water to sell.

Ailen has been in this business for two years. In the future, she would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to school.

loans.use: to purchase more containers of purified drinking water to sell

loans.name: Ana

texts.es:
Ana está Cursando el cuarto año de Enfermería, su objetivo es llegar a ser una buena profesional y poder ejercer su profesión, para a través de esto tener un buen ingreso para construir su propio hogar y como toda persona llegar a independizarse.
Ella está luchando para poder crecer y ser alguien en la vida. Agradece y pide este préstamo para poder invertirlo en sus cuotas de la universidad, y de esa forma poder seguir luchando por sus metas.
texts.en:
Ana is in fourth year of her nursing studies. Ana's objective is to work in her profession and to do it well. Through her work she wants to earn a good income in order to build her own home and, like everybody else, become independent.

Ana is fighting to be able to grow and be someone. Ana is grateful and applying for this loan in order to invest in her university fees and continue working to achieve her goals.

loans.use: to pay university fees.

loans.name: Alma

texts.es:
Alma es estudiante de la carrera de Ingeniería Comercial, es una persona que se está esforzando por ser alguien en la vida y ser útil a la sociedad.
Al terminar su carrera se ve trabajando en una empresa privada hasta adquirir mucha experiencia y luego montar una oficina, y de esa forma crecer, no solo como profesional, sino también como persona.
Pide este préstamo para poder pagar las cuotas de su universidad, lo que le será de mucha ayuda a la hora se seguir sus sueños.
texts.en:
Alma is studying business engineering. Alma is putting in the effort so that she may become useful in society.

On finishing her degree, Alma sees herself working in a private company until she gains experience and is able to open her own office. By doing this, she wants to to grow, not just as a professional, but as a person too.

Alma is applying for this loan in order to pay university fees. This loan will be of great help to her as her dream is to continue following her dreams.

loans.use: to pay university fees.

loans.name: Julio

texts.es:
