texts.en:
Anabelle is a 34-year-old married woman with two children who are in school. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur.  Anabelle has a general store business in the Philippines. She has been in this business for 17 years.

Anabelle requested a PHP 10,000 loan amount through NWTF to purchase more groceries to sell in her general store.

 Anabelle would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase more groceries to sell in her general store

loans.name: Beauté Des Femmes Group

texts.fr: Beauté des femmes est un groupe de trois(03) femmes battantes. Elles sont clientes à ACFIME depuis 2008 et jusque là, elles remboursent bien leur prêt.elles travaillent dans deux domaine d'activité à savoir, la restauration et l'habillement. ZALISSA est la responsable du groupe, elle est mariée et à un enfant scolarisé. son mari est commerçant aussi et avec leurs revenus, ils partagent les charges familiales. ZALISSA, en plus de sa famille donne de la joie à d'autres personnes puisqu'elle a trois(03) employés qu'elle paie chaque mois.Avec ce prêt, elle va payer des pagnes et des bazins pour vendre avec la fête de ramadan qui aura lieu à la fin de ce mois.Avec le bénéfice qu'elle aura, elle va continuer ses activités.
texts.en:
"Beauté des femmes" is a group which consists of three (03) determined and ambitious women.  They have been clients of the ACFIME since 2008 and have always duly repaid their loans.  They are involved in two activities: the preparation of dishes and selling clothes.

Zalissa is the group's representative.  She is married and the mother of one child who attends school.  Her husband also works as a retailer, and with their combined incomes, they jointly cover the family's expenses.  In addition to her own family, Zalissa also makes other people happy since she has three (03) employees whom she pays on a monthly basis.  She will use her loan to buy "pagnes" (colorful West-African fabrics) as well as damask fabrics for resale during the Ramadan festivities which will take place at the end of the month.  She will use her profits to continue her business.

loans.use: to buy "pagnes" (colorful West-African fabrics and damask fabrics to resell during the Ramadan festivities.

loans.name: Rosa Mercedes

texts.es:
Desde que inició sus estudios de primaria, Rosa  María ha sido la mejor en la clase de matemáticas, razón principal por la que decidió estudiar una carrera profesional ligada a ella, Contaduría Pública. Tiene 23 años de edad, está en unión libre y tiene un hijo. Aparte de estudiar su quinto año de la carrera en modo sabatino, trabaja los días de semana como agente de venta en una empresa nacional. Al mismo tiempo vende productos de plata, tales como aretes y cadenas. Recibe el apoyo constante de su familia, día a día la motivan a cumplir sus metas.
Rosa solicita el crédito para cubrir los gastos de graduación y la inscripción de tesis. Ella deposita su confianza en el financiamiento puesto que lograría cumplir uno de sus más grandes sueños, obtener el título de licenciada, el cual le brindará la oportunidad de conseguir excelentes propuestas de trabajo. Anhela seguir profesionalizándose, obtener una maestría de manera que pueda brindarle a su hijo mejores condiciones de vida, salud y educación de calidad.
texts.en:
Since she began primary school, Rosa María has been the best in her math classes, which is why she decided to study Public Accounting, a course related to math. She is 23 years old, is in a relationship, and has a child. She is in the fifth year of her studies, which she completes on the weekends, and she also works during the week as a sales agent for a national business. At the same time, she sells silver products, like earrings and necklaces.

She receives constant support from her family and they motivate her day to day to achieve her goals. Rosa requests this loan to pay graduation expenses and thesis registration fee. She puts her confidence in this financing because she would like to achieve one of her greatest goals, which is to earn her degree. This will provide her with the opportunity to pursue excellent jobs. 

She hopes to continue being a professional and earning her Master's degree so that she can provide her child with a better quality of life, health, and quality education.

loans.use: to pay graduation expenses and thesis registration fee.

loans.name: Jane

texts.en:
Jane is 42 years old and married with two children, one of whom is in school. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. 

Jane's house was destroyed by Super Typhoon Haiyan, which swept through the Philippines last November 8, 2013. She has restarted her fish vending business and is committed to regain what she lost. Jane is taking out a PHP 9,835 housing loan through NWTF in order to purchase building materials and pay for construction labor to build a house for her family.

Jane has been with NWTF since 2012 in her pursuit to rise out of poverty. With your help, she will be able to start once more in a new home. In the future, Jane would like to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase building materials and pay for construction labor.

loans.name: Omara Del Socorro

texts.es:
En un pequeño local en la entrada del mercado, cubierto de todo tipo de ropa de distintos colores llamativos, está ubicada desde hace tres años la comerciante de ropa Omara. Una joven casada de 34 años y madre de dos hijos de 14 y 4 años de edad, de los cuales se siente orgullosa al verlos asistir al colegio sin ningún problema, pues ella solo pudo terminar la secundaria debido a problemas económicos. 
 Desde muy pequeña Omara le ayudaba a su mamá en un establecimiento donde vendía ropa, luego se casó y tras la baja venta de frescos de su esposo, comenzaron a vender billetes de colección antiguos para poder comprar su propio lugar donde vender ropa. Poco a poco ha ido creciendo y ahora ha decidido vender recargas telefónicas para obtener un ingreso más, ya que su esposo no siempre la ayuda. Ahora necesita de un préstamo para comprar camisas, ropa interior y calcetines, para variar la mercadería. Su meta es buscar innovaciones en la ropa para ofrecer un mejor producto y más económico.
texts.en: In a small stall located at the entrance to the market, covered in all kinds of clothing in bright colors is where Omara has been selling her clothing for the past three years. She is 34 years old, married and mother to two children aged 4 and 14. She feels proud of them, watching them go to school without any problems. She only manged to finish her High schooling due to economic problems. Since she was very young Omara helped her mother in an establishment that sold clothing. Then she got married and with her husband's poor sales of soft drinks, she started to sell antique paper money to be able to buy her own place to sell clothing. Little by little her business grew and now she has decided to sell rechargeable telephone cards to make more income as her husband doesn't always help her. Now she needs a loan to buy t-shirts, underwear and socks to add variety to her merchandise. Her goal is to look for innovative clothing items to offer a better and more economical product.

loans.use: to buy t-shirts, underwear and socks.

loans.name: Annaliza

texts.en:
Annaliza is single and has a banana vending business in the Philippines.

Annaliza requested a PHP 12,000 loan through NWTF to buy more bananas to sell to her customers.

Annaliza has been in this business for 10 years now.

In the future, Annaliza would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy more bananas to sell to her customers

loans.name: Melsita

texts.en:
Melsita is a married woman with three children. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. Melsita is 43 years old and has two children who are currently in school.

Melsita has a retail business selling soft drinks and beer in the Philippines. Melsita requested a PHP 11,000 loan amount through NWTF to purchase more cases of soft drinks and beer to sell.

Melsita has been in this business for three years. In the future, Melsita would like to save enough money to afford sending her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase more cases of soft drinks and beers to sell

loans.name: Maria Efigenia

texts.es:
María Efigenia tiene 23 años de edad, de estado civil conviviente, vive junto con sus hijos en el distrito de Oyotún, una comunidad tranquila que se dedica a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería, ubicada en la Provincia de Chiclayo que pertenece a la Región Lambayeque, costa norte del Perú.

Ella se dedica a la venta de ropa y zapatos desde hace 2 años, su negocio se encuentra ubicado en su domicilio, ha solicitado un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 1 500 nuevos soles para la compra de mayor cantidad de ropa para abastecer su negocio y de esta manera generar mayores ingresos para su familia.
texts.en:
María Efigenia is 23 years old and is in a common-law relationship. She lives with her children in the Oyotún district, located in Chiclayo Province which belongs to Lambayeque Region on the North Coast of Peru. The people of this quiet community work in agriculture, commerce and raise livestock.

María has been selling clothing and shoes for two years. Her business is located in her house. She has requested a loan from Edpyme Alternativa of 1500 PEN to buy a greater quantity of clothing to stock her business, in this way generating more income for her family.

loans.use: to buy fall and winter clothing.

loans.name: Lolita

texts.en:
Lolita is 57 years old and married with three children.

Lolita is in the agricultural business, farming rice in the Philippines. Lolita requested a PHP 24,000 loan through NWTF in order to buy fertilizer and other farm supplies.

Lolita has been farming rice for six years. She has borrowed eleven times in the past from NWTF and more recently through Kiva to sustain her business.

She is working tirelessly toward the attainment of her dream: to save money to expand her business and continue to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and other farm supplies.

loans.name: Angelina

texts.es:
Angelina tiene 60 años de edad, no estudió debido a que no habían escuelas cerca, está casada y su esposo trabaja en la agricultura y en el transporte de pasajeros con un pick-up que él posee,  han procreado 6 hijos de los cuales dos estudian en la escuela, 2 trabajan la agricultura junto con su padre, y dos viven en Estados Unidos.



Actualmente, Angelina se dedica al cuido de cerdos, ella tiene 25 años de realizar este trabajo y lo aprendió por sus padres desde muy pequeña.


Ella necesita el crédito para comprar  6 cerdos pequeños y 15 quintales de harinilla para darles buena alimentación durante el periodo de engorde de estos, así los podrá vender posteriormente a buen precio y obtendrá mas ingresos para el hogar.

Sus sueños son tener muchos cerdos en una pocilga para reproducirlos y ya no tener que comprarlos a otras personas.
texts.en:
Angelina is 60 years old and did not study because there were no schools nearby. She is married and her husband works in agriculture and in the transporting of passengers with a pick up truck that he owns. They have 6 children of which 2 study in school, 2 work in agriculture with their father and 2 live in the United States.

Angelina currently makes a living raising pigs. She has been doing this work for 25 years and learned it from her parents since she was young.

She needs the loan to buy 6 small pigs and 15 hundredweights of feed to give them a good diet during their fattening period. She could then sell them for a good price afterwards and obtain more income for her household.

Her dream is to have many pigs reproducing in a pigpen and to no longer need to buy them from other people.

loans.use: to buy 6 small pigs and 15 hundredweights of feed to give them a good diet.

loans.name: Juana

texts.es:
Juana tiene 59 años de edad, vive en casa de propia junto a su hija y nieto en el distrito de Zaña, una comunidad de clima caluroso, su población se dedica a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería, ubicada en la Provincia de Chiclayo que pertenece a la Región Lambayeque, costa norte del Perú.

Ella se dedica a la venta de productos de primera necesidad en una bodeguita donde ofrece productos de primera necesidad y en la parte posterior de su domicilio se dedica a la crianza de animales menores.

Ha solicitado un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 1 500 nuevos soles para la compra de mayor cantidad de productos para abastecer su negocio y de esta manera generar mayores ingresos para su familia.
texts.en:
Juana is 59 years old and lives in her own house with her daughter and grandson in Saña District, a community with a hot climate and whose population works in agriculture, commerce and raising livestock. It is located in Chiclayo Province, which is part of Lambayeque Region, on the northern coast of Peru.

Juana works selling basic necessities from a small grocery store. In the back part of her property, she raises small animals.

She has requested this loan of 1,500 PEN from Edpyme Alternativa to buy larger quantities of products to stock her store. She hopes to improve her income for her family.

loans.use: to buy larger quantities of basic necessities to stock her small grocery store.

loans.name: Maria Placida

texts.es:
María Placida tiene 27 años de edad, de estado civil casado tiene 2 hijos, que viven junto con su familia en el Distrito de Oyotún, una zona rural donde su población se dedica a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería, ubicada en la Provincia de Chiclayo que pertenece a la Región Lambayeque, costa norte del Perú.

Ella se dedica a la venta de abarrotes como leche, aceite, arroz, azúcar, gaseosa, que abastecen a su negocio, cuenta con clientes fijos que son sus vecinos, ha solicitado un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 1 000 nuevos soles para la compra de mayor cantidad de abarrotes para abastecer su negocio y de esta manera generar mayores ingresos para su familia.
texts.en:
María Placida is 27 years old, is in a common-law relationship and has 2 children. She lives together with her family in Oyotún district, located in Chiclayo Province which belongs to Lambayeque Region on the North Coast of Peru. The people of this rural area work in agriculture, commerce and raise livestock.

María works selling groceries like milk, oil, rice, sugar and soft drinks that stock her store. She has regular customers who are her neighbors. She has requested a loan from Edpyme Alternativa of 1000 PEN to buy a greater quantity of groceries to stock her business and in this way generate more income for her family.

loans.use: to buy basic food items to stock her store.

loans.name: Santos

texts.es:
Santos tiene 33 años de edad,  estudió hasta primer grado en la escuela, está acompañado y su pareja se dedica a los oficios domésticos, tiene dos hijos los cuales están estudiando y dependen de Santos.


Santos se dedica al comercio de verduras desde hace 3 años, la cual fue  iniciativa propia de emprenderse en este negocio, además se dedica a la siembra de granos básicos como maíz y frijol. Para vender las verduras camina 45 minutos hacia el cantón teniendo el apoyo de su esposa quien le da ayuda para vender.


el crédito lo invertirá para comprar fórmula y sulfato para aplicar al cultivo del maíz, el préstamo le permitirá comprar los insumos a tiempo y aplicarlo para obtener mejor rendimiento en la cosecha.


Él sueña con seguir trabajando en la agricultura y en la venta de verduras, sacar a su familia adelante, y que sus hijos pueden estudiar.
texts.en:
Santos is 33 years old, married, and has two children who go to school and are his dependents. Santos went to school until the first grade. His wife looks after the household work.

Santos has worked for three years selling vegetables, which is a business he started on his own initiative. He also works growing basic grains such as corn and beans.

To sell his vegetables, he walks 45 minutes toward the canton. His wife helps him with sales.

He is requesting this loan to buy sulfate and other agricultural products to apply to his corn crop. The loan will allow him to buy the agricultural products he needs and apply them in time to produce a better yield from his harvest.

His dream is to continue working in agriculture and selling vegetables, provide for his family, and see his children go to school.

loans.use: to buy sulfate and other agricultural products to apply to his corn crop.

loans.name: Deisy

texts.es:
Deisy tiene 45 años de edad, de estado civil conviviente, tiene un hijo que vive en cada propia en el distrito de Morropon una comunidad de clima caluroso, su población se dedica a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería, ubicada en la Provincia del mismo nombre, que pertenece a la Región Piura, costa norte del Perú.

Ella se dedica a la crianza y comercialización de ganado porcino, su negocio se encuentra ubicado en la parte posterior de su domicilio, ha solicitado un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 1 500 nuevos soles para la compra de alimentos balanceados para engorde de los mimos y de esta manera generar mayores ingresos para su familia.
texts.en:
Deisy is 45 years old, is in a common-law relationship and has one son. She lives in her own house in Morropon district, located in the Province of the same name, which belongs to Piura Region, on the North Coast of Peru. The people in this community with a hot climate work in agriculture, commerce and raise livestock.


Deisy works raising and selling pigs. Her business is located behind her house. She has requested a loan from Edpyme Alternativa of 1500 PEN to buy balanced feed to fatten her pigs and in this way generate more income for her family

loans.use: to buy balanced feed to fatten her animals.

loans.name: Boirjon

texts.en:
Boirjon was born in 1988. He lives with his parents and wife in a rural area. He has been busy with animal husbandry more than six years. He feeds cows. His parents help him with managing the business. The main source of family income is from animal husbandry. Boirjon sells cows in a local market. He is also a student. 

Boirjon studies at the Khujand State University. He is a student of the third course. Boirjon must pay his tuition but he does not have the money. He is asking for a loan to pay for tuition. He awaits your mercy.

loans.use: To pay for tuition

loans.name: Narjes

texts.en:
Narjes is a 32-year-old, divorced woman who started her own home business, selling clothes, to help cover her increasing living expenses. Narjes has four years of experience in her domain and is working hard to develop her business properly, which has given her the skills and experience to successfully manage her business. 

Since Narjes's business has been successful lately, she acquired a loan from Kiva’s field partner, Al Majmoua Lebanese Association for Development, in order to increase her current merchandise for the summer, which is her busiest time of year. She hopes that this loan will help increase her sales and allow her to continue growing her business.

loans.use: to increase her current clothing merchandise for the summer.

loans.name: Josefa

texts.es:
Josefa tiene 56 años de edad, vive junto a su cónyuge junto a su hijo en el distrito de Pucará, una comunidad de clima caluroso, su población se dedica a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería, ubicada en la Provincia de Jaén que pertenece a la Región Cajamarca, sierra norte del Perú.

Ella se dedica a la agricultura, siendo el cultivo de arroz el de mayor cantidad, en la parte posterior de su domicilio se dedica a la crianza de animales menores como patos, gallinas y pavos que lo comercializa en el mercado de su distrito y restaurants de la zona.

Ha solicitado un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 1 000 nuevos soles para la compra de mayor cantidad de animales como patos y cuyes para ofrecerlo a sus clientes, adicionalmente comprar alimentos balanceados para los mismos y de esta manera generar mayores ingresos para su familia.
texts.en:
Josefa is 56 years old and lives together with her husband and son in the Pucará district, an area with a hot climate, where the population works in agriculture, sales and ranching. It is located in Jaén province, in the Cajamarca region in the northern mountains of Peru.

She works in agriculture, growing large quantities of rice, and also rears small animals at the back of her home, such as ducks, chickens and turkeys, which she then sells in nearby markets and restaurants.

She has applied for a loan of 1000 nuevos soles from Edpyme Alternativa to buy a large quantity of animals such as ducks and guinea pigs to offer to her customers, as well as buying balanced foods for these animals. In this way she will generate more income for her family.

loans.use: to buy small animals and balanced foods to fatten them.

loans.name: Victor Bacilio

texts.es:
Víctor Bacilio tiene 38 años de edad, vive junto a su esposa e hijos en el distrito de Cayaltí, una comunidad de gente amable que se dedica a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería, ubicada en la Provincia de Chiclayo que pertenece a la Región Lambayeque, costa norte del Perú.

El brinda servicio de transporte público mediante su mototaxi, trasladando a sus pasajeros por zonas aledañas a su distrito, ha solicitado un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 4 500 nuevos soles para la compra de repuestos, tapizado y cambio de cadena de su vehículo y de esta manera brindar un servicio seguro a sus pasajeros.
texts.en:
Víctor Bacilio is 38 years old and lives together with his wife and children in Cayaltí district located in Chiclayo Province, which belongs to Lambayeque region, on the North Coast of Peru. The friendly people of this community work in agriculture, commerce and raise livestock.

Victor provides transportation services with his motorcycle, taking his passengers to the areas around his district. He has requested a loan from Edpyme Alternativa of 4500 PEN to buy spare parts, upholstery, and replace the chain on his vehicle so he can offer safe service to his passengers

loans.use: to buy spare parts to do maintenance on his motorcycle.

loans.name: Gloria

texts.en:
Gloria is 32 years old and has a live-in partner with two children.

Gloria earns a living by raising livestock in the Philippines. She is borrowing PHP 14,000 through NWTF to buy additional livestock, feed and vitamins for her business.

Gloria has been raising livestock for 8 years and earns additional income from buying and selling charcoal.

She is working tirelessly towards the attainment of her dream: to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy additional livestock, feed and vitamins for her business

loans.name: Inna

texts.ru:
Инна живет в городе Першотравенске, недалеко от Павлограда. Она торгует на местном рынке промышленными товарами для водопровода и канализации, а также вело- и рыбацким снаряжением: смесителями, ёмкостями дл воды, фильтрами, ободами, покрышками, педалями, удочками, прикормками и фонарями. Торговые точки у Инны выкуплены. Самостоятельный бизнес она ведёт 2.5 года, но по сути вся трудовая жизнь была связана с торговлей, а по образованию она — товаровед. Инна сталкивается с определенной конкуренцией, но это только подстегивает ее принимать конкретные решения и усердно работать, развивая свой бизнес. 
Инне нужна сумма в 40 000 гривен для того, чтобы купить новый контейнер и расширить бизнес за счет пополнения ассортимента реализуемого товара.
texts.en:
Inna lives in Pershotravensk, near Pavlograd. She sells commercial goods for plumbing and indoor sanitation in addition to cycling and fishing gear, including items such as mixers, water storage tanks, filters, rims, tires, pedals, fishing rods, bait, and lanterns. She owns her shop and has been running the business independently for 2.5 years, though she has been involved in commerce for all of her working life and her background is in merchandising. Inna faces some competition, but she is motivated to make concrete decisions and work hard at developing her business. 

Inna needs 40,000 hryvnia in order to purchase a new vending container and expand her business by replenishing her inventory.

loans.use: to purchase a new vending container and expand her business by replenishing her inventory

loans.name: Juan

texts.es:
Juan tiene 59 años de edad, de estado civil casado, vive junto a su esposa y nieta en el distrito de Zaña, una comunidad que se dedica a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería, ubicada en la Provincia de Chiclayo que pertenece a la Región Lambayeque, costa norte del Perú.

El se dedica a la crianza y venta de animales menores (patos, cuyes, pollos) en su domicilio y lo comercializa a los restaurants de la zona, ha solicitado un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 1 300 nuevos soles para la compra de cerdos para engorde y una segunda parte para engorde de los mismos.
texts.en:
Juan is 59 years old, married, and lives with his wife and granddaughter in the Zaña district. This is a community that works in agriculture, trade and cattle raising, and is located in the Chiclayo Province within the Lambayeque Region on the north coast of Perú. 

He raises and sells small animals (ducks, guinea pigs, chickens) at his house and sells them to restaurants in the area. He is asking Edpyme Alternativa for a loan of 1,300 nuevos soles to buy pigs to fatten up and also to fatten up themselves.

loans.use: to buy pigs to fatten up.

loans.name: Jiguisseme  I Group

texts.fr: Les membres du groupe JIGUISSEME I  sont des femmes mariées  ayant une moyenne d’âge de  29 ans, 3 enfants et vivant toutes dans des  familles polygames à KADIANA, cercle de KOLONDIEBA, une des préfectures de la  3ème région administrative du Mali. Elles collaborent avec l’institution de microfinance Soro Yiriwaso afin de mener à bien leurs activités agricoles pendant l’hivernage. Elles sont à leur troisième prêt avec l’institution, les prêts passés ont été bien remboursés. La spéculation cultivée est  le riz et l’arachide avec MARIAM  1ère personne debout à droite sur la photo. Avec son prêt, elle compte acheter des intrants, la semence et payer les frais de labours pour exploiter  4 hectares. La production est vendue à  KADIANA après la récolte à une clientèle composée d’hommes et de femmes. MARIAM espère avoir un bénéfice de 180.000FCFA qui sera utilisé pour payer son prêt et aussi d’aider son mari dans les dépenses quotidiennes.
texts.en: The members of the Jiguisseme I group are married women averaging 29 years of age, with three children. They all live in polygamous families in Kadiana, the township of Kolondieba, a prefecture in the third administrative district of Mali. They collaborate with the Soro Yiriwaso microfinance institution in order to better manage their agricultural activities during the rainy season. They are on their third loan with the institution, having duly repaid their prior loans. The grow rice and peanuts, which is what Mariam does, for example. She is the first one standing on the right in the photo. With her loan, she plans to buy agricultural inputs [fertilizers etc] and seeds and pay the cost of labor to work four ha [10 acres] of land. After harvesting, she sells her produce in Kadiana, to a mixed clientele. Mariam hopes to earn 180,000 West African francs, which will be used to pay off her loan and also help her husband with everyday expenses.

loans.use: to cover the costs of fertilizers, seeds and labor for the agricultural season.

loans.name: Celeste

texts.en:
Celeste is 25 years old and married. Celeste has two children who are in school.

Celeste is in the agricultural business, farming vegetables in the Philippines. Celeste requested a PHP 25,000 loan through NWTF to purchase fertilizer and other farm supplies.

Celeste has been in this business for five years, and has borrowed six times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

In the future, Celeste would like to save enough money to afford sending her children to school.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizer and other farm supplies

loans.name: Umedjon

texts.ru:
Его зовут Умедчон. Ему 32 года. Умедчон живет с женой и родителями в Вахдате. Его жена работает швеей и берет заказы на шитье женской одежды на дому. Умедчон раньше работал в сфере торговли, он на местном рынке продавал сухофрукты и конфеты. Но Умедчон понял, что ему необходимо получить высшее образование и устроится на перспективную работу. Умедчон поступил в Академию Министерства Внутренних Дел (МВД) на юридический Факультет. Он учиться хорошо и ему удается совмещать работу и учебу. Его взяли на работу в Управление МВД. 
    Причина, по которой Умедчон обратился за кредитом является то, что учеба в Академии является платной и у него не хватает средств, чтобы оплатить контракт. Умедчон надеется не лишиться учебы и работы, и надеется на Вашу помощь и отзывчивость.
texts.en:
His name Umedjon. He is 32 years old. Umedjon lives with his wife and parents in Vahdat. His wife works as a seamstress and taking orders to sew women's clothing at home. Umedjon previously sold dried fruit and candy in the local market. Umedjon realized that he needed to get a higher education to get a promising job. Umedjon enrolled in the Academy of the Ministry of Internal Affairs in the law department. He studies well, and he manages to combine work and study. He was given a job at the Department of the Interior Ministry (note: this is law enforcement). 

Umedjon applied for a loan because he must pay to study at the Academy, and he does not have enough money for tuition. Umedjon has not lost hope that he can study and work, and he looks forward to your help and responsiveness.

loans.use: to pay tuition for the year

loans.name: Shahlo

texts.ru: Женщину на фотографии зовут Шахло. Она является мамой двоих детей. Ей 32 года. У Шахло нет мужа, и она одна растет двоих детей школьного возраста. Шахло занимается продажей женской одежды, разной мелочи и аксессуаров. В этой сфере деятельности она более двух лет. Шахло надеется расширить свою деятельность, на заемные деньги планирует  привести новый товар для нового сезона. Шахло верит, что ее ждет успех в работе, и она сможет в скором времени открыть собственный магазин одежды в родном городке Худжанд. Поддержите Шахло.
texts.en:
The woman in the photo is called Shahlo. She is the mother of two children. She is 32 years old. Shahlo does not have a husband, and she is raising two school-aged children on her own. Shahlo sells women's clothing, other small items and accessories. She has more than two years in this sphere of activity.

Shahlo needs to expand her activity, and with the loan money plans to buy new goods for the new season. Shahlo believes that she will succeed in her work, and she will be able soon to open her own clothing store in her hometown Khudjand.

loans.use: to expand her assortment of goods and to acquire goods for the new season

loans.name: Laili

texts.ru: Лайли трудолюбивая женщина. Она родилась в 1960 году в Таджикистане. Лайли имеет высшее педагогическое образование. Она работает в школе преподавательницей и имеет большой опыт в данной сфере. Лайли 10 лет назад начала свой бизнес , так как ее зарплата не хватала для обеспечения семьи. Уже 10 лет она введет параллельно свой бизнес с педагогической деятельностью. Она занимается переработкой и продажей абрикосов. Она продаёт переработанные абрикосы на местном рынке и таким образом зарабатывает на жизнь. Лайли запрашивает займ на сумму 5000 сомони для покупки абрикоса. Она ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en: Laili is a hardworking woman. She was born in 1960 in Tajikistan. Laili has a higher pedagogical education. She works in a school as a teacher and has a lot of experience in this sphere. Ten years ago, Laili started her own business, since her salary was not enough to support her family. For ten years already, she has been running her business in parallel with her pedagogical activities. She processes and sells apricots. She sells processed apricots at a local market and in this way makes a living. Laili is requesting a loan of 5,000 somoni to purchase apricots.

loans.use: to buy apricots for processing

loans.name: María Del Tráncito

texts.es:
María tiene 47 años de edad, es madre soltera de 5 hijos que actualmente se encuentran estudiando en la escuela, y la mayor de 20 años en la universidad, María no tiene ningún grado académico pero gracias a su interés y a programas de alfabetización ella puede leer y escribir, vive junto a sus hijos pues gracias al negocio que le genera ingresos les puede dar a sus hijos lo necesario para que puedan crecer  y estudiar, vive junto a su madre en su vivienda y sus 5 hijos que dependen de ella.


María tiene un negocio de un chalet de comida rápida y antojitos en un centro educativo desde hace 20 años, gracias a esto ha logrado sacar adelante económicamente a sus 5 hijos en sus estudios, el día lo empieza levantándose a las 4 de la mañana a alistarse y preparar  las diferentes productos y luego desplazarse un  kilómetro caminando hacia el negocio para estar antes que los alumnos en la escuela y ya tener sus productos preparados, el negocio lo cierra a las dos de la tarde, luego se regresa a su casa para realizar las actividades del hogar y cuidar de sus hijos, ella siempre ha recibido el apoyo de sus hijos mayores en las actividades que realizan en el negocio.


El financiamiento del crédito lo necesita específicamente para invertirlo en el chalet, ella quiere surtirlo más comprando algunos productos que no tiene y que sus cliente buscan, también para remodelar las instalaciones que le permitirán tener más clientes cómodamente, pues gracias al financiamiento obtendrá mayores ingresos económicos para seguir trabajando e invirtiendo en su negocio 


Ella sueña en grande, desea ampliar más su local y remodelarlo, que su negocio que sea un restaurante y poder emplear a mas personar en los trabajos que realiza, para su familia desea lo mejor que sus hijos sigan estudiando para que en el futuro sean personas profesionales y personas de bien en la sociedad.
texts.en:
María is a 47 year old single mother of five children. They are currently studying in school, and the oldest, who is 20, attends university. María has no academic degree, but thanks to literacy programs and her interest, she can read and write.

She lives together with her children. Thanks to her business, which generates income, she can give her children what they need to grow and study. They live together with their mother in her house and her five children depend on her.

For 20 years, Maria has had a business, which is a stand selling fast food and snacks in a school. Thanks to this, she's succeeded in helping her children move forward economically and in their studies.

She starts her day waking up at 4 a.m. and gets ready to prepare the different products. Later, she travels to her business, walking one kilometer to be there before the students in the school, and to already have her products prepared. The business closes at 2 p.m., and she returns to her house to do housework and take care of her children. Her older children have always helped her with the works she does for her business.

She needs loan funding specifically to invest in the stand. She wants to stock it more, buying some products she doesn't have that her customers look for. She would also like to remodel the premises, which will allow her to have more customers comfortably. Thanks to the funding, she will earn better income to continue working and investing in her business.

She dreams big, and wants to grow her location and remodel it so her business can be a restaurant and employ more people in the work she does. She wants the best for her family: that her children continue studying so that in the future, they can be professionals and good people in society.

loans.use: to invest in her fast food stand by buying several products her customers want, and also to remodel the premises.

loans.name: Jose Paco

texts.es:
José Paco tiene 32 años de edad, vive con su cónyuge y sus dos hijos, en el distrito de Callayuc, una comunidad que se dedica a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería, es una comunidad de clima frío y su población es alegre y unida se apoyan entre ellos, se encuentra ubicado en la Provincia de Cutervo que pertenece a la Región Cajamarca, sierra norte del Perú.

El se dedica al cultivo de caña y destilación de aguardiente en el Caserío de Cuchea, una bebida que se procesa a base del jugo de caña de azúcar y lo comercializa en su mismo distrito y caseríos aledaños.

Ha solicitado un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 1 000 nuevos soles para el mantenimiento de su trapiche, una herramienta artesanal que facilita la destilación de jugo de caña.
texts.en:
José Paco is 32 years old and lives with his wife and their two children in the Callayuc district, a community that works in agriculture, sales and ranching. The area has a cold climate, and its people are happy, united and support each other. It is located in the Cutervo province in the Cajamarca region, in the northern mountains of Peru.

He works in the village of Cuchea, growing sugar cane and distilling aguardiente, a drink which is made from sugar cane and which he sells in his district and in neighboring villages.

He has applied for a loan of 1000 nuevos soles from Edpyme Alternativa for the maintenance of his sugar cane crusher, a traditional tool which facilitates the distillation of the sugar cane juice.

loans.use: to maintain his sugar cane crusher for distilling aguardiente.

loans.name: Javier Francisco

texts.es:
La responsabilidad de Javier es una de sus características más conocidas, antes de su personalidad amable y sonriente que hacen que los clientes de su pulpería se sientan a gusto desde hace seis años que se estableció. Javier es un señor viudo de 50 años y padre de una pequeña hija de 10 años, quien todos los días se viste con su uniforme azul y blanco para asistir al colegio. Tal vez este señor amable no pudo haber llegado a la universidad, pero para él es un sueño poder ver que su pequeña si lo haga y por eso trabaja fuerte para solidificar el negocio que piensa heredarle a su hija.
Javier inició con un establecimiento de ropa en un mercado. Luego decidió ahorrar y poner su propia pulpería. Su meta es seguir invirtiendo en su negocio, por lo que necesita de un préstamo para comprar más cepillos de dientes, leche, gaseosas, pan, azúcar, entre otros productos que siempre ha ofrecido. Esto le ayudara a incrementar su inventario y obtener más ventas, que le ayudaran a incrementar sus ingresos, junto con las remesas que tiene de España, para cumplir todas sus metas con su hija.
texts.en:
Javier is best known for being responsible, as well as for his kind and smiling personality that has made the customers of his small grocery store feel comfortable for six years now.

Javier is 50 years old and widowed. He has a 10-year-old daughter, who every day dresses in her blue and white uniform to go to school.

Although this kind man was not able to go to university himself, it is his dream to be able to see his young daughter go to university, and for this he works very hard to grow his business, which he plans for his daughter to inherit.

Javier started with a clothing business in the market.

Then he decided to save money so he could open his own grocery store.

His goal is to continue investing in his business, for which he is requesting this loan to buy more toothbrushes, milk, soft drinks, bread, sugar and other products.

The loan will help him increase his inventory, along with shipments he receives from Spain. He hopes to increase his sales and income, so that he can achieve all of his goals with his daughter.

loans.use: to buy toothbrushes, milk, soft drinks, bread, sugar and other products for his small grocery store.

loans.name: Parvina

texts.ru: Парвина очень трудолюбивая женщина. Она с детства всегда мечтала стать портнихой и шить красивые женские платья и радовать, таким образом, своих клиентов.  Парвина родилась в 1987 году. Она замужем и на воспитании имеет одного сына, которого зовут Мухаммад. Парвина 3 года назад начала свой бизнес предоставлением услуги швеи. Она шьёт как национальные платья, так и европейские платья. Парвина имеет свою мастерскую. Она имеет швейную машинку марки «Чайка» и аверлок. Парвина хочет купить кондиционер в свою мастерскую, так как летом там очень жарко. Парвина запрашивает займ на сумму 2000 сомони для покупки кондиционера. Она ждет вашу доброту и надеется на ваше милосердие.
texts.en:
Parvina is a very hardworking woman. Since childhood, she has always dreamed to become a dressmaker and to sew beautiful women's dresses and to maker her customers happy in this way. Parvina was born in 1987. She is married and has one son named Muhammad.

Three years ago, Parvina started her own business offering sewing services. She sews both national dresses as well as European dresses. Parvina has her own workshop. She has a Chaika sewing machine and overlock. Parvina wants to purchase an air conditioner for her workshop since in the summer it is very hot. Parvina is requesting a loan of 2,000 somoni to purchase an air conditioner.

loans.use: to buy air conditioning for her workshop

loans.name: Paula

texts.es:
Paula tiene 43 años de edad, se dedica a los oficios del hogar, no pudo estudiar ya que era la mayor de 4 hermanos y tenia que ayudarle a su mamá en los quehaceres del hogar pues sus padres eran de escasos recursos económicos, está casada y su esposo se dedica al cultivo de maíz y frijol, con él ha procreado 3 hijos de los cuales los dos mayores solo estudiaron hasta 9° grado y trabajan en la agricultura y ademas son colaboradores en una ruta de buses, y la tercera hija estudia bachillerato pero vende jugos y licuados en su casa. 


Paula tiene una pequeña tienda en su casa, tiene esta tienda desde hace 8 años, decidió poner este negocio ya que quería ayudar a su esposo e hijos con los gastos de el hogar, a pesar de que hay mas negocios similares cerca, ella se siente agradecida con Dios y con sus vecinos que siempre llegan a comprar sus productos.

Con el crédito, Paula podrá comprar mas mercadería para su tienda con la cual espera  tener mejores ingresos y así ayudar mas a su familia, comprando mas mercadería ella tendrá mas demanda de compradores y será competencia fuerte para las otras tiendas del lugar.


Ella sueña con ver crecer la tienda, apoyar a su hija ya que quiere seguir estudiando una carrera universitaria y espera  tener la fuerza y los ingresos para ayudarle a cumplir este sueño, desea también realizar mejoras en su casa y hacerla de un material mas resistente pues es de lámina y quiere construirla de ladrillo.
texts.en:
Paula, age 43, devotes herself to the household chores.  She was not able to go to school because she was the oldest of four siblings, and she had to help her mother with the household chores.  Her parents had scarce financial resources.  She is married, and her husband grows corn and beans.  They have three children.  The two oldest only went to school through the ninth grade.  They work in agriculture and also work on a bus route.  Her third daughter is getting her high school degree, and she sells juices and smoothies at her house.  

Paula has a small store at her house, which she has had for eight years.  She decided to set up this business because she wanted to help her husband and children with the household expenses.  In spite of the fact that there are similar businesses nearby, she is grateful to God and to her neighbors who always come to buy her products.

With the loan Paula will be able to buy more merchandise for her store.  By doing so she hopes to have better income.  This way she will help her family more.  By purchasing more merchandise she will have greater buyer demand, and she will be strong competition for the other stores in the area.

She dreams of seeing her store grow and of supporting her daughter because she wants to continue her education at the university.  She hopes to have the strength and the income to help her fulfill this dream.  She also wishes to makes improvements to her house and to make it from sturdier material.  It is made from metal sheeting, and she wants to build it from brick.

loans.use: to buy more merchandise for her store.

loans.name: Patricia Lisseth

texts.es: Patricia tiene 22 años de edad y habita en casa propia junto  a su esposo y su hija de tres años de edad. Patricia se dedica a la venta de ropa para niños y para adultos desde hace 5 años. La venta la realiza de forma ambulante y es así como ha logrado sacar adelante a su familia. Patricia desea  invertir en su negocio en la compra de mayor cantidad de prendas de vestir como: vestidos, faldas, ropa interior, pantalones, etc. para cubrir una mayor demanda de mercado y poder así incrementar sus ventas e ingresos.
texts.en:
Patricia, age 22, lives in her own house with her husband and her three year old daughter.  Patricia has been selling clothes for children and adults for five years.  She sells in an itinerant manner, and she has managed to get her family ahead in this way.

Patricia wishes to invest in her business by purchasing a greater quantity of clothing.  She will buy things like dresses, skirts, underwear, and pants, etc.  She wants to do this to cover a greater demand in the market and to be able to increase her sales and her income.

loans.use: to buy dresses, skirts, underwear, and pants, etc.

loans.name: Pelagia Teodocia

texts.es:
Pelagia es una mujer de 46 años de edad vive con su pareja y tiene 4 hijos.
Su familia es numerosa y todos sus hijos asisten a la escuela, su hija mayor está terminando la escuela secundaria y su hijo menor terminando la escuela primaria, su esposo la colabora en todo lo que ella necesite como; hacer las compras y lavar los platos además de repartir los platos de comida sobre las mesas porque Pelagia es dueña de un restaurante de comida típica tradicional y sirve platos como: fricasé, caldo de cardán, sajta de pollo, etc.
Pelagia vivió toda su vida realizando labores de cocina, su madre cocinaba y vendía comida en la calle y así fue como desde muy niña tuvo sus inicios en el arte culinario. La necesidad de mejorar su calidad de vida hace que ella busque la forma de mejorar su negocio innovando en el servicio, recientemente renovó parte de su mobiliario, cambió las cortinas e hizo mantenimiento a las mesas de madera, ahora necesita realizar la compra de insumos alimenticios por mayor (arroz, fideo, harina, chuño, etc.), la competencia en su rubro es muy agresiva y su restaurante lleva la delantera.
Pelagia sueña ver a su restaurante crecer para poder sacar a su familia adelante y mejorar su calidad de vida.
Es por ese motivo que Pelagia solicita un préstamo para la compra de insumos de cocina como; arroz, fideo, harina, chuño, etc.
texts.en:
Pelagia is 46 years old and lives with her husband and four children, all of whom go to school. Her oldest daughter is finishing high school, and her youngest son is finishing elementary school.

Pelagia has a restaurant in which she serves traditional food such as fricassee, "caldo de cardán", chicken stew ("sajta de pollo"), etc. Her husband helps her with everything she needs, such as doing the shopping, washing plates, as well as serving food.

Pelagia has worked her whole life in the kitchen. Her mother cooked and sold food in the street, and this is how Pelagia received her culinary education from when she was very little.

She has been improving her business so that she can improve her quality of life. She has improved the service, furniture and curtains. Now she needs to buy some ingredients at wholesale prices (rice, noodles, flour, chuño [dehydrated potatoes], etc.). The competition in her area is very aggressive, and her restaurant is currently ahead.

She dreams of seeing her restaurant grow so that she can provide for her family and improve their quality of life.

For this reason she is requesting this loan to buy ingredients such as rice, noodles, flour, chuño [dehydrated potatoes], etc.

loans.use: to buy ingredients such as rice, noodles, flour, chuño [dehydrated potatoes], etc. at wholesale prices for her restaurant.

loans.name: Olandina

texts.en:
A $1,000 loan was offered to Olandina to improve her business. She has a kiosk where many people come to shop every day. She will buy some additional supplies such as a refrigerator, slippers, coffee, sugar, oil, cards, body loosener and biscuits. 

Olandina has been involved in business activities since 2004. She feels very comfortable running her business because she can earn money every day. Running a business has made Olandina independent because she can be responsible for herself and also help her family. She hopes to run a bigger business in the future.

loans.use: To buy a refrigerator, slippers, coffee, sugar, oil, cards, body loosener and biscuits.

loans.name: Fanny Del Rocio

texts.es:
San Miguel de los Bancos el Cantón del amor se encuentra ubicado al noroccidente de la provincia de pichincha, este Cantón es un atractivo turístico muy visitado debido a su gran cantidad de flora y fauna silvestre es el lugar perfecto para venir a descansar, el clima es cálido húmedo lleno de gente amable y trabajadora en este Cantón vive y tiene el negocio la señora Fanny una Mujer luchadora de 41 años es madre soltera tiene 4 hijos el mayor tiene 21 años y el ultimo 8 años 2 de ellos dependen y viven con ella, desde que murió su pareja ella es cabeza de hogar y gracias a su negocio y con mucho esfuerzo logro salir adelante.
Ella se dedica a la venta de confiterías y juguetes de este negocio aprendió junto con una hermana mayor que se dedicaba a esto y ella le ayudaba, a este negocio le dedica un promedio de 10 horas diarias durante este tiempo recibe la ayuda de una de sus hijas, ella al venir de una familia de bajos recursos económicos no pudo estudiar solo tiene la primaria y su mas grande sueño es que sus hijos tengan mejor suerte que ella y puedan prepararse.
Solicita este crédito para invertir en el negocio para incrementar la mercadería para tener una mejor venta aprovechando las festividades del Cantón y los Cantones vecinos, con esta nueva inversión mejorará su calidad de vida y la de sus hijos, la señora Fanny agradece a Fundación Alternativa y a Kiva por el apoyo y las oportunidades brindadas.
texts.en:
San Miguel de los Bancos, the region of love, is located northwest of the Pichincha Province. This region is an attractive tourist location visited a lot due to its abundance of flora and fauna. Silvestre is the perfect place to come and rest. The climate is warm and humid and it´s full of friendly working people. Fanny, a 41-year-old determined woman, lives and has a business in this region. She is a single mother with 2 children. The oldest is 21 years old and the youngest is 8 years old. Two of them are dependent and live with her. Since her partner died, she is the head of the household and thanks to her business and with a lot of effort, she has been able to move forward. 

She sells candy and toys. She learned this business together with her older sister who has helped her. She works an average of 10 hours a day, during which she receives help from one of her daughters. Coming from a low-income family, she couldn´t study and only has an elementary school education. Her biggest dream is for her children to have better luck than she did and for them to make something of themselves. 

She is asking for this loan to invest in her business to increase her merchandise to sell more during the regional festivities and those of the neighboring regions. This new investment will improve her quality of life and that of her children. Fanny is grateful to Fundación Alternativa and to Kiva for the support and for the opportunities provided.

loans.use: to increase her merchandise of candy and games.

loans.name: José Alejandro

texts.es:
José tiene 25 años de edad, su nivel de educación es hasta sexto grado, tiene 2 hijos que están pequeños, su esposa se dedica a los oficios domésticos, por lo tanto solo ella y 2 hijos dependen de José.


José cultiva la tierra junto a su padre y hermanos, hacen siembra de granos básicos (maíz y frijol), él desde muy pequeño aprendió a realizar este trabajo, además se dedica a los trabajos de jornalero. Para llegar al lugar de cultivo José tiene que caminar un kilómetro, además posee 5 vacas que debe alimentar y ordeñar por las mañanas.


El crédito lo necesita para cultivar 2 hectáreas de maicillo, para preparar la tierra, comprar fertilizantes y pagar la mano de obra.


José desea para un futuro tener una mejor calidad de vida para él y su familia, tener  mayor  producción de granos básicos y vivir cómodamente en un lugar digno, para sus hijos que sigan estudiando y logren ser personas profesionales.
texts.en:
José is 25 years old and studied until the sixth grade. He has two small children; his wife takes care of the household chores, so only she and the two children depend on José.

José farms land along with his father and brothers, growing basic grains (corn and beans). He learned to carry out this work when he was very young.  As well as this he works as a day laborer. To arrive at the land José has to walk for one kilometer. He also owns 5 cows which he has to feed and milk in the mornings.

He needs the loan to farm 2 hectares of sorghum, to prepare the land, to buy fertilizers and to pay labor costs.

José's wishes for the future are to have a better quality of life for him and his family, to have a greater production of basic grains and to live comfortably in a decent place, so that his children can continue studying and become professionals.

loans.use: to farm 2 hectares of sorghum,  to prepare the land, to buy fertilizers and to pay the labor costs.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to make the down payment on a plot of land.

loans.name: Lourdes Isolina

texts.es:
Lourdes tiene 30 años de edad, estudió hasta bachillerato, está soltera y sin hijos, y vive junto a su mamá


Ella se dedica a la venta de celulares y accesorios para los mismos, tiene ya 4 años de dedicarse a trabajar en esto, consiguió este trabajo gracias a una amiga que le informó sobre la plaza de trabajo, para llegar al lugar tiene que salir de su casa a las 6:00 am  y regresa a las 6:00 pm.


El crédito lo necesita para comprar unos electrodomésticos y muebles para su casa, ya que quiere que su mamá se sienta mas cómoda, comprando esto mejorará su calidad de vida ya que vivirá en un  lugar mas cómodo. 


Ella sueña con hacer mas grande la casa en la que habita la cual es de su mamá, quiere hacerle un cuarto mas así y arreglar el piso, desea también formar una familia, tener hijos y acompañar a su madre durante todo el tiempo que le quede de vida.
texts.en:
Lourdes is 30 years old, has a high school diploma, is single with no children, and lives with her mother. She makes a living selling cellular phones and accessories for them. She has been doing this for 4 years now. She got this job thanks to a friend who told her about the position. To get to the place she has to leave her house at 6 a.m. and returns at 6 p.m. 

She needs the loan to buy some appliances and furniture for her house, because she wants her mother to feel more comfortable. Buying this will improve her quality of life because she will live in a more comfortable place. She dreams of making the house where she lives, which belongs to her mother, bigger. She wants to add a room on to it and fix the floor. She also wants to have a family, have children, and be with her mother for the rest of her life.

loans.use: to buy some appliances and furniture for her house.

loans.name: Ana Patricia

texts.es: Ana tiene 28 años de edad y habita en casa propia junto a su esposo y sus dos hijos de 12 años y 7 años de edad quienes se encuentran estudiado en la escuela pública de su localidad. Ella tiene un negocio de venta de fruta en una zona muy transitada y estratégica para la venta. Con el deseo de mejorar sus ingreso y apoyar más a su familia ha tomado la decisión de solicitar este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en su negocio en la compra de mayor cantidad de frutas como: sandía, naranjas, mangos, melones, bananos y de más frutas demandadas por sus clientes.
texts.en:
Ana is 28 years old and lives in her own house with her husband and her two children, 12 and 7 years old, who are studying at her town's public school. She has a business selling fruit in a very busy and strategic area for sales. 

Wanting to improve her income and support her family more, she has decided to request this loan from FUSAI in order to invest in her business by purchasing a larger quantity of fruit, like watermelon, oranges, mangos, melons, bananas, and other fruit in demand among her clients.

loans.use: to buy watermelon, oranges, mangos, melons, bananas, and other fruit in demand among her clients.

loans.name: Mirgul

texts.ru: Миргул 46 лет, замужем, вместе с супругом воспитывают 4 детей. У Миргул высшее образование, в качестве основного дохода для своей семьи она с 1996 года занимается полеводством и животноводством. Благодаря упорству, целеустремленности и трудолюбию Миргул, на сегодняшний день у нее есть 1 корова, 1 бычок и 1 теленок. Ежемесячный доход от реализации молока и прочей сельскохозяйственной продукции составляет 15,000 сом (KGS). Миргул обратилась в Банк "Бай-Тушум" за кредитом в сумме 55,000 сом (KGS) для закупки коровы и постройки сарая. Миргул намерена расширить свой бизнес, что непременно приведет к увеличению капитала семьи. Доходы от кредита она хочет направить на свадьбу сына.
texts.en: Mirgul is 46, married, and raising four children with her spouse. She has a college education and has been raising livestock and planting crops as her family's main source of income since 1996. Thanks to her perseverance, dedication, and hard work, Mirgul currently has one cow, one bull, and one calf. She earns 15,000 som (KGS) per month selling milk and other agricultural products. She applied for a loan of 55,000 som (KGS) with Bai-Tushum Bank to purchase cows and build a barn. Mirgul intends to expand her business, which will undoubtedly lead to more money for her family. She wants to use her profits to pay for her son's wedding.

loans.use: To buy a cow and build a barn

loans.name: Lorena Del Carmen

texts.es:
A los 16 años, a mayoría de jóvenes se preparan para ir a la universidad, otros piensan en fiestas y otros en independizarse. Este último es el caso de Lorena, una joven de 32 años, soltera y sin hijos, centrada desde hace 16 años como comerciante de ropa, calzado y cosméticos. A esa edad, Lorena terminó su secundaria, continuó con su sueño de ser independiente y ayudar a su mamá, quien ya era mayor de edad. Su mamá al ver su entusiasmo la apoyo para dar sus primeros pasos vendiendo artículos de la Avon. Poco a poco fue obteniendo clientes con el apoyo de su familia, comercializando en su barrio.
Para Lorena, estas ventas son el único ingreso, por esta razón es que necesita de un préstamo para comprar perfumes, cosméticos, ropa y calzados, para cumplir con la demanda de los clientes y así incrementar sus ingresos para cumplir con su sueño de vender en toda Managua. Las metas de esta mujer son grandes, pues planea seguir dándoles una buena atención a sus clientes, suplir con sus necesidades, establecerse en una tienda y aprovechar que no tiene hijos para viajar sin preocupaciones al extranjero para comprar su propia mercadería y tener mayores ganancias.
texts.en:
At age 16, most young people are thinking of going to university, going to parties or becoming independent. Becoming independent was Lorena's goal when she was that age. She is now 32 years old, and has worked selling clothing, footwear and cosmetics for 16 years. She is single and does not have children.

At age 16, Lorena finished high school and went ahead with her plans to become independent and help her mother. Her mother saw her enthusiasm, and so helped her get started selling Avon products. Lorena gradually attracted customers with the help of her family, selling to people in their neighborhood.

These sales are Lorena's only source of income. For this reason she is requesting this loan to buy perfume, cosmetics, clothing and footwear, which she needs to meet the demand of her customers. She hopes to increase her income and make her dream of selling in all of Managua a reality.

Lorena's goals are big. She plans to continue providing good service to her customers and meeting their needs. She also plans to open a store, and to take advantage of this time that she does not have children to travel freely abroad to buy her own merchandise and improve her profits.

loans.use: to buy perfume, cosmetics, clothing and footwear to resell.

loans.name: Juan Ángel

texts.es:
Juan de 67 años de edad, estudió hasta 3° grado, abandonó los estudios debido a que se vio en la necesidad de trabajar para ayudar a su padre en los gastos de el hogar, ya que proviene de una familia numerosa, es viudo y no pudo procrear hijos con su esposa, en su casa vive con una sobrina y sus 4 hijos que le ayuda con la alimentación.


Juan se dedica a la agricultura desde que era un niño, ya que su padre le enseñó este tipo de trabajo, él cultiva una hectárea y media de maíz y media hectárea de frijol, en esto le ayudan los hijos de su sobrina y un hermano, trabaja también como albañil cuando hay proyectos de trabajo en este rubro, esto lo aprendió cuando era un niño pues trabajaba con un tío. El horario de trabajo es bastante diverso, además el tiene que trasladarse por veredas para llegar a sus cultivos.


El crédito lo necesita para comprar una vaca parida para poder procesar la leche ya que esto le generará un ingreso con la venta de sus derivados, además comprará abono, herbicidas y plaguicidas para sus cultivos ya que se acerca el tiempo de aplicárselos al cultivo.


Él sueña con ponerle un mejor material al piso de su casa ya que el que posee es de tierra y quiere hacerlo de concreto, desea tener una buena cosecha de granos básicos para asi poder vender y tener un ingreso de dinero, además el desea ayudarle a su sobrina a que sus hijos se superen dedicadamente, pues a pesar de que él no pudo procrear hijos, siente como si sus sobrinos lo fueran.
texts.en:
Juan is 67 years old. He studied up to third grade and left school because he had to work to help his father with the household expenses, as he comes from a big family. He is a widower and couldn´t have children with his wife. His neice and her 4 children live in his house and he helps her feed them.

Juan has worked in agriculture since he was young, as his father taught him this kind of work. He grows one and a half hectare of corn and half a hectare of beans. With this, he helps his niece´s children and his brother. He also works as a construction worker when there are projects. He learned this when he was young because he worked with an uncle of his. His work schedule is quite diverse and he also has to walk a while to get to his crops. 

He needs the loan to buy a cow that has recently given birth so that he can process the milk, as this will generate income along with the sale of his byproducts. He will also buy fertilizer, herbicides and pesticides for his crops since it´s almost time to spray the crops. He dreams of putting better material on the floor of his house since it is currently dirt and he´d like to make it out of concrete. He hopes to have a good grain harvest to be able to sell and have an income. He also would like to help his niece to better the lives of her children. Since he wasn´t able to have children, he feels as though his nieces and nephews were his own.

loans.use: to buy a cow that has recently given birth so that he can process the milk, as this will generate income along with the sale of his byproducts. He will also buy fertilizer, herbicides and pesticides for his crops since it´s almost time to spray the crops.

loans.name: Mardoqueo

texts.es:
Mardoqueo tiene 28 años de edad, estudió hasta 9° grado, no culminó sus estudios porque su padre se enfermó y tuvo que trabajar con sus hermanos para poder llevar el sustento al hogar y para conseguir el dinero para comprar las medicinas de su padre, actualmente Mardoqueo está acompañado y su esposa se dedica a los oficios del hogar y a cuidar de un hijo que tienen.

Él se dedica a trabajar como agricultor y corralero, trabaja en un municipio aledaño a su comunidad, tiene que trasladarse hasta su trabajo junto a un hermano que lo lleva en motocicleta, este trabajo lo aprendió gracias a un tío y a su padre,  el horario en el cual realiza las actividades es de 5:00 am hasta las 2:00 md.


Mardoqueo necesita el crédito para comprar todos los fertilizantes y herbicidas para sus cultivos y para el control de plaga, de esta forma podrá asegurar una excelente producción de los granos básicos.


Él desea en un futuro poder hacer mas grande su casa ya que donde actualmente vive es pequeño y quiere darle a su bebé la calidad de vida que el no pudo tener debido a los pocos recursos con los que sus padres contaban, también desea que su hijo pueda estudiar y ser un profesional ya que él no pudo serlo.
texts.en: Mardoqueo is 28 years old. He studied up to 9th grade. He did not finish his studies because his father got sick and he needed to work with his siblings to support the household and buy his father's medicines. Currently Mardoqueo has a common-law wife, and she works in the household chores and takes care of their son. He works farming and raising livestock. He works in the municipality next to his community. He has to travel to his work with one of his brothers, who brings him by motorcycle. He learned this job thanks to an uncle and to his father. His work schedule is from 5:00 am until 2:00 pm. Mardoqueo needs the loan to buy all the fertilizers and herbicides for his crops and for plague control, so he can assure an excellent production of basic grains. In the future he wishes to be able to expand his house, since where he currently lives is small, and he wants to give his baby a quality of life that he was not able to have because of the scarce resources his parents had. He also wants his son to be able to study and become professional, since he was not able to be one.

loans.use: to buy all the fertilizers and herbicides for his crops and for plague control

loans.name: Fredis Mardoqueo

texts.es:
Fredis de 20 años de edad, estudió hasta 5° grado, está acompañado y su pareja se dedica a los oficios domésticos y le ayuda a trabajar en la agricultura. 

Fredis ha trabajado la tierra desde temprana edad ya que ha sido el trabajo familiar por años. 

El préstamo lo utilizará para comprar abono, venenos y fertilizantes para aplicarlos a sus cultivos. 

Él planea en un futuro poder construir su casa propia para vivir aparte con su esposa e hijos.
texts.en:
Fredis, 20 years old, studied up until 5th grade and is in a relationship. His partner is a homemaker and helps him do agricultural work. Fredis has worked the land from a young age because it has been the family work for years. 

He will use the loan to buy manure, poison, and fertilizer to apply to his crops. In the future he plans to be able to build his own house to live alone with his wife and children.

loans.use: to buy manure, poison, and fertilizers to apply to his crops.

loans.name: Murugan Shg Group

texts.en:
Kreshmeri is married to Mr. Chakkrawarthi, a farmer by profession. They have three children, and the family is living in their own house. She is the leader of “Murugan” Self Help Group (SHG) at Keelanatham village, Tamil Nadu, which is under the local NGO called “People's Action for Transformation" (PAT). 

The group has existed for more than ten years. The group consists of six members. The members of the group have been receiving loans from “PAT” for ten years now. 

Now the group members need a loan to purchase a smokeless stove, which is produced by Greenway Grameen Infra. This stove costs INR 1,400. The reduction in indoor air pollution means healthier women and their families. Smoke-free air benefits young children and women, who spend the maximum amount of time in and around the kitchen.

loans.use: to purchase a smokeless stove.

loans.name: Elmer Mauricio

texts.es:
Elmer de 35 años de edad, estudió hasta 9° grado, está acompañado y su pareja tiene una tienda en la casa, tiene 4 hijos pero solo 2 dependen de él. 

Elmer siempre se ha dedicado a trabajar en la agricultura y ganadería, ya que su familia siempre ha trabajado en la misma actividad. 

El préstamo lo utilizará para comprar materiales para cultivar, abono, venenos y fertilizantes. 

Él sueña con darle la educación adecuada a sus hijos y hacer mas grande la tienda.
texts.en: Elmer is 35 years old. He studied up to 9th grade. He has a common-law wife and she has a store in the house. He has 4 children, but only 2 of them depend on him. Elmer has always worked in agriculture and animal husbandry, because his family has always worked in the same work. He will use the loan to buy materials for cultivation, manure, poisons and fertilizers. He dreams of giving his children the adequate education and to make the store bigger.

loans.use: to buy material for cultivation, manure, poisons and fertilizers.

loans.name: Ohmganapathy Shg Group

texts.en:
Sudha is a member of “Ohmganapathy” Self-Help-Group (SHG), managed by the local NGO, People's Action for Transformation (PAT), Tamil Nadu, India. PAT works to bring change in the outlook of the poor, underprivileged and marginalized section of the population. PAT helps them with their educational needs, their rights and privileges; helps them break the hurdles in their way to climb up the social and economic ladder using local resources. This is an empowerment process to effect social transformation. 

Sudha (who is standing with her hand raised) lives in Veppathur, a village in Tanjore District. Sudha is married and has two children. She has studied up to ninth grade. She and her husband are farmers and have 1½ acres of land. They have taken loans from PAT previously and repaid on time. Through microfinance, their standard of living has been improving.  

Sudha and the other four women each want to buy a smokeless stove, for which they are requesting a loan. These stoves use 65% less fuel than traditional mud cookstoves and emit much less smoke. These women want to save time and money, and cook in a healthier environment. They are all looking forward to using this “green” stove.

loans.use: to buy a smokeless stove.

loans.name: Jean Bosco

texts.en:
Jean Bosco is a super star. He is a 20 year old who is just about to finish his bachelor's degree. He recently starred in a reality TV show in Rwanda about young entrepreneurship. And, he is the founder and CEO of Habona Ltd, a biogas and waste management plant.

Jean Bosco is everything that you look for in an entrepreneur: determined, smart, and hungry. He has assembled a team of local environmental scientists, biogas technicians, and business experts to make sure that his venture has the best chance of success. Last month, he was awarded a contract to manage the waste management plant in his home district of 300,000 people. With this contract, Jean Bosco has secured both the capital equipment and supply of biodegradable waste needed to produce bio-fertilizers for farming and biogas for cooking and lighting.

However, in order to successfully operate the waste management plant, Jean Bosco needs upfront working capital to purchase supplies and pay the salaries of his 15 employees.  Based on the agreed upon contract, the district will reimburse Jean Bosco for approximately 75% of his costs after he has proven that Habona can operate the waste management plant for three months.

A loan from Kiva for $5,100 will enable Jean Bosco to pay for initial supplies (uniforms, gloves, brushes, etc) and the salaries for his employees for the first three months.

Jean Bosco is one of AEC's most thoughtful, committed, and promising young entrepreneurs.  However, because of his age and the startup stage of his business, it will be nearly impossible for Jean Bosco to receive a loan from a financial institution in Rwanda.  AEC is proud to connect him with the wonderful network of Kiva lenders. Thank you!

(Note: the photos are of Jean Bosco at the waste management factory and at his rural home filming the reality TV series.)

loans.use: To use as working capital for a new waste management plant.

loans.name: Khurram

texts.ru: Хуррам живет в отдаленном регионе. Он женат. Его жена домохозяйка. Его дети уже совершеннолетние.  Хуррам с 1991 года занимается перевозкой грузов на своем грузовике. Хуррам перевозит грузы, местных жителей, в другие города и районы Таджикистана. Этим бизнесом он зарабатывает на жизнь и этим он вырастил своих детей. Хуррам имеет большой опыт и своих постоянных клиентов. Он хочет улучшить качество обслуживания и таким образом привлечь больше клиентов. Он запрашивает займ на сумму 5000 сомони для покупки нового грузовика. Он ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en: Khurram lives in a remote district. He is married. His wife is a homemaker. His children are already of age. Khurram has been involved in transporting commercial loads in his truck since 1991. Khurram transports loads and local residents to other cities and districts of Tajikistan. He earns a living with this business and raised his children with it. Khurram has a lot of experience and regular clients. He wants to improve the quality of service and, thus, attract more customers. He is requesting a loan in the amount of 5000 somoni to purchase a new truck. He awaits your kindness.

loans.use: to purchase a new truck

loans.name: Janisse Ibeth

texts.es:
Janisse es una joven emprendedora, tiene 21 años de edad, es soltero y vive en Parcona junto a su familia.
Actualmente está estudiando una carrera profesional porque tiene muchos deseos de superación.
Desde hace más de 2 años tiene una Bodega con la cual trabaja y con ello puede contribuir con algunos gastos familiares. Es una persona con muchas ganas de salir adelante, le va muy bien porque es trabajadora, responsable, y sobre todo amable y respetuosa con los clientes.
Janisse está agradecida con los prestamistas Kiva porque con el apoyo que le han brindado ella podrá comprar mercadería para surtir su negocio y de esta manera pueda ofrecer diversas variedades de productos a los clientes. Con esto ella podrá mejorar sus ventas, y seguirá esforzándose para más adelante poder cumplir su gran sueño: "Ser una gran profesional".
texts.en:
Janisse is an enterprising young woman. She is 21 years old, is single, and lives with her family in Parcona. She is currently studying in a professional career track because she really wants to better herself. Since over 2 years ago, she has had a store where she works and with it she can contribute some to the family expenses. 

She is someone who really wants to get ahead. She is doing very well because she is hardworking, responsible, and above all friendly and respectful of her clients.

Janisse is grateful to the Kiva lenders because with the support that they have given her she will be able to buy merchandise to stock her business, and that way she can offer several varieties of products to clients. That will allow her to improve her sales, and she will continue to work hard to later be able to achieve her big dream: "to be a great professional."

loans.use: to buy merchandise to stock her store.

loans.name: Gloria

texts.en:
Gloria works hard to support her family. She is married and has a fish-vending business in the Philippines.

Gloria requested a PHP 20,000 loan through Negros Women for Tomorrow Foundation, Inc. (NWTF) to purchase additional boxes of fish to sell in her fish stall.

Gloria has been in this business for 46 years now. She would like to save enough money to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional boxes of fish to sell in her fish stall.

loans.name: Gloria

texts.en:
Gloria is a widowed woman with six children. She is a very hard-working entrepreneur. Gloria is 45 years old and has three children who are currently in school.

Gloria has a buy-and-sell ready-to-wear business in the Philippines. She has requested a PHP 17,000 loan through Negros Women for Tomorrow Foundation, Inc. (NWTF) to buy more stocks of ready-to-wear to sell.

Gloria has been in this business for five years. In the future, she would like to save enough money, so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy more stocks of ready-to-wear to sell.

loans.name: Gupteswara Shg Group

texts.en:
Kousalya is a 28-year-old lady who lives with her husband and her two children in a small village in Odisha, India. In the picture, the lady standing third from the left is Kousalya. She is engaged in paddy cultivation. Her husband is doing the same business. 

Some years ago, Kousalya formed a group with nine other women from her village with the group name of "Gupteswara Shg" (self-help group). All the group members are engaged in different business activities, such as selling milk, vegetable cultivation, etc., to alleviate their poverty. Kousalya is the president of this group. She motivated all the group members to form this group so they could help and support each other in their businesses and personal lives. 

Kousalya, along with her group, requested a loan of 150,000 INR. She will use her portion to purchase standard-quality seeds and fertilizers for her paddy cultivation. 

She hopes to build a house for her family, and she is very grateful to Kiva for this opportunity.

loans.use: to purchase standard-quality seeds and fertilizers for her paddy cultivation.

loans.name: Muhabbat

texts.ru: Мухаббат родилась в 1982 году. Она добродушная и целеустремленная женщина. Мухаббат замужем и на воспитании имеет 4 детей. Ее дети несовершеннолетние.  Она очень заботливая мать для своих детей. Мухаббат 5 лет назад начала свой бизнес выращиванием сельхоз культур, так как она нуждалась в деньгах. Она в основном выращивает овощи и зерно. Полученный урожай она продает на местном рынке своего района. Ее муж помогает ей введению бизнеса. Также он является строителем. Мухаббат запрашивает займ на сумму 1700 сомони для покупки минерального удобрения для земли. Она ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en: Muhabbat was born in 1982. She is a kind and driven woman. Muhabbat is married and raising 4 children. Her children are all minors. She is a very caring mother to her children. Muhabbat started her own business of growing agricultural crops 5 years ago because she needed money. She primarily grows vegetables and grains. She sells the obtained harvest at a local market of her district. Her husband helps her with running this business. He is also a construction worker. Muhabbat is requesting a loan in the amount of 1700 somoni to purchase mineral fertilizers for soil. She awaits your kindness.

loans.use: to buy mineral fertilizers

loans.name: Zavra

texts.ru: Завра добросовестная женщина. Ей 58 лет. Она замужем и на воспитании имеет 5 детей. Двое из них несовершеннолетние. Завра 4 года назад начала свой бизнес выращиванием сельхоз культур как пшеница, арбуз, морковь и т.п. Она работает с раннего утра до позднего вечера для того, чтобы получить хороший урожай и продавать на местном рынке. Её муж и старшие дети помогают ей введению бизнеса.
