Этот бизнес является основным источником  семейного дохода. Она хочет сделать второй посев и с такой целью она запрашивает займ на сумму 2500 сомони для покупки семена и минерального удобрения. Она ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en: Zavra is a conscientious woman. She is 58 years old. She is married and raising 5 children, two of whom are minors. Zavra started her own business of growing agricultural crops, such as wheat, watermelons, carrots and the like, 4 years ago. She works from an early morning until late evening in order to obtain a good harvest and sell it at a local market. Her husband and older children help her with running this business. This business provides the primary income for the family. She wants to do a second sowing and, with this goal in mind, is requesting a loan in the amount of 2500 somoni to purchase seeds and mineral fertilizers. She awaits your kindness.

loans.use: to purchase seeds and mineral fertilizers

loans.name: Bibirukiya

texts.ru:
Бибирукия 1980 года рождения она замужем имеет 3 детей. Она занимается откормом скота у себя дома около 10 лет. Ее семья не имела большую прибыль поэтому она после окончания школы не смогла поступить в университет. Помогая родителям по откорму скота, через пару лет её выдали замуж, так она стала домохозяйкой. Но она не сидела сложа руки , она начала помогать по хозяйству, продавала молоко и продолжала в откорме скота.
 Но несмотря на трудности в жизни , Бибирукия полна радости и желания жить. Она обратилась в Арванд впервые, когда узнала, что есть возможность получить финансовую поддержку. Сама Бибирукия живёт в сельской местности.  Чтобы иметь доход на пропитание, Бибирукия занимается своим бизнесом. Она занимается откормом и продажей крупного рогатого скота. Она также продаёт молоко, полученное от скота. Сейчас Бибирукия хочет увеличить количество скота для расширения своего бизнеса. Поэтому она обратилась в Арванд и хочет получить кредит на покупку скота. Бибирукия очень надеется на положительный результат и заранее благодарит Арванд за поддержку.
texts.en:
Bibirukiya was born in 1980. She is married and has three children. She has been fattening cattle at home for about ten years. Her family did not have money, so after graduation she was not able to go to a university. She helped her parents fatten cattle, and within a couple of years she was married. Thus, she became a housewife. She did not sit idly. She began to help with the farm work and continued to sell milk and to fatten cattle. 

Despite the difficulties in life, Bibirukiya is full of joy and the desire to live. She appealed to the Arvand when she first learned that it is possible to get financial support. Bibirukiya lives in the countryside. Bibirukiya works in this business to have enough money for food. She works fattening and selling cattle. She also sells milk. Bibirukiya now wants to increase her herd and expand her business. She went to Arvand and wants to get a loan to buy cattle. Bibirukiya is hoping for a positive result, and thanks Arvand in advance for its support.

loans.use: buy cattle

loans.name: Mullai Shg Group

texts.en:
“Mullai” is a Self Help Group at Kandayankollai village, Tamil Nadu, which is under the local NGO, “People's Action for Transformation” (PAT). The group has been in existence for more than five years. The group consists of seven members. 

Chitra is the featured borrower. She is married to Mr. Saminatham, who is a farmer by profession. They have one child. The family is living in their own house. 

Now the group members need a loan to purchase a smokeless stove produced by Greenway Grameen Infra. This stove costs INR 1,400. 

Currently, these women are using mud stoves, which emit a lot of smoke, i.e. carbon dioxide, which is very harmful and can lead to lung diseases in the long run. Traditional stoves are time-consuming, as the women have to spend several productive hours per week collecting fuel or paying someone else to collect it. The inefficient use of the fuel causes a high time/monetary burden that is debilitating and unnecessary. 

These women hope these smokeless stoves will let them have a healthier life.

loans.use: to purchase a smokeless stove.

loans.name: Elena

texts.en:
Elena is a 54-year-old, married woman, with three children. She is a very hard-working entrepreneur. 

Elena has a food stall business in the Philippines. She has requested a PHP 40,000 loan through Negros Women for Tomorrow Foundation, Inc. (NWTF) in order to buy additional snack foods to sell.

Elena has been in this business for eight years. In the future, she would like to save enough money to expand her business and repair her family's home.

loans.use: to buy additional snack foods to sell.

loans.name: Mukaddas

texts.en:
Mukaddas was born in 1969. She is a kind and smart woman. She began her own business with animal husbandry after she married. Her husband is also a farmer. 

Mukaddas has been busy with animal husbandry for more than 15 years. Mainly, she feeds milk cows. She sells milk to local people. Mukaddas’s son helps her with managing the business. 

Mukaddas is going to increase working capital and, in this way, develop business and maximize profit. She is asking for a loan of TJS 10,000 (somoni) to buy a cow and feed for cattle. She awaits your support.

loans.use: to buy to buy a cow and feed for cattle.

loans.name: Casimily

texts.en:
Meet Casimily, a visionary farmer from Kisii. Casimily has been doing mixed farming for the last 12 years. He is particularly passionate about dairy farming. His main sources of income are milk, maize, nuts and tea.  Like any serious dairy farmer, Casimily takes animal health very seriously: He constantly worries about disease outbreaks. He checks up on his animals from time to time to ensure they are healthy and protected from common diseases.
  
Casimily is seeking a loan to purchase another dairy cow. The identified cow produces more than 10 liters of milk daily. Milk sold from this cow will provide Casimily with a significant amount of income on a daily basis. Money from the sales is enough to clear his loan obligation on time.  Casimily says the extra income he will generate will enable him to save enough money to buy better quality dairy cows. An increase in his personal income will enable him to take better care of his family financially, improve their diet and pay school fees.

loans.use: to purchase a dairy cow

loans.name: Jocelyn

texts.en: Jocelyn is a married woman with five children. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. Jocelyn is 45 years old and has four children who are currently in school. She has an accessories sales business in the Philippines. Jocelyn requested a PHP 10,000 loan amount through NWTF to purchase more materials like beads, nylon thread, wire, etc. for her business. She has been in this business for five years. In the future, Jocelyn would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase more materials for her business like beads, nylon thread, wire, etc.

loans.name: Lidia Catalina

texts.es:
Lidia es caracterizada como trabajadora, emprendedora y luchadora. A sus 60 años de edad, es madre soltera de tres hijos independientes de las edades de 37, 34 y 33 años, quienes sirven de apoyo en su venta de artículos plásticos como platos y vasos, desde hace 10 años en el mercado. Su única educación fue la primaria, pues su familia siempre ha tenido recursos económicos bajos que no le permitieron terminar con sus estudios. 
Lidia cuenta que siempre le ha gustado ser comerciante y se siente orgullosa de serlo y poder salir adelante con su propio esfuerzo, a pesar de no tener otros ingresos. Es por ello, que en estos momentos necesita de un préstamo para comprar más productos de plástico: vasos, platos, cubiertos y bolsas. De manera que pueda seguir creciendo, ser estable en su negocio y tener suficiente producto para sus clientes.
texts.en:
Lidia is characterized as hardworking, enterprising, and a fighter. At 60 years old, she is the single mother of three independent children, ages 37, 34, and 33, who support her in selling plastic items like plates and cups in the market, since 10 years ago. 

Her only education was primary school. Her family has always been low income, which did not allow her to finish her studies. Lidia says that she has always liked being a merchant and she is proud of being one and of being able to get ahead through her own efforts, despite not having other income.

That is why right now she needs a loan to buy more plastic products: cups, plates, utensils, and bags, so that she can keep growing, be stable in her business, and have enough product for her clients.

loans.use: to buy more plastic products: cups, plates, utensils, and bags.

loans.name: Jessie

texts.en: Jessie is a 36-year-old, married woman with three children who are in school. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur.  Jessie has a buy and sell multivitamins business in the Philippines. Jessie requested a PHP 15,000 loan amount through NWTF to purchase additional stocks of multivitamins to sell. She has been in this business for five years. In the future, Jessie would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase additional stocks of multivitamins to sell.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy cartons of fish

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy chicken,and cartons of fish

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy pepper and red oil to sell.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more gallons of palm oil to expand her business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more dishes

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more caustic (powdered soap) and palm oil for resale.

loans.name: Tanatswa Alice

texts.en:
Tanatswa is a 28-year-old mother of one, living in the Gokwe North District of Zimbabwe. 

She is currently operating a hardware store, where she sells gum poles, zinc sheets, and other roofing and building materials. She has been running the business for two years now. She started her business from a revolving fund she had with her friends in the community. She is a seasoned member of Cama, Camfed’s alumnae network, who is always volunteering her time in local schools, teaching life skills education. 

With the requested Kiva loan, she will purchase more gum poles and zinc sheets to improve her sales. Tanatswa will use the proceeds from the business to pay for her child’s school fees as well as further her education.

loans.use: to purchase more gum poles and zinc sheets to improve her sales.

loans.name: Melody

texts.en: Melody is a 26-year-old businesswoman. She lives in Gokwe North District, Zimbabwe, with her parents and siblings, where she has been successfully running a poultry project for over a year producing 100 birds every six weeks. With the requested Kiva loan, Melody would like to make bulk purchases of items that she needs for her poultry business so as to meet the demand of the community since she is the only person running this project in the vicinity. She intends to use the proceeds from the business to further her education.

loans.use: To buy poultry supplies in bulk to grow production.

loans.name: Swale

texts.en: Swale is a 37-year-old, married man with seven children, who lives in Bundibugyo, Uganda. He is determined to take good care of his family by working so hard in his cocoa plantation for eight hours a day. Cocoa selling has enabled him to meet his obligations as a family man. Although weather changes affect his production, he wishes to construct a good family house. Swale is requesting for a loan to buy more cocoa to sell.

loans.use: to buy more cocoa to sell.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more palm oil to expand her business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more bags of gari for resale.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more bags of gari for resale.

loans.name: María Angélica

texts.es:
María es una persona muy luchadora de 35 años de edad, no pudo terminar la escuela debido a la situación económica que vivía su familia, ella vive con dos hijos quienes actualmente se dedican a la pesca artesanal.


María se dedica a comercializar mariscos desde hace 7 años, decidió  realizar esta actividad, ya que en su lugar de residencia es muy común, y vive100 metros de la playa.



El crédito sera utilizado para comprar una lancha de fibra, la cual será el complemento para el apero de pesca que utiliza su hijo mayor. 

El sueño de María es tener las herramientas necesarias para poder enfrentar la vida, ganarse el pan diario honradamente y a futuro con las ganancias que obtengan, poder construir su vivienda para llevar una vida digna para ella y su hijo cuando decida formar su hogar.
texts.en:
Maria, 35 years old, is very much a fighter. She was not able to finish school due to the economic situation in which her family lived. She lives with two children, who currently make a living in traditional fishing. For 7 years, Maria has made a living selling seafood. She decided to do this work because it is very common where she lives and she lives 100 meters from the beach. 

The loan will be used to buy a fiberglass boat, which will go along with the fishing tackle that her oldest son uses. Maria's dream is to have the tools necessary to face life, earn her daily bread honorably, and in the future, with the earnings that they obtain, be able to build her home for her to lead a decent life and for her son when he decides to have a family.

loans.use: to buy a fiberglass boat, which will go along with the fishing tackle that her oldest son uses.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more milk, sugar, and cartons of  cornflakes to expand her business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more assorted drinks and Pure Water for resale.

loans.name: Sadullo

texts.ru:
Садулло жизнерадостный и трудолюбивый мужчина  в возрасте 40  лет. Он женат и имеет 4-х детей. Он обратился в Арванд впервые, когда узнал, что есть возможность получить финансовую поддержку.  Сам Саъдулло живёт со своей семьёй в сельской местности. У него среднее техническое образование. Жена Саъдулло не имеет образования и является домохозяйкой, она занимается домашними делами и воспитанием детей.

Чтобы иметь доход на пропитание, Саъдулло занимается своим бизнесом. Он занимается откормом и продажей крупного рогатого скота. От данного дела он получает хороший доход. Жена также помогает Саъдулло в его деле, она продаёт молоко, полученное от скота.  Сейчас Саъдулло хочет увеличить количество скота для расширения своего бизнеса. Поэтому он обратился в Арванд и хочет получить кредит на покупку скота. Саъдулло очень надеется на положительный результат и заранее благодарит Арванд за поддержку.
texts.en:
Sadullo is a happy and hardworking 40-year-old man. He is married and has 4 children. He came to Arvand for the first time after learning about an opportunity to obtain financial support. Sadullo lives with his family in a rural area. He has a secondary, technical education. Sadullo's wife does not have an education and is a homemaker, involved in household work and raising the children.

Sadullo is involved in his own business to have an income for living. He is involved in fattening up and selling cattle and earns a good income from this business. His wife also helps Sadullo with the business by selling milk, obtained from cows. Now Sadullo wants to increase the quantity of livestock in order to expand his business. This is why he came to Arvand and wants to obtain a loan to buy livestock. Sadullo hopes very much for a positive result and thanks Arvand for the support in advance.

loans.use: to buy cattle in order to expand his business

loans.name: Santa Teresita Group

texts.es:
Las 15 integrantes de este grupo son mujeres muy trabajadoras y luchadoras, cada una se destaca por la entrega que hacen por ir mejorando.
La señora Aida es una de las integrantes del comité, ella trabaja en la venta de prendas varias, donde tiene todo tipo de prendas. Ella con el préstamo quiere comprar ropas ya que la misma tiene una pequeña tienda de ropas.
Ellas están contentas por la oportunidad que están recibiendo, ya que por medio de este trabajo podrán luchar y ayudar a sus familias.
texts.en:
The 15 members of this group are very hard-working and determined women. Each one stands out for the dedication that they make to improve.

Aida is one of the members of the communal bank. She works selling various types of garments, where she has all kinds of clothes. She wants to buy clothes with this loan since she has a small clothing store.

The women are happy for the opportunity they are receiving, thanks to this work they will be able to fight and help their families.

loans.use: to purchase various garments to sell.

loans.name: Victor Manuel

texts.es: Víctor de 40 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposa, se dedica a la carpintería hace camas, jugueteras, etc.  con lo que trabaja logra solventar las necesidades de su hogar, Victor solicita un crédito para la compra de  madera, laurel, junco, barniz, sellador, tabla y costanera, etc. Para darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Victor is 40 years old and lives in his own house with his wife. He works as a carpenter making beds, shelving for home entertainment centers, etc. He is able to afford his household necessities through his work.

Victor is requesting a loan to buy wood, bay leaves, reeds, varnish, sealer, plywood and purlin, etc., to give his family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy wood, bay leaves, reeds, varnish, sealer, plywood and purlin, etc.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a laptop.

loans.name: Jiguisseme  Ii Group

texts.fr: Les membres du groupe JIGUISSEME II  sont des femmes mariées  ayant une moyenne d’âge de  33 ans, 3 enfants et vivant toutes dans des  familles polygames à KADIANA, commune de KADIANA, cercle de KOLONDIEBA, une des préfectures de la  3ème région administrative du Mali. Elles collaborent avec l’institution de microfinance Soro Yiriwaso afin de mener à bien leurs activités agricoles pendant l’hivernage. Elles sont à leur sixième prêt avec l’institution, les prêts passés ont été bien remboursés. La spéculation cultivée est  le riz et l’arachide avec BAKADIA  1ère personne debout à droite sur la photo de la droite à la gauche. Avec son prêt, elle compte acheter des intrants, la semence et payer les frais de labours pour exploiter  4 hectares. La production est vendue au niveau de  KADIANA après la récolte à une clientèle composée d’hommes et de femmes. Elle envisage avoir un  bénéfice  de 195.000FCFA qui lui permettra de payer son prêt et aussi d’aider son mari dans les dépenses quotidiennes.
texts.en:
The members of the group JIGUISSEME II are married women, who average 33 years of age and three children each, all living in polygamous families in KADIANA, Commune de KADIANA, Cercle de KOLONDIEBA, one of the prefectures of the 3rd administrative region of the Republic of Mali. The women are collaborating with the microfinance institution Soro Yiriwaso to carry out their farm work during the rainy season. They are on their sixth loan with the institution. The past loans were indeed paid back. 

The crops grown are rice and peanuts, as is the case with BAKADIA (first person standing at the right in the photo). With her loan, she intends to purchase farm inputs and seeds and to pay for plowing to make use of 4 hectares. After harvest, the produce is sold to a customer base composed of men and women in KADIANA.

She envisions obtaining a profit of 195,000 francs CFA enabling her to pay back her loan and also to help out her husband in covering day-to-day expenses.

loans.use: to buy farm inputs and seeds and to cover the cost of plowing

loans.name: Lolita

texts.en: Lolita is 47 years old and single. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to buy additional items like snack foods, canned goods, soft drinks, cooking oil, candies, etc. to sell. Lolita has been in this business for eight years and sells a variety of items such as snack foods, canned goods, soft drinks, cooking oil, candies, etc.  In the future, Lolita would like to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy additional items like snack foods, canned goods, soft drinks, cooking oil, candies, etc. to sell.

loans.name: Mamurjon

texts.ru:
Мамурчон веселый молодой парень в возрасте 22 лет. Он женат и живет со своей женой у родителей в районе Рудаки. У него имеется среднее специальное образование, а у его жены среднее образование. Мамурчон также помогает своим родителям финансово.
 
Мамурчон занимается своим любимым делом. У него имеется несколько голов скота, за которым он ухаживает и это его единственный доход на пропитание. Его молодая жена также помогает Мамурчону. Она продает молоко, полученное от скота.  Мамурчон  намерен увеличить количество своего скота. Поэтому он обратился в Арванд за кредитом, чтобы купить скот. Заранее благодарит Арванд за поддержку он надеется на положительный результат.
texts.en:
Mamurjon is a young and happy 22-year-old man. He is married and lives with his wife and his parents in the Rudaki district. He has a secondary, specialized education, and his wife has a secondary education. Mamurjon also financially helps his parents.

Mamurjon is involved in his favorite business. He has several heads of livestock that he cares for, and this is his sole source of income for living. His young wife also helps Mamurjon. She sells milk, obtained from the livestock. Mamurjon intends to increase the quantity of his livestock. This is why he came to Arvand for a loan to buy livestock. He thanks Arvand in advance for the support and hopes for a positive result.

loans.use: to buy cattle

loans.name: Aura Del Carmen

texts.es:
Hace 21 años, Aura del Carmen estaba embarazada de su último hijo de 8 años de edad. Motivada por este, comenzó a trabajar más duro vendiendo comida en su casa, para ahorrar e iniciar con un negocio más grande, a pesar de haber solo concluido su primaria. Ahora, a sus 60 años, cumple la segunda década de haber empezado su pulpería, junto con su pareja y el apoyo moral y económico de sus hijos. Poco a poco fue creciendo solicitando préstamos comerciales, hasta llegar hasta donde está.
Las expectativas de Aura siempre han sido y seguirán siendo el crecimiento profesional como persona, por lo que piensa seguir trabajando arduamente para continuar con su negocio. Por esta razón, necesita de un préstamo para comprar más mercadería: jugos, pastas, maseca, gaseosas, huevos, entre otros productos para incrementar sus productos y ofrecerles un mejor servicio a sus clientes. Entre sus planes principales está seguir junto a su familia el negocio prospero. De igual manera ahorrar para tener un futuro estable.
texts.en:
Twenty-one years ago, Aura del Carmen was pregnant with her last son, who is 8 years old. Motivated by this, she began working harder selling food from her home, in order to save and start with a larger business, despite only having finished primary school.  Now 60, she is in her second decade from starting her convenience store, with her husband and the moral support and economic support of her children.

Aura's hopes have always been and will continue to be personal professional growth, for which she plans to continue working hard to carry on with her business. For this reason, she needs a loan to purchase more merchandise: juices, pastries, corn flour, soft drinks, and eggs among other products to increase her products and offer her customers better service.  Among her principal plans are to continue, alongside her family, this prosperous business.  Equally, she wants to save in order to have a stable future.

loans.use: to purchase juices, pastries, corn flour, soft drinks, and eggs among other products.

loans.name: Merlyn

texts.en:
Merlyn is married and works hard to support her family. Merlyn has a business buying and selling coconut fruit in the Philippines.

Merlyn requested a PHP 18,000 loan through NWTF to buy more coconut fruit to sell.

Merlyn has been in this business for 15 years.

Merlyn would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy more coconut fruit to sell

loans.name: Víctor Manuel

texts.es: Víctor Manuel, tiene la edad  de 59 años, está soltero,  vive con su hermano y se ayudan mutuamente. Con su crédito pretende hacer la compra  semilla de maíz de buena calidad y geminación y de fertilizantes y otros productos para aplicarle a la siembra, además pagar mano de obra para la aplicación de los productos y asistencia de la plantación una vez que tenga desarrollo, y de esta manera asegurarse de realizar un buen trabajo. Lo que pretende es aprovechar las buenas condiciones de clima y suelo que cuenta la zona para este cultivo, y también poner en práctica la experiencia de varios años en el manejo de granos básicos. Además de poder comprar los mejores productos y de mejor calidad para que su plantación tenga un buen desarrollo y sanidad al igual que una cosecha adecuada, y tener a corto plazo una producción importante. Con el ingreso de la cosecha que espera obtener quiere utilizarla en el bienestar y estudio de su familia y cumplir con algunas metas familiares y seguir invirtiendo más en los cultivos. Es el primer  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. Él no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en:
Victor Manuel is 59 years old and single. He lives with his brother, and they help support each other. With his loan he intends to purchase high quality corn seed, germination, fertilizers, and other products to plant his harvest. Additionally, he will pay labor costs for planting and assistance with the crops, which will ensure a successful harvest.  He aims to take advantage of the good climate and soil conditions in his area, and also to put in practice several years experience in handling basic grains. He wants to be able to buy the best products of the highest quality so that his harvest comes out well and healthy.

He plans on using the expected income from the harvest for the well-being and education of his family, to meet some family goals, and to continue to invest more in crops. This is the first loan he is receiving from FUDECOSUR. He has not been able to have any previous loans through state banks, but FUDECOSUR has been able to offer loans with better access and much lower interest rates.

loans.use: to purchase high quality corn seed, germination, and fertilizers for his harvest

loans.name: Fredy Anibar

texts.es:
Fredy tiene 36 años de edad, es un señor muy trabajador, solamente fue hasta primer grado, ya que por motivo que vivió el país con el conflicto armado él ya no pudo seguir estudiando,  está soltero y vive con sus padres. 

Fredy se dedica a la agricultura, también al cuido de ganado, tiene mucha experiencia en esta actividad ,  pues la realiza desde hace más de diez años, junto a sus hermanos y su padre trabajan en el campo.

El crédito lo necesita para comprar una vaca  ya que se la venden a buen precio y quiere aprovechar la oportunidad. 

Sueña con que él y su familia tengan lo necesario para sobrevivir, y también casarse para formar una familia pero primero está construyendo su propia casa.
texts.en:
Fredy is 36 years old. He is a very hardworking man who only went to the first grade because he lived while the country was under armed conflict and he was not able to continue studying. He is single and lives with his parents.

Fredy is a farmer and he also cares for cattle. He has had a lot of experience at these jobs because he has been doing them for over ten years. Together with his brothers and father he works in the fields.

He needs a loan to purchase a cow because they sell at a good price and he wants to take advantage of the opportunity.

He dreams that he and his family will have what they need to survive and also that he will get married and form a family. First, however, he is building his own house.

loans.use: to purchase a cow.

loans.name: Silvina

texts.en: A 600 USD loan is offered to Silvina to improve her business. Silvina opened her garden in 2009 with her own work. She will use the loan to purchase machetes,and to pay for the clean up the garden.   Silvina is generating a good income from selling. She has been thinking of running a big business after years of involving herself in doing business.  Silvina is living in a town with her family.

loans.use: to purchase machetes, and to pay for the clean up the garden.

loans.name: Ana Patricia

texts.es:
Ana tiene 31 años de edad,  estudió hasta 6º grado; vive junto a su esposo y sus 3 hijos los cuales por su corta edad aun no le ayudan en los trabajos que ella realiza.


Ana tiene aproximadamente 6 años de dedicarse a vender a tol de maíz por las mañanas, ella sale a venderlo a todas las casas de la comunidad donde vive, este trabajo viene de generación en generación en la familia de Ana, y tiene que levantarse todos los días a las 3:00 am. para preparar la venta.

Ella necesita este crédito para cambiar el material del techo de su casa, ya que se encuentra muy dañado, también construirá un pequeño muro de cemento alrededor de su casa para evitar filtraciones de agua en el invierno.


Ana tiene como prioridad mejorar su vivienda para tener mayor seguridad, pues no quiere que su familia viva en una casa que sea un riesgo en el diario vivir.
texts.en:
Ana is 31 years old. She studied up until 6th grade. She lives with her husband and her 3 children who, because they are young, do not yet help her with her work. For approximately 6 years Ana has made a living selling a thick, corn-based warm drink in the mornings. She goes out to sell it to all the houses in the community where she lives. This work has been in Ana's family for generations, and she has to get up every day at 3 a.m. to make what she sells.

She needs this loan to change the roofing material on her house, because it is very damaged. She will also build a small cement wall around her house to stop water from leaking in during the winter. Ana's priority is to improve her housing to have better safety. She does not want her family to live in a house that poses a threat to daily living.

loans.use: to change the roofing material on her house.

loans.name: Humberto

texts.es:
Humberto de 38 años de edad, es agricultor, estudio hasta quinto grado,  debido a los bajos recursos económicos que vivía junto a sus padres, está casado y tiene 6 hijos, su pareja se dedica a los oficios domésticos.

Humberto se dedica a la agricultura desde hace 25 años aproximadamente, trabajo que le enseño su padre después que dejó su estudio, a él se le hace difícil conseguir otro trabajo debido al nivel académico que tiene y es por eso que la agricultura es su fuente de ingreso, su esposa es quien le ayuda mucho en este trabajo, ambos se levantan muy temprano para hacer las tareas del hogar y luego se disponen  a irse para el campo a trabajar en la agricultura. 

Utilizará el préstamo para la compra de insumos agrícolas tales como: sulfato,  abono, formula, veneno para la plaga, entre otros que serán los que le ayudaran a obtener mejores resultados en la cosecha.

El sueño a un futuro es ayudarle a sus hijos en el estudio, para que sea un profesionales y tenga mayores oportunidades de trabajo, asi mismo mejorar la calidad de vida para su familia ya que son de muy bajos recursos económicos.

No entiendo donde aparece los $425, solo menciona $420
texts.en:
Humberto is a 38-year-old farmer who studied until the fifth grade, due to limited resources when living with his parents. He is married, has six children and his wife is a homemaker.

Humberto has been working as a farmer for approximately 25 years, a job that his father taught him when he left school. It is difficult for him to find other work, because of his level of education and that is why farming is his source of income. His wife helps him a lot with work, they both get up very early to do the housework and afterwards they get ready to go to the countryside for farming.

He will use the loan to buy farming supplies such as: sulfate, manure, fertilizer and pest control, among other items that will be helpful in achieving better results with the crop.

His dream for the future is to help his children with school, so they become successful and have better work opportunities, this way he will improve his family's quality of life since they are a low-income family.

loans.use: to buy sulfate, manure, fertilizer and pest control, among other items.

loans.name: Aracely Concepción

texts.es:
Aracely tiene 23 años de edad, estudió hasta bachillerato, está casada y su esposo trabaja como empleado, tienen un hijo de un año el cual lo cuida su abuela.


Aracely trabaja como cajera de un banco, ella decidió buscar trabajo debido a la necesidad de darle lo 
necesario a su hijo, no tiene que ir muy lejos ya que el trabajo le queda cerca de su casa.
 
El préstamo lo necesita para cancelar una factura de energia electrica de su casa.

El sueño de Aracely es siempre darle lo mejor a su hijo, verlo crecer y seguir trabajando con CrediCampo.
texts.en:
Aracely is 23 years old and has completed high school. She is married and her husband is employed. They have a one-year-old child care for by the grandmother. Aracely works as a bank teller. She decided to look for work given the need to provide for her child. She does not have to go very far since the job is near her home. 
She needs the loan pay off the energy bill for her house. Aracely's dream is to always give the best to her child, watch him grow, and continue working with Credi Campo.

loans.use: to pay off the energy bill for her house

loans.name: Ly

texts.en:
Ly, 50 years old, lives in a remote area of Bateay District, Kampong Cham Province, Cambodia. He is a father of three children who are enrolled in school. To make a living, he works as a farmer with his wife in a small rice field, which is located near his house.  So far, it is about 30 years that he has been involved in this farming business, which can earn a net profit of USD 4 per day.

Ly had loan from HKL one time already, but this time he would like to get another loan from KIVA since it has a lower interest rate. He is going to use this loan to buy rice seeds for his farming business this year. He would like to thank lenders for the financial support via HKL, which provides him with a much lower interest rate than a general loan product.

loans.use: to buy rice seeds for his farm business.

loans.name: Kuña Aty Group

texts.es:
El grupo se llama Kuña Aty está en el 1er ciclo, es un grupo nuevo que tiene muchas expectativas de poder superarse y salir adelante por medio de la actividad grupal.
Nancy integra este grupo, ella es una mujer muy trabajadora, que con sacrificio y esfuerzo está saliendo adelante, sumado a la venta de minutas que hace y que ella misma luego sale a vender. Comenta que este préstamo que pide le será de mucha ayuda ya que podrá comprar insumos para usar en sus comidas, como ser carne, condimentos, aderezos, panificados y demás. Agradece por esta oportunidad que recibe.
texts.en:
The group is called Kuña Aty and it is in its first loan cycle. It is a new group that has many expectations of being able to better themselves and move forward by means of the group's activities. 

Nancy is a part of this group. She is a very hardworking woman who with sacrifice and effort, is getting ahead...together with the sale of cooked snacks that she makes and that she goes out and sells herself. 

She says that this loan that she requests will be of a lot of help to her since she will be able to buy ingredients to use in her food, such as meat, condiments, seasonings, baked goods, and so on. She is grateful for this opportunity that she has been given.

loans.use: to buy meat, condiments, seasonings, baked goods and so on.

loans.name: Cyber Sau Group

texts.es: Saraina: Es una mujer, trabajadora, luchadora, originaria de Waspam, tiene 50 años de edad, casada tiene 7 hijos. Cuenta con una experiencia de más de dos décadas de ser docente. Es la coordinadora del banco comunal Cyber Sau, integrado por 10 mujeres emprendedoras y un hombre luchador, que lo conformaron hace 3 años. 9 integrantes solicitan financiamiento para mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia, vivir de manera segura y digna a través de ir mejorando sus viviendas de tambo de madera, comprar  materiales de construcción, clavos, zinc, madera rustica y cepillada, cubrir costos de mano de obra y dos de las integrantes (Inés y María Azucena) solicitan financiamiento para comprar mercadería para su negocio: ropa usada y pulpería respectivamente e incrementar el inventario de sus productos.  A nivel general el sueño de las 11 integrantes es tener una vivienda con las condiciones adecuadas para su familia y apoyar al desarrollo profesional de sus hijos.
texts.en:
Saraina is a hardworking and a fighter. She's a native of Waspam and is 50 years old and married with seven children.

She has over two decades of experience being a teacher. She's the coordinator of the Cyber Sau communal bank, made up of 10 entrepreneurial women and one struggling man, all who joined three years ago. 

9 members are requesting funding in order to buy nails, zinc, sawn and planed lumber, and to cover labor costs, to improve their quality of life and that of their family and live in a secure and dignified manner through improving their wood homes.

Two of the members, Inés y María Azucena, are seeking financing to buy merchandise for their business: used clothing and a grocery store, respectively - to increase their product inventories. The dream of all of the 11 members is to have a house with adequate conditions for their families and support the professional development of their children.

loans.use: to buy building materials, nails, zinc, sawn and planed lumber, and to cover labor costs.

loans.name: Dolgorsuren

texts.en: Mrs. Dolgorsuren, 36 years old, lives with her husband and son in Ulaanbaatar, capital city of Mongolia. She has been working as an assistant of fuel dispenser since 2005.  Her husband is a craftsman who makes items with stones at a private firm. She is requesting a loan of 4,000,000 MNT to buy building materials such as bricks, cement, fiberglass and foam for house renovation. After renovation, her family will live in comfortable and warm place where less coal is burned and then less pollutants are released into air.

loans.use: to buy building materials

loans.name: Catalinas Group

texts.en: The Friendship Bridge Trust Bank “Catalinas” is a group of eight charismatic and motivated women with different loan cycles. The women are still very connected to their roots.  Along with the traditional blue guipiles (blouses) they wear, the women joke in Kaqchikel (one of the many indigenous languages in the area), and cook on an adobe (wood-fired stove).  From these roots, the women move forward to create successful businesses in weaving, artesan products, and small shops. From the generous loans funded by Kiva investors, these women believe that they will be able to advance these businesses and watch them prosper. Magdelena is one of the original members of the Catalinas Trust Bank. Magdalena is starting another loan cycle and has increased her credit throughout the cycles. She sells typical artisan goods, such as blankets, tablecloths, clothes, and more. In order to sell these items, Magdalena requested a new loan to buy various threads for weaving the traditional artisan goods. Magdalena’s success has helped her to send her children to school. Although she cannot read or write, she feels that the opportunity provided through Friendship Bridge will help her to create a better life for each of her five children.  The women are in good spirits as the meeting begins. It is clear that they are close friends and depend on each other for support. Despite this closeness, they each come from a different past in which they have overcome many obstacles. Not a single one of the members attended school as a child. With an average of five children, the women hope to change this statistic in the next generation. Magadalena, along with the other seven members of the group, believe that Friendship Bridge has provided them with an opportunity that they would not have had without them. The eight women are thankful to have this opportunity and are eager to thank their Kiva lenders, who are amazing and grateful people around the world who believe and support their group.

loans.use: to buy various threads for weaving the traditional artisan goods

loans.name: Mavjuda

texts.ru:
Эту девушку зовут Мавчуда. Ей 29 лет. Она живет в не большом городе Турсунзаде. Турсунзаде известен богатой историей, культурой и традициями. Мавчуда в Турсунзаде живет с родителями и братом. Она дома занимается шитьем женской одежды. Научилась шить Мавчуда в специальной школе. Мавчуда использует все навыки которым обучилась на деле. Ей нравиться работать в этой сфере деятельности и хочет продолжать развиваться в этом направлении. 
   Мавчуда сейчас нуждается в кредите. Она хочет купить новую швейную машинку, потому что иная совсем устарела. Но к сожалению ей не хватает определенной суммы денег, для реализации покупки. Поддержите Мавчуду
texts.en:
This young woman is called Mavjuda. She is 29 years old. She lives in the small town of Khujand. Khujand is famous for it's rich history, culture and traditions. Mavjuda lives with her parents and brother in Khujand. She sews women's clothing at her home. She learnt to sew in vocational school. 

Mavjuda uses all the skills she has been trained in. She likes to work in this area of business, and would like to continue developing in this direction. Mavjuda currently needs a loan. She would like to purchase a new sewing machine, because the one she currently has is quite outdated. Unfortunately she does not have enough money to do the purchase. Please support Mavjuda.

loans.use: to purchase a sewing machine

loans.name: Jiguisseme A Group

texts.fr: Les membres du groupe JIGUISSEME A  sont des femmes mariées  ayant une moyenne d’âge de  42 ans, 7 enfants et vivant toutes dans des  familles polygames à KADIANA VILLE, commune de KADIANA, cercle de KOLONDIEBA, une des préfectures de la  3ème région administrative du Mali. Elles collaborent avec l’institution de microfinance Soro Yiriwaso afin de mener à bien leurs activités agricoles pendant l’hivernage. Elles sont à leur septième prêt avec l’institution, les prêts passés ont été bien remboursés. La spéculation cultivée est  le riz et l’arachide  avec MAIMOUNA  1ère personne deboute à droite sur la photo. Avec son prêt, elle compte acheter des intrants, la semence et payer les frais de labours pour exploiter  4 hectares. La production est vendue au niveau de  KADIANA après la récolte à une clientèle composée d’hommes et de femmes. Elle compte avoir un bénéfice de 190.000FCFA qui lui permettra de payer son prêt et aussi d’aider son mari dans les dépenses quotidiennes.
texts.en:
The members of group Jiguisseme A are married women; they are on average 42 years old with seven children. They all live in polygamous families in the city of Kadiana, in Kadiana Township, Kolondieba circle (one of the prefectures of Mali’s third administrative region). These women collaborate with micro-finance institution Soro Yiriwaso to farm their land in the rainy season. This is their seventh loan with the organization: all previous loans were paid back without problems.

The cultivated species are rice and ground nuts for Maimouna, the first person standing from the right in the photo. With her loan, she is planning on buying fertilizers and seeds, as well as pay for the plowing of 10 acres of land. The production is sold in Kadiana after the harvest. Her clientele includes men and women.

She is forecasting a profit of 190,000 XOF, which will allow her to pay back her loan and to help her husband with the household’s daily expenses.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and seeds as well as pay for plowing.

loans.name: Chadi

texts.en:
Chadi is a 25-year-old single man who started working as a blacksmith. He began working 10 years ago to support his family after he quit attending elementary school. 

Chadi is working hard to develop his own business, but his income isn't large enough to invest in expanding his business properly.

For this reason, he acquired a youth loan from Kiva’s field partner, Al Majmoua, to expand his business. His acquired loan will be used to buy and upgrade his business equipment and tools which will improve his quality of work and increases his profits in the future.

loans.use: to buy and upgrade his business equipment and tools

loans.name: Jiguisseme B Group

texts.fr: Les membres du groupe JIGUISSEME B  sont des femmes mariées  ayant une moyenne d’âge de  48 ans, 7 enfants et vivant toutes dans des  familles polygames à KADIANA VILLE, commune de KADIANA, cercle de KOLONDIEBA, une des préfectures de la  3ème région administrative du Mali. Elles collaborent avec l’institution de microfinance Soro Yiriwaso afin de mener à bien leurs activités agricoles pendant l’hivernage. Elles sont à leur dixième prêt avec l’institution, les prêts passés ont été bien remboursés. La spéculation cultivée est  le riz et l’arachide  avec WASSA 1ère personne debout à droite sur la photo. Avec son prêt, elle compte acheter des intrants, la semence et payer les frais de labours pour exploiter  4 hectares. La production est vendue au niveau de  KADIANA après la récolte à une clientèle composée d’hommes et de femmes. Elle compte réaliser un bénéfice de 195.000FCFA qui lui permettra de payer son prêt et aussi d’aider son mari dans les dépenses quotidiennes.
texts.en:
The members of group Jiguisseme B are married women; they are on average 48 years old with seven children. They all live in polygamous families in the city of Kadiana, in Kadiana Township, Kolondieba circle (one of the prefectures of Mali’s third administrative region). These women collaborate with micro-finance institution Soro Yiriwaso to farm their land in the rainy season. This is their tenth loan with the organization: all previous loans were paid back without problems.

The cultivated species are rice and ground nuts for Wassa, the first person standing from the right in the photo. With her loan, she is planning on buying fertilizers and seeds, as well as pay for the plowing of 10 acres of land. The production is sold in Kadiana after the harvest. Her clientele includes men and women.

She is forecasting a profit of 195,000 XOF, which will allow her to pay back her loan and to help her husband with the household’s daily expenses.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and seeds as well as pay plowing expenses during farming season.

loans.name: Bonifacia

texts.es:
La señora Bonifacia tiene 44 años es comerciante hace aproximadamente 5 años, en su casa tiene una Fábrica de Panificados, Despensa y Carnicería. Está casado con el señor Víctor hace más de 24 años con quien tiene 3 hijos.
Ella empezó desde muy abajo, tuvieron que viajar a otro país y trabajar durante 8 años dejando a su familia para buscarle un mejor futuro, hace 5 años volvieron a Paraguay  y con la plata que juntaron pudieron habilitar para su propio negocio. Esta es una pareja muy trabajadora y por sobre todo muy sacrificada.
La Sra. Bonifacia pide este préstamo para poder invertirlo en la compra de harina en cantidad, ya que de esa forma podrá surtir su panadería y seguir trabajando como lo viene haciendo.
texts.en:
Bonifacia is a 44-year-old woman who has been a shopkeeper for approximately five years. She has a store with baked goods, pantry items and a butcher shop. She has been married to her husband Victor for more than 24 years and they have three children together.

She started from the bottom, and they had to travel to another country to work for eight years, leaving behind their family in search of a better future. Five years ago they returned to Paraguay and with the money they put together, they were able to set up their own store. This couple is very hard-working and above all, very selfless.

Bonifacia is requesting this loan to be able to buy flour in bulk, since this will allow her to stock her bakery and continue working as she has been.

loans.use: to buy flour for her bakery.

loans.name: Benkadi I Group

texts.fr: Les membres du groupe  BENKADI I  sont des femmes mariées  ayant une moyenne d’âge de  36 ans, 4 enfants et vivant toutes dans des  familles polygames à SIKORO, commune de KADIANA, cercle de KOLONDIEBA, une des préfectures de la  3ème région administrative du Mali. Elles collaborent avec l’institution de microfinance Soro Yiriwaso afin de mener à bien leurs activités agricoles pendant l’hivernage. Elles sont à leur neuvième prêt avec l’institution, les prêts passés ont été bien remboursés. La spéculation cultivée est  le riz et l’arachide  avec ADJA 3ème personne debout au milieu sur la photo. Avec son prêt, elle compte acheter des intrants, la semence et payer les frais de labours pour exploiter  2,5 hectares. La production est vendue au niveau de  KADIANA après la récolte à une clientèle composée d’hommes et de femmes. ADJA compte réaliser un bénéfice de 140.000fcfa qui lui permettra de payer son prêt et aussi d’aider son mari dans les dépenses quotidiennes.
texts.en:
The members of group Benkadi I are married women; they are on average 36 years old with four children. They all live in polygamous families in the city of Sikoro, in Kadiana Township, Kolondieba circle (one of the prefectures of Mali’s third administrative region). These women collaborate with micro-finance institution Soro Yiriwaso to farm their land in the rainy season. This is their ninth loan with the organization: all previous loans were paid back without problems.

The cultivated species are rice and ground nuts for Adja, the third person standing, in the middle in the photo. With her loan, she is planning on buying fertilizers and seeds, as well as pay for the plowing of six acres of land. The production is sold in Kadiana after the harvest. Her clientele includes men and women.

Adja is forecasting a profit of 140,000 XOF, which will allow her to pay back her loan and to help her husband with the household’s daily expenses.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and seeds and pay plowing expenses during the farming season.

loans.name: Fotima

texts.ru: Фотима добросовестная женщина. Она замужем, но не имеет детей. Фотима более 21 года занимается купле продажей детской одежды. Фотима на местном имеет свою точку продажи. Она очень общительная женщина и она делает индивидуальный подход каждому покупателю. Фотима каждый сезон обновляет ассортимент своего товара и таким образом она привлекает покупателей. Фотима запрашивает займ на сумму 5000 сомони для покупки детской одежды. Она ждет вашу доброту и надеется на ваше милосердие.
texts.en:
Fotima is a conscientious woman. She is married, but does not have any children. Fotima has worked with trading children's clothing for more than 21 years. She has her own sales point in the local area. She is a sociable woman and she takes an individual approach to every customer. 

Each season, Fotima changes the assortment of goods, and this way attracts customers. She requests a loan in the amount of 5,000 TJS to purchase children's clothing. She awaits your kindness and hopes for your charity.

loans.use: to purchase children's clothing for selling in the new season

loans.name: Juan Carlos

texts.es: Juan tiene 44 años de edad y habita en casa propia junto a su compañera de vida y sus tres hijos de 8 años, 10 años y 5 años de edad. Juan es agricultor y de esta forma ha logrado sacar adelante a su familia. Juan solicita este crédito a FUSAI para  comprar los materiales necesarios como arena, cemento y grava para pavimentar el piso de la casa. Espera contar con este financiamiento dado que no posee los recursos económicos para hacerlo por su cuenta.
texts.en:
Juan is 44 years old and resides in his own home along with his life companion and their three children (ages 8, 10, and 5). He works as a farmer in order to help his family get ahead.

Juan is requesting this loan from FUSAI in order to buy needed materials such as sand, cement, and gravel so that he can pave the floor of his house. He hopes to receive this loan since he does not have the financial resources to do this himself.

loans.use: to buy sand, cement, and gravel in order to pave the floor of his house.

loans.name: Bahrigul

texts.ru: Бахригул родилась в 1960 году. Она добрая и честная женщина. Бахригул вместе со своей семьёй живет на юге Таджикистана. Она имеет одного сына. Бахригул более 7 лет занимается выращиванием сельхоз культур как арбуз, морковь, лук и т.п. Бахригул имеет хорошие условия для выращивания сельхоз культур и развития данного сектора бизнеса, так как она живет в аграрном районе. Ее сын помогает ей введению бизнеса. Бахригул должна сделать второй посев и поэтому она запрашивает займ на сумму 2000 сомони для покупки семена. Она ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en: Bahrigul was born in 1960, and is a kind and honest woman.  Bahrigul lives with her family in southern Tajikistan.  She has one son.  For more than 7 years Bahrigul has been raising crops like watermelons, carrots, onions,  and so on.  Because Bahrigul lives in an agricultural region, she has a good set up for raising crops and for developing this sector of her business.  Her sons helps her to run her business.  Bahrigul needs to do a second planting, and thus is requesting a loan of 2000 TJS to purchase seeds.  She awaits your kindness.

loans.use: To buy seeds

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase merchandise to stock her business and to make repairs on her house for the winter season.

loans.name: Falconeri

texts.en:
Falconeri is married and works hard to support her family.

She has a general store business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from pig fattening.  

Falconeri is borrowing 29,000 PHP through Negros Women for Tomorrow Foundation, Inc. (NWTF) in order to purchase more groceries to sell for her general store business.

She has been sustaining her business activities through her past 11 loans from NWTF and more recently, through Kiva. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream of saving enough money to expand her business and repair her family's home.

loans.use: to purchase more groceries to sell.

loans.name: Rodelia

texts.en: Rodelia is married and she works hard to support her family. She has a small planters business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from a general store and a tricycle transportation business. Rodelia is borrowing PHP 19,000 through NWTF in order to buy fertilizers and other farm supplies. She has been sustaining her business activities through her past five loans from NWTF and more recently, through Kiva. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream, to save enough money to expand her business and to continue to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and other farm supplies.

loans.name: Martina

texts.en: Martina is 58 years old and married with one child. She earns a living by having a pig fattening business in the Philippines. Martina is borrowing PHP 9,000 through NWTF to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs. She has been in this business for 20 years and also earns additional income from buying and selling dried coconut meat. She is working tirelessly toward the attainment of her dream, to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs.

loans.name: Sirvard

texts.en:
Sirvard is a self-employed from the Bambakashat village of Armavir region. She lives with her husband and their 21-year-old son. Along with her family members, Sirvard has been engaged in farming for many years. Now she needs 800 US dollars in order to be able to pay for fertilizers, buy chemicals for trees, and pay off the debts of her family.

 As the entire family is engaged in farming, it is their only revenue source. That is why this loan will be a great support for them and will significantly improve their financial situation. Sirvard and her family will really appreciate the help of all the lenders.

loans.use: to pay for fertilizers, chemicals for trees, and repay her debts.

loans.name: Sylivia

texts.en:
Sylivia is only 20 years old and married with four children. She lives in Bundibugyo, Uganda. 

When she realized that a lot was needed for her family, she opted to start selling cocoa from her husband's plantation for survival. Her family can now meet some daily expenses, and she has managed to take her three children aged 8, 6, and 4 to school. 

She wishes to expand her business to sell to big cocoa agents. Although, limited land for farming and unpredictable weather changes affect her. 

Sylivia will use the loan to buy more cocoa to sell to her customers.

loans.use: to buy more cocoa to sell to her customers

loans.name: Jackson

texts.en: Jackson is a 54-year-old, married man with six children, all going to school in Bundibugyo, Uganda. He is a farmer who basically grows cocoa to sell to earn a living. He is a hardworking man who wants to see his children attain basic education. He is requesting a loan to pay for school fees for his children.

loans.use: to pay for school fees for his children.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy dried fish, cheese, and other food to help better stock his wife’s business.

loans.name: Elchin

texts.en:
Elchin is 42, married & father of two children. He is the main source of income for his family. He has worked in the agriculture sphere for most of his life & continues to work very hard for the best conditions for his family. 

Elchin lives in the annex building of his father's house. At this time, he is in need of a loan in order to make repairs & to replace the doors, making the home more secured. This loan will help him to avoid having to borrow the money from someone, which may lead to stress and tense relationships.

Elchin's aim is to be able to have his own house. He is very grateful for the opportunity and wants to thank all of the lenders.

loans.use: To make repairs & replace the doors of his house

loans.name: Marlon

texts.es:
Marlon abre todos los días, desde hace tres año que la inauguró, su pulpería a las siete de la mañana, pues para él brindar un buen servicio ha ayudado al 100% a crecer su negocio.  Además, a sus 45 años este comerciante, esposo y padre de 6 hijos trabajadores y colaboradores en la pulpería, da la bienvenida con una sonrisa llena de amabilidad, marcando la diferencia con los establecimientos similares de alrededor. Siempre ha trabajado, a pesar de no haber tenido la oportunidad de estudiar la secundaria debido a problemas económicos. 
Afortunadamente Marlon, cuenta con entusiasmo el avance de su negocio, pues gracias un pequeños ahorro pudo, comprar más caramelos, sopas instantáneas, cloro, entre otros productos de los cuales carecía. Ahora necesita de un nuevo préstamo para comprar en grandes cantidades arroz, aceite y azúcar, ya que quiere ofrecer mejor calidad debido a la demanda. Marlon desea seguir mejorando y creciendo profesionalmente  con su negocio, de manera que de sus ingresos siempre piensa invertirlos en ello.
texts.en:
Marlon opens his store daily at 7 AM, since beginning the business three years ago.  To him, offering good service has helped his business grow 100%.   This 45 year old businessman,  a husband and the father of six hard working children who help in the store, welcomes customers with a smile full of kindness, a difference from other nearby stores.     Marlon has always worked, despite not having had the chance to attend high school due to financial problems.

Fortunately, Marlon relies on enthusiasm to increase his business, since thanks to small savings he could buy more candy, instant soups, and bleach among other products which he lacked.  Now he needs a new loan to pay rice, oil and sugar in large quantities, since he wants to offer better quality thanks to the demand for these products.  Marlon wants to keep improving and growing professionally in his work so he will always invest in it from his income.

loans.use: to buy rice, oil and sugar in large quantities

loans.name: Benkadi Ii Group

texts.fr: Les membres du groupe  BENKADI II  sont des femmes mariées  ayant une moyenne d’âge de  41 ans, 4 enfants et vivant toutes dans des  familles polygames à SIKORO, commune de KADIANA, cercle de KOLONDIEBA, une des préfectures de la  3ème région administrative du Mali. Elles collaborent avec l’institution de microfinance Soro Yiriwaso afin de mener à bien leurs activités agricoles pendant l’hivernage. Elles sont à leur huitième prêt avec l’institution, les prêts passés ont été bien remboursés. La spéculation cultivée est  le riz et l’arachide  avec MAYAMOU SEYDOU 1ère personne debout à droite sur la photo. Avec son prêt, elle compte acheter des intrants, la semence et payer les frais de labours pour exploiter  3 hectares. La production est vendue au niveau de  KADIANA après la récolte à une clientèle composée d’hommes et de femmes. Elle compte réaliser un bénéfice de 180.00FCFA qui lui permettra de payer son prêt et aussi d’aider son mari dans les dépenses quotidiennes.
texts.en:
The members of group Benkadi II are married women; they are on average 41 years old with four children. They all live in polygamous families in the city of Sikoro, in Kadiana Township, Kolondieba circle (one of the prefectures of Mali’s third administrative region). These women collaborate with micro-finance institution Soro Yiriwaso to farm their land in the rainy season. This is their eight loan with the organization: all previous loans were paid back without problems.

The cultivated species are rice and ground nuts for Mayamou Seydou, the first person standing from the right in the photo. With her loan, she is planning on buying fertilizers and seeds, as well as pay for the plowing of seven acres of land. The production is sold in Kadiana after the harvest. Her clientele includes men and women.

Adja is forecasting a profit of 180,000 XOF, which will allow her to pay back her loan and to help her husband with the household’s daily expenses.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and seeds, and pay for plowing expenses during the farming season.

loans.name: Benkadi Iii Group

texts.fr: Les membres du groupe  BENKADI III  sont des femmes mariées  ayant une moyenne d’âge de  37 ans, 3 enfants et vivant toutes dans des  familles polygames à SIKORO, commune de KADIANA, cercle de KOLONDIEBA, une des préfectures de la  3ème région administrative du Mali. Elles collaborent avec l’institution de microfinance Soro Yiriwaso afin de mener à bien leurs activités agricoles pendant l’hivernage. Elles sont à leur troisième prêt avec l’institution, les prêts passés ont été bien remboursés. La spéculation cultivée est  le riz et l’arachide  avec AWA BAKARY 1ère personne accroupie à gauche sur la photo. Avec son prêt, elle compte acheter des intrants, la semence et payer les frais de labours pour exploiter  2 hectares. La production est vendue au niveau de  KADIANA après la récolte à une clientèle composée d’hommes et de femmes. Elle compte réaliser un bénéfice de 105.000FCFA qui lui permettra de payer son prêt et aussi d’aider son mari dans les dépenses quotidiennes.
texts.en:
The members of group Benkadi III are married women; they are on average 37 years old with three children. They all live in polygamous families in the city of Sikoro, in Kadiana Township, Kolondieba circle (one of the prefectures of Mali’s third administrative region). These women collaborate with micro-finance institution Soro Yiriwaso to farm their land in the rainy season. This is their third loan with the organization: all previous loans were paid back without problems.

The cultivated species are rice and ground nuts for Awa Bakari, the first person squatting from the left in the photo. With her loan, she is planning on buying fertilizers and seeds, as well as pay for the plowing of five acres of land. The production is sold in Kadiana after the harvest. Her clientele includes men and women.

Adja is forecasting a profit of 105,000 XOF, which will allow her to pay back her loan and to help her husband with the household’s daily expenses.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and seeds, and pay for plowing expenses during the farming season.

loans.name: Magali

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “LOS ANGELES DE HUAYANAY”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Santa Ana, perteneciente a la provincia de La Convención y departamento de Cusco.

La socia Magali se dedica al negocio de venta de comida,la socia tiene un restaurant, la socia realiza diferentes platos como pollo al horno, sopas y saltados de carne, la socia trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 6:00 p.m,la socia ya tiene 8 años en este negocio y le va muy bien, el sueño de la socia es ampliar el restaurant. La socia solicita el crédito para comprar productos para cocinar como arroz, verduras y pollos.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
This member belongs to the  “LOS ANGELES DE HUAYANAY” communal bank, which is located in the Santa Ana district, province of La Convención, in the state of Cuzco.

Magali sells food and has a restaurant.  She makes different dishes such as roasted chicken, soups, and meat stir fries.  She works from 8am to 6pm.  She has had this business for 8 years and the business is going very well.  Her dream is to expand her restaurant. She is requesting a loan to purchase ingredients such as rice, vegetables, and chickens.  She is happy with the loan and promises to make her payments on time.

loans.use: to purchase ingredients such as rice, vegetables, and chicken.

loans.name: Nikleby Weider

texts.es:
Nikleby tiene 30 años de edad, vive sin sus hijos, en una comunidad del distrito de Oyotún, su población se dedica a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería, ubicada en la Provincia de Chiclayo que pertenece a la Región Lambayeque, costa norte del Perú.

El se dedica a brindar servicios de albañilería, contando con herramientas propias, con más de 5 años de experiencia en el negocio, ha solicitado un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 700 nuevos soles para la compra y mantenimiento de sus herramientas que le permitan realizar con mayor rapidez su trabajo y de esta manera tener otros contratos que le generen mayores ingresos para su familia.
texts.en:
Nikleby is 30 years and lives in a town in Oyotún District in Chiclayo Province. This area is part of the Lambayeque Region along the northern coast of Peru, where most people are farmers, ranchers, or run small businesses.  

Nikelby has provided construction services for over five years, using his own tools. He is applying for a loan of 700 new soles from Edpyme Alternativa to pay for the purchase and  maintenance of his tools and equipment. Maintenance will allow Nikleby to finish construction jobs faster so he can secure new contracts that will generate more income for his family.

loans.use: to pay for the purchase and maintenance of his tools and equipment that he uses for construction

loans.name: Santos

texts.es:
Santos Santos tiene 55 años de edad, vive en casa propia de material rustico junto con su conyugue y sus dos menores hijos de 4 y 3 años de edad, en el Distrito de Cañaris, una comunidad de clima frio, su población se dedica a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería, ubicada en la Provincia de Ferreñafe que pertenece a la Región Lambayeque, costa norte del Perú.

El se dedica a la agricultura, específicamente al cultivo de café, desde hace 6 años de edad, ha solicitado un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 2 000 nuevos soles para la compra de abonos para el mantenimiento de su cultivo que le permitirá tener una cosecha oportuna para ofrecer a sus clientes.
texts.en:
Santos Santos is 55 years old, lives in his own home made of rustic material with his spouse and their two young children, 4 and 3 years old, in the 
district of Cañaris, a community with a cold climate, whose population works in agriculture, trade and animal husbandry, located in the province of Ferreñafe which belongs to Lambayeque region on the northern coast of Peru. 

He has worked in agriculture, specifically cultivating coffee, since he was 6 years old. He has asked Edpyme Alternativa for a loan of 2,000 nuevos soles to purchase fertilizer to maintain his crop which will allow him to have a good harvest to offer his customers.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizer to maintain his coffee crop.

loans.name: Abel Ronald

texts.es:
Abel Ronald tiene 48 años de edad, vive junto a su cónyuge en su propia casa en el Distrito de Cayalti, una comunidad de clima caluroso, su población es amable que se dedica a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería, ubicada en la Provincia de Chiclayo que pertenece a la Región Lambayeque, costa norte del Perú.

El se desempeña como maestro de construcción civil, en la construcción de viviendas, veredas entre otros, cuenta con clientela en la zona, ha solicitado un préstamo a Edyme Alternativa de 1 000 nuevos soles para la compra de materiales de construcción para la ampliación de una habitación casa, para tener una mejor calidad de vida junto a su familia.
texts.en:
Abel Ronald is 48 years old, he lives with his partner in their own home in the District of Cayalti, a community with a very hot climate. The people there are kind and make a living in agriculture, trade, and cattle farming. It is located in the province of Chiclayo, which belongs to the Lambayeque region on the north coast of Peru.

He works as a teacher of residential construction, in the construction of homes, sidewalks and other things, and he counts on the customers in that area. He has requested a loan of 1,000 Nuevos Soles from Edyme Alternativa to buy construction materials to expand a room in his home in order to have a better quality of life together with his family.

loans.use: to buy construction materials to expand a room in his home.

loans.name: Jenalyn

texts.en: Jenalyn is 29 years old, married, and has three children who are in school. She is in the agricultural business of pig fattening in the Philippines. Jenalyn requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to purchase feed and vitamins for her pigs. She has been in pig fattening for five years now, and has borrowed two times in the past from NWTF to sustain it. In the future, Jenalyn would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to school.

loans.use: to purchase feed and vitamins for her pigs.

loans.name: Angélica Yanira

texts.es:
Angélica de 46 años de edad, es madre de 3 hijos, tiene 9 años de dedicarse a la ocupación de cocinera en un rancho a la orilla de la playa, por ser una familia de escasos recursos económicos ella no pudo estudiar.


Angélica ha perfeccionado la técnica de cocinar gracias a su experiencia,  la distancia de su hogar hasta su trabajo es de unos 500 metros, tomó la decisión de dedicarse a este trabajo ya que para ella no existían muchas probabilidades de empleo.



El crédito será utilizado para comprar cables, postes y cemento para la instalación del tendido eléctrico.



El sueño de Angélica es mejorar día a día su casa, que su casa se vea mas bonita para tener un lugar seguro en el cual vivir.
texts.en:
Angélica is 46 years old and the mother of three children. She has been working for nine years as a cook at a farm by the seashore. Because she is from a low-income family she was not able to attend school.

Angélica has perfected the technique of cooking, thanks to her experience. The distance from her home to her work is around 500 meters. She has made the decision to devote herself to this work, as for her there were not many employment opportunities.

The loan will be utilized to buy cable, poles and cement, for the installation of overhead electrical wiring.

Angélica's dream is to improve her home day by day, and for her home to look nicer and be a safe place in which to live.

loans.use: To buy cable, poles and cement, for the installation of overhead electrical wiring.

loans.name: Aminah

texts.en:
Aminah is 27 years old and lives in Bundibugyo, Uganda. She is married with four children. Three children go to school. 

Aminah owns a small cocoa plantation where she harvests cocoa to sell. Due to small quantities, she does not yield much. So, she rents cocoa gardens to add to her production. 

She hopes to buy another piece of land though lack of enough capital affects her wishes. Aminah is very hardworking and is requesting a loan to rent a cocoa garden to harvest and sell.

loans.use: to rent a cocoa garden to harvest and sell.

loans.name: José Santos

texts.es:
José de 43 años de edad, estudió hasta segundo grado, está acompañado y su pareja se dedica a los trabajos domésticos, tiene tres hijos entre 6 y 15 años de edad, todos estudian en la escuela de la comunidad y solo ellos de penden directamente de José. 

José es agricultor, desde muy pequeño se dedica a esta labor que aprendió de su padre, también él trabaja como jornalero obteniendo más ingresos, actualmente siembra 2 hectáreas de maíz, el lugar donde cultiva está a una distancia de 20 minutos de su casa y se va a pie, el horario de trabajo es de 8:00 am a 12:00 pm.

Él necesita muchísimo del crédito para comprar fertilizantes, herbicidas y para cancelar el terreno que alquila para realizar los cultivos, la necesidad satisfecha será la de capital de trabajo.


Su sueño principal es obtener una buena cosecha para cancelar los compromisos, él está decidido a trabajar muy fuerte para sacar adelante a su familia darle la mejor educación a sus hijos para que se preparen para su futuro.
texts.en:
Jose, 43 years old, studied up until second grade. He is in a relationship and his partner is a homemaker. He has three children between the ages of 6 and 15. All of them study at the community school, and only they depend directly on Jose. 

Jose is a farmer. From a very young age he has made a living in this work, which he learned from his father. He also does work as a day laborer, obtaining more income. He currently farms 2 hectares of corn. The place where he farms is 20 minutes from his house and he goes there on foot. The work schedule is from 8 a.m. to 12 p.m.

He really needs the loan to purchase fertilizer and weedkiller and to pay off the plot of land that he rents for farming. The need to be satisfied will be that of capital for work. His main goal is to have a better crop to pay off debts. He has made up his mind to work very hard to get his family ahead and give his children the best education so that they are prepared for their future.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and weedkiller and to pay off the plot of land that he rents for farming.

loans.name: Juan

texts.es: Juan es casado tiene tres hijos y vive en El Alto en una casa de ladrillo y cemento donde paga un alquiler Juan sobrevive con un kiosco en un colegio donde vende golosinas y refrescos junto a su esposa Juan quiere incrementar la mercaderia de su kiosco (dulces, galletas, refrescos, chocolates) y por eso pide la ayuda de Kiva.
texts.en:
Juan is married and has three children. He lives in a rented house made of brick and cement in El Alto.

Juan has a kiosk at a school where he and his wife sell snack foods and soft drinks. He wants to increase the inventory of merchandise in his kiosk by purchasing sweets, cookies, soft drinks, and chocolates. Therefore, he is requesting assistance from Kiva.

loans.use: to buy sweets, cookies, soft drinks, and chocolates to sell from his kiosk.

loans.name: Mujeres Emprendedoras Group

texts.es:
El grupo Mujeres emprendedoras  está en su ciclo número  4º  del programa de comité de mujeres, donde todas trabajan y se ayudan por salir adelante. Están haciendo la encuesta de eliminación de pobreza, donde gracias al esfuerzo están mejorando su situación de pobreza.
Carmen es una de las integrantes de este grupo, ella se dedica a vender prendas de manera ambulante, ella es una mujer muy sacrificada, que todos los días empieza a trabajar desde muy tempranas horas del día. Carmen pide este préstamo para poder comprar prendas variadas, como camisas, pantalones, jeans y demás, y de esa forma poder seguir con su trabajo como lo viene haciendo.
Todas están siendo capacitadas, y por medio de esto van mejorando su forma de trabajo.
texts.en:
The Mujeres Emprendedoras (Enterprising Women) group is in its 4th loan cycle in the program of women's committees, where all work and help each other get ahead.

Carmen is one of the members of this group. She works selling clothing as a street vendor. She is a very self-sacrificing woman, who daily begins to work in the very early hours of the day.  Carmen asks for this loan to be able to purchase a variety of clothing, such as shirts, pants, jeans and others, and in this way be able to continue with her work as she has been doing. 

All the members are being trained, and in this way they are improving their form of work.

loans.use: to purchase shirts, pants, jeans, and other clothing to sell.

loans.name: Martha Genoveva

texts.es:
Martha Genoveva tiene 38 años de edad, de estado civil conviviente, con dos hijos a su cargo, vive en casa propia, en el distrito de Nueva Arica, una zona rural que ha permitido desarrollarse mediante la agricultura, comercio y ganadería, ubicada en la Provincia de Chiclayo, que pertenece a la Región Lambayeque, costa norte del Perú.

Ella se dedica a la venta de productos de primera necesidad, en una bodeguita donde ofrece a la venta variedad de productos, su negocio está ubicado en su domicilio, ha solicitado un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 3 000 nuevos soles para la compra de variedad de productos de primera necesidad para abastecer su negocio y de esta manera generar mayores ingresos para su familia.
texts.en:
Martha Genoveva, 38, is married and has two children. She owns her home in the district of Nueva Arica, a rural area that has developed through agriculture, commerce and cattle ranching. It is located in the province of Chiclayo, in the Lambayeque region on the northern coast of Peru. 
Martha Genoveva sells basic household necessities in a small store with a variety of products. Her business is based in her home. She asks for a loan from Edpyme Alternative of 3000 nuevos soles to buy a variety of basic goods to stock her store so that she can generate more income for her family.

loans.use: to purchase groceries like milk, eggs, and other goods to stock her store

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay for the costs of processing her degree.

loans.name: Maria

texts.es:
Maria es persona trabajadora y luchadora que está ofreciendo sus servicios de auxiliar contable en un supermercado, y con el sueldo que tiene paga sus gastos de cuota de la universidad y a la vez ayuda a su familia.
Con este préstamo quiere pagar sus gastos de la tesina, ya que de esa forma podrá seguir luchando por cumplir su meta. Agradece por esta oportunidad que esta recibiendo y que le sera de mucha ayuda.
