texts.en: Maria is a hard-working and tenacious person and who works as an assistant accountant in a supermarket. With her salary, she pays university tuition and occasionally helps her family. With this loan, she would like to pay thesis costs since this will allow her to continue working towards her goal. She is thankful for the opportunity that she is receiving and it will help her a lot.

loans.use: to pay thesis expenses.

loans.name: Robertina

texts.es:
Robertina tiene 64 años de edad, vive en casa propia, en el Distrito Santo Tomas, que cuenta con los servicios básicos de luz y agua, una comunidad de clima variado, su población se dedica a la agricultura, especificamente de frutales, maíz, café y tuberculos, comercio de los mismos y ganadería, ubicada en la Provincia de Cutervo que pertenece a la Región Cajamarca, sierra norte del Perú.

Ella se dedica a la venta de abarrotes en general, cuenta con clientela ya establecida, también venta de regalos para ocasiones especiales como portarretratos, peluches, bisutería entre otros, ha solicitado un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 2 000 nuevos soles para la compra de variedad de abarrotes que le permitan abastecer su negocio.
texts.en:
Robertina is 64 years old and lives in her own house in the Santo Tomas district located in the Province of the same name, which belongs to Lambayeque Region on the North Coast of Peru. It is a community of varied climate and has basic water and light services. It's people work in agriculture, specifically with fruit, corn, coffee, and tubers, commerce of these goods, and raise livestock. It is located in the Cutervo Province that is in the Cajamarca region in the mountainous north of Peru. 

She sells groceries in general and has an established clientele. She also sells gifts for special occasions like picture frames, stuffed toys, jewellery, amongst others. She has requested a loan from Edpyme Alternativa of 2000 PEN to buy a variety of groceries which will allow her to stock her store.

loans.use: to buy a variety of groceries to stock her store.

loans.name: Zita

texts.en:
Zita is a married woman with three children. She is 38 years old and has three children who are in school.

She is a very hardworking entrepreneur and has a fish vending business in the Philippines. Zita has been in this business for 17 years.

Zita requested a 7,000 PHP loan amount through Negros Women for Tomorrow Foundation, Inc. (NWTF) to purchase additional boxes of fish to sell in her fish stall.

In the future, she would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase additional boxes of fish to sell in her fish stall

loans.name: Davis

texts.en:
Davis is a 35-year-old old married man and has three children who all go to school in Bundibugyo, Uganda. 

Davis is in the motorcycle transportation business which has assisted him to earn a living. He also sells phone accessories. Davis is so hardworking that he also practices farming in his free time to improve on the household income. 

He is faced with the problem of increased rent payments for his house and wishes to construct his own home to avoid incurring those costs. 

Davis will use the loan to pay school fees for his children.

loans.use: to pay school fees for his children

loans.name: José Tomas

texts.es:
José tiene 48 años de edad, es un campesino que solo pudo estudiar hasta cuarto grado, está acompañado y su pareja se dedica a los oficios domésticos, tiene 5 hijos, 4  de ellos van a la escuela, pero en casa solo viven vive su esposa y tres hijos, los otros dos viven con la abuela.



José tiene  33 años de dedicarse a la agricultura, desde que tenía 12 años lo llevaban al campo para que aprendiera,  dos de sus hijos le ayudan a él, y trabajan desde las 5:30  hasta las 11:30 de la mañana. 


Él necesita el crédito para comprar 4 sacos de abono que son los que le faltan para terminar de abonar la milpa y pagará el alquiler de media hectárea.

Sus sueños son que Dios le de la oportunidad de tener buena salud para trabajar y tener siempre lo necesario, que sus hijos estudien y se preparen para que no les toque duro como a él.
texts.en:
Jose is 48 years old. He is an agricultural worker who was only able to study up until fourth grade. He is in a relationship and his partner is a homemaker. He has 5 children, 4 of whom go to school, but only his wife and three children live at home. The other two live with a grandmother. 

Jose has been working in agriculture for 33 years. He was taken to the fields to learn since he was 12 years old. Two of his children help him, and they work from 5:30 to 11:30 in the morning. 

He needs the loan to buy 4 bags of manure, which is what he needs to finish fertilizing the farm, and he will pay the rent on a half hectare. His dreams are that God will give him the opportunity to be in good health to work and to always have what he needs and that his children will study and educate themselves so that they do not have a hard time like he has.

loans.use: to buy 4 bags of manure, which he needs to finish fertilizing the farm, and to pay the rent on a half hectare.

loans.name: Milagros

texts.en:
Milagros is 47 years old and married with two children, with one child currently in school. She works very hard to provide for them.

Milagros runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to buy additional stock like soy sauce, vinegar, noodles, sugar, coffee, cereals, detergent soap, etc. to sell.

Milagros has been in this business for 10 years and sells a variety of items such as soy sauce, vinegar, noodles, sugar, coffee, cereals, detergent soap, etc.

Milagros would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy additional stock like soy sauce, vinegar, noodles, sugar, coffee, cereals, detergent soap, etc. to sell

loans.name: Warlita

texts.en:
Warlita is 58 years old, married and has one child.

Warlita is in the agricultural business, raising pigs in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 20,000 loan through NWTF in order to buy medicine and vaccines for her pigs.

Warlita has been raising pigs for six years now, and has borrowed twenty times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

In the future, she would like to save enough money to expand her business and repair her family's home.

loans.use: to buy medicine and vaccines for her pigs.

loans.name: Benkadi Iv Group

texts.fr: Les membres du groupe  BENKADI IV  sont des femmes mariées  ayant une moyenne d’âge de  43 ans, 2 enfants et vivant toutes dans des  familles polygames à SIKORO, commune de KADIANA, cercle de KOLONDIEBA, une des préfectures de la  3ème région administrative du Mali. Elles collaborent avec l’institution de microfinance Soro Yiriwaso afin de mener à bien leurs activités agricoles pendant l’hivernage. Elles sont à leur cinquième prêt avec l’institution, les prêts passés ont été bien remboursés. La spéculation cultivée est  le riz et l’arachide  avec SANATA 2ème personne accroupie à sur la photo de la gauche à la droite. Avec son prêt, elle compte acheter des intrants, la semence et payer les frais de labours pour exploiter  3 hectares. La production est vendue au niveau de  KADIANA après la récolte à une clientèle composée d’hommes et de femmes. Elle envisage avoir un bénéfice de 185.000FCFA qui lui permettra de payer son prêt et aussi d’aider son mari dans les dépenses quotidiennes.
texts.en:
The members of the Benkadi IV Group are married women with an average age of 43 and an average of two children each. They all live within polygamous family frameworks in Sikoro, in Kadiana Commune, Kolondieba Cercle, one of the prefectures found in the third administrative region of Mali. They are collaborating with the Soro Yiriwaso microfinance institution so that they can see through their agricultural activities during the winter period. This is their fifth loan with Soro Yiriwaso, with whom their previous loans were paid back in full. The group's main produce is rice and peanuts.

The group's representative is Sanata, the woman squatting second from the left in the front row in the photo. With this loan, she is planning on purchasing farming inputs and seeds, as well as paying for the labour costs to maintain three hectares of land. After the harvest, the produce will be sold in Kadiana to a customer base made up of both men and woman. She is planning on making a profit of 185,000 FCFA, which will allow her to pay off the loan and help her husband with their family's daily living expenses.

loans.use: to pay for labour costs, seeds and farming inputs during the agricultural season

loans.name: Nerissa

texts.en:
Nerissa is a married woman with three children. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. She is 33 years old and has two children who are currently in school.

Nerissa has a business direct selling MSE products in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 10,000 loan amount through NWTF to purchase more MSE products to sell to her customers.

Nerissa has been in this business for two years. In the future, she would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase more MSE products to sell to her customers

loans.name: Robelyn

texts.en:
Robelyn is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a fishing/fish vending business in the Philippines. She is borrowing PHP 12,000 through NWTF to buy additional materials and gear for her fishing business.

NWTF is presenting Jonalyn's business profile again in support of her efforts to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy additional materials and gear for her fishing business.

loans.name: Juana Gladis

texts.es:
Juana,  madre de una hija de 22 años de edad y tiene un nivel académico de bachillerato y su otro hijo de nueve años que también se encuentra estudiando nivel básico. 

Juana se dedica al comercio de productos de carácter personal como medicina naural, lociones, joyería, cosméticos por catálogo, entre otros dicha actividad la realiza desde hace 20 años, es decir que Juana conoce muy bien la actividad que desempeña al igual que su hija que le apoya en dicho negocio, también realiza la actividad de producción de granos básicos para la sostenibilidad de su familia. 

El préstamo que esta solicitando, es para comprar fertilizantes, pesticidas y herbicidas, pago de mano de obra para cultivar maíz  y  un 50% para la ampliación de su negocio de venta de lociones, joyería y cosméticos por catálogo. Los cultivos los realizan personas a quienes ella paga, para obtener cosecha para su alimentación.

Juana planea mejorar su vivienda para que su familia obtenga mayor seguridad, y que su hijo continúe con su estudio,  para que obtenga mayores oportunidades de empleo a su futuro.
texts.en:
Juana is the mother of a 22-year-old daughter who has a high school education. Her other child is nine years old and is studying for his basic education.

Juana sells personal products such as natural medicines, lotions, jewelry, cosmetics, and other items through catalogs. She has been in this business for 20 years. Juana is very knowledgeable about this type of work, as well as her daughter who helps her with the business. She also cultivates basic grains in order to sustain her family.

The loan she is requesting will be used to buy fertilizers, pesticides, and herbicides, as well as pay for labor in order to cultivate corn. Half of the loan will be used to expand her business of selling lotions, jewelry, and cosmetics through catalogs. The crops that are grown by the hired help will be harvested for her personal consumption.

Juana plans to improve her home so that her family can have greater security. Her son will continue his studies so that he can have more job opportunities in the future.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers, pesticides, and herbicides; pay for labor in order to cultivate corn; and to buy lotions, jewelry, and cosmetics to sell.

loans.name: Juan José

texts.es:
Juan tiene 29 años de edad, solo estudió hasta segundo grado y se dedicó a trabajar, está acompañado y tienen tres hijos que están pequeños por lo que aún no asisten a la escuela. 

Desde muy pequeño Juan se dedica al cultivo de maíz, hace un año trabajó como cobrador pero lo dejó por la delincuencia. 

Este crédito lo necesita para comprar 2 sacos de abono, uno de sulfato y uno de fórmula, también comprará 2 botellas  de herbicidas, una de paracuac y una de amina.

Él sueña que sus hijos sean trabajadores como él, seguirá trabajando para que sus hijos sean profesionales.
texts.en:
Juan, age 29, only went to school through the second grade, and he decided to work.  He is in a relationship, and they have three small children.  The children do not yet go to school.

Ever since he was little, Juan has been growing corn.  A year ago he worked as a collector, but he left that because of the delinquency.

He needs this loan to buy two sacks of fertilizer.  One will be sulfate, and the other will be formula.  He will also buy two bottles of herbicide, one called "paracuac" [a pesticide], and one bottle of amine.

His dream is for his children to become hard-workers like he is.  He will continue working so that his children will become professionals.

loans.use: to buy two sacks of fertilizer and two bottles of herbicides.

loans.name: Sok's Group

texts.en:
A resident of Prey Chhor district of Kampong Cham province, Sok is a 42-year-old farmer who struggles to earn a living through rice and cassava farming. She has four children, three of whom are dependent on her. She has been farming for about 25 years. In order to earn extra income to support her family, Sok also raises pigs to sell.

This is the third cycle for Sok as a borrower of VisionFund (Kiva’s partner). She leads a group of five members to request a loan of 6,900,000 KHR. Sok owns a 1,500,000 KHR portion of the group loan. She plans to use her share of the loan to buy fertilizer and gasoline to support her rice farm. She strongly believes that the loan will enable her to get a higher yield so that she can save some money to expand the farmland in the future.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and gasoline

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Prey Chhor district

loans.name: Hafiza

texts.ru: Хафиза живет в отдаленном регионе. Она трудолюбивая и жизнерадостная женщина. Хафиза замужем и на воспитании имеет 3 детей. Хафиза занимается скотоводством уже более 9 лет. Она в основном выращивает крупно-рогатого скота. Хафиза еще дополнительно занимается выращиванием сельхоз культур как картофель и пшеница. Она упорно работает с раннего утра и зимой и летом. Хафизе помогают ее отец и сын по введению бизнеса. Она обратилась за займом в сумме 10000 сомони для покупки скота. Она ждет вашу доброту и надеется на ваше милосердие.
texts.en: Hafiza lives in a remote region. She is a hardworking, cheerful woman who is married and has three children. She has been raising livestock for over nine years, mainly cattle. Hafiza also grows potatoes and wheat. She works hard from the early morning, winter and summer. Her father and son help her with the business. She applied for a loan of 10,000 somoni to buy cattle. She awaits your kindness and hopes for your compassion.

loans.use: To buy cattle and increase working capital

loans.name: Cendy

texts.es:
Cendy es de la ciudad de Encarnación, es una persona muy sacrificada, está casada y comenta que está estudiando la carrera de derecho, lo cual le será de mucha ayuda en su trabajo actual.
Cendy es funcionaria judicial, y comenta que al recibirse de abogada podrá mejorar sus condiciones de vida y las de su familia. 
Pide este préstamo para poder invertirlo en cubrir sus cuotas de la universidad, y también cubrir sus gastos de titulación.
texts.en:
Cendy is from the city of Encarnación and is a self-sacrificing individual. She is married and says that she is studying for a law degree, which will be very useful in her current job.

Cendy is a judicial civil servant. She says that becoming an attorney will improve her living conditions and those of her family. Cendy is requesting a loan so that she can invest in her university fees, as well as cover her degree expenses.

loans.use: to pay her university fees and degree expenses.

loans.name: Maa Bhairavi Shg Group

texts.en:
Chandini is a 28-year-old lady currently engaged in selling goats and goat milk. Currently, she has 12 goats. From this activity, she is able to make 3,500 INR per month. She, along with the other nine women from her village, created a Self Help group named "Maa Bhairavi Shg" and Chandini is the President of this group. In the picture, the lady standing with her hand raised is Chandini. The group is made up of members having the purpose of helping and supporting each other in their business activities and in their personal lives. All the group members are engaged in different activities like selling cow's milk, selling flowers, selling vegetables, etc. 

Chandini lives with her parents-in-law, husband and her two children. Her husband is a daily laborer and sometimes he helps in Chandini's business activities. Chandini and her husband both take on all the family's responsibilities. Chandini has a dream of making a house for her family and educating her children. Chandini, along with her group members, has requested a loan of 150,000 INR. Chandini will use her portion to purchase more goat kids for her animal raising business. She is really very thankful to Kiva for this opportunity.

loans.use: to purchase more goat kids

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to begin the procedures for obtaining her bachelor's degree as soon as she finishes her studies.

loans.name: Benkadi I Group

texts.fr: Les membres du groupe  BENKADI I  sont des femmes mariées  ayant une moyenne d’âge de  33 ans, 3 enfants et vivant toutes dans des  familles polygames à TIONCOURANI, commune de KADIANA, cercle de KOLONDIEBA, une des préfectures de la  3ème région administrative du Mali. Elles collaborent avec l’institution de microfinance Soro Yiriwaso afin de mener à bien leurs activités agricoles pendant l’hivernage. Elles sont à leur quatrième prêt avec l’institution, les prêts passés ont été bien remboursés. La spéculation cultivée est  le riz et l’arachide  avec MINATA  1ère personne accroupie à gauche sur la photo. Avec son prêt, elle compte acheter des intrants, la semence et payer les frais de labours pour exploiter  3 hectares. La production est vendue au niveau du marché de  KADIANA après la récolte à une clientèle composée d’hommes et de femmes. Elle envisage réaliser un bénéfice de 175.000FCFA qui lui permettra de payer son prêt et aussi d’aider son mari dans les dépenses quotidiennes.
texts.en:
The members of the Benkadi I Group are married women with an average age of 33 and an average of three children each. They all live within polygamous family frameworks in Tioncourani, in Kadiana Commune, Kolondieba Cercle, one of the prefectures found in the third administrative region of Mali. They are collaborating with the Soro Yiriwaso microfinance institution so that they can see through their agricultural activities during the winter period. This is their fourth loan with Soro Yiriwaso, with whom their previous loans were paid back in full. The group's main produce is rice and peanuts.

The group's representative is Minata, the woman squatting to the left at the end of the front row in the photo. With this loan, she is planning on purchasing farming inputs and seeds, as well as paying for the labour costs to maintain three hectares of land. After the harvest, the produce will be sold in Kadiana Market to a customer base made up of both men and woman. She is planning on making a profit of 175,000 FCFA, which will allow her to pay off the loan and help her husband with their family's daily living expenses.

loans.use: to pay for labour costs, seeds and farming inputs during the agricultural season

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: with the construction of a room and a bathroom

loans.name: Sreyhean's Group

texts.en:
Sreyhean is a villager from Kampong Cham province. She is a 28-year-old married woman with one child. The primary source of income for her family comes from her cassava farm. She also earns extra income from her rice farm. She has been engaged in agribusiness about 10 years already. 
Sreyhean has been with Kiva’s partner, VisionFund for one cycle already. As she has completely repaid the previous loan, now, she leads a group of three members to apply for a loan of 2,300,000 KHR, of which she owns a portion of 1,000,000 KHR. She will use the loan to buy fertilizer and to pay labor fees to remove grass from her cassava farm. She optimistically believes that the loan will allow her to get a higher yield from the farm.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and to pay labor fees to remove grass

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Ponhea Krek district

loans.name: Winque

texts.en:
Winque is 26 years old and married, with one child.

Winque works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and she has requested a PHP 14,000 loan through Negros Women for Tomorrow Foundation, Inc. (NWTF) to buy more groceries to sell in her general store.

Winque has borrowed and paid seven loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for six years and also earns an income from electronic mobile load retailing.

Winque aspires to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy more groceries to sell in her general store.

loans.name: Maa Dhana Ragini Shg Group

texts.en:
Maa Dhana Ragini Self Help Group is a group consisting of nine members, all of whom are women. These entrepreneurs are very humble, hardworking and responsible people with good manners and lots of enthusiasm to improve their lives. A few years back, they all were facing the same kind of situation of poverty, so they planned to start general stores where they can provide the basic household consumables to their customers. 

One of them is Lalita, who was selected as their president. In the picture, the lady standing with her hand raised is Lalita. Lalita is a 27-year-old lady living with her husband and her three children, two of whom are in school, and one of whom is only one year old. Her husband works as a laborer in a factory situated near her village. Lalita runs a general store to help her husband financially. She sells rice, grains, lentils, edible oil, spices, biscuits, soap, detergent, hair oil, etc. in her shop. She has developed a very good relationship with her customers in the village. She likes the fact that she can cater to the needs of the people in her village. She has a plan to make her shop bigger and keep multiple things in her shop to satisfy her customers. She also wants to purchase the items for her shop in bulk directly from the wholesalers, for which she has requested a loan for purchasing items like toothbrushes, toothpaste, soft drinks, wheat flour, grains and other household consumables.

loans.use: to purchase items like toothbrushes, toothpaste, soft drinks, wheat flour, grains and other household consumables

loans.name: Maa Durga Shg Group

texts.en:
The "Maa Durga SHG," a newly formed group, is made up of women who want to bring change to their daily lives through the program. They all live in the same village and share values of solidarity and working together. They mainly run small businesses and do some crop cultivation. 

Renubala is the lady in the picture who is sitting in the middle, the featured borrower of the group. She is 37 years old and a married mother of two children. She sells seasonal fruits and has perfectly mastered this business from having been doing it for more than 10 years. She sells fresh fruits like oranges, apples, bananas, pineapples, guavas, etc. With her new loan, she plans to buy fresh fruits in bulk to resell. With her profits, she plans to increase her savings to better establish her business. Other members of this group are engaged in different businesses like milk selling, fish selling, vegetable selling, etc.

loans.use: to purchase fresh fruits in bulk to resell.

loans.name: Saven

texts.en:
Saven, 28 years old, lives with her husband and three children in Bateay District, Kampong Cham Province, Cambodia. To support her family, Saven and her husband are working very hard on her rice farmland, which she inherited from her parents. Until now, she has been involved in this career for more than 10 years. The daily income that she can make is USD 3 per day. 

To accelerate her farming process, Saven would like to have more buffaloes to help her plow the land but she can’t afford those buffaloes on her own. She is applying for her first loan from Kiva now to buy buffaloes and she promises to pay the loan back with interest punctually based on the repayment schedule.  She would like to thank the lenders for the financial support via HKL, which provides her with a much lower interest rate than its general loan product

loans.use: to buy buffaloes

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy cement and sand to plaster the walls of his house.

loans.name: Confiemos En Dios Group

texts.es: El grupo solidario está integrado por tres socias y coordinado por doña María, es una mujer fuerte y  trabaja en su negocio desde hace 8 años, la socia palmea tortillas y vende nacatamales en su comunidad, su esposo le ayuda económicamente en el negocio. El crédito los solicita para la compra de maíz, papas, cerdo, hierba buena, lena, achote, cebolla, etc., para aumentar sus ventas y cumplir una de sus metas que es seguir adelante  ampliar su negocio. Con los créditos anteriores  la socia ha logrado una estabilidad económica y mantener su negocio y familia. Otra de las socias es la señora Lidia de 39 años que se dedica al comercio ambulante en su comunidad. Doña María de 42 años se dedica a la venta de cosméticos
texts.en:
This solidarity group is made up of three members and is organised by Maria. She is a strong woman and has worked in her business for 8 years which makes tortillas and sells nacatamales [maize, meat and rice wrapped in banana leaf] in her community. Her husband helps the business financially. 

She is asking for this loan to buy corn, potatoes, pork, mint, achiote [annatto spices], onions, firewood etc. to increase sales and achieve her goal to get ahead in expanding her business. With previous loans, the business has gained financial stability, supporting her business and family.

Another member, Lidia, is 39 years old and is a street vendor in her community. Maria is 42 years old and sells cosmetics.

loans.use: to buy corn, potatoes, pork, mint, achiote, onion, firewood etc.

loans.name: Mule

texts.en:
Mule is only 23 years old and married with three children living in Bundibugyo, Uganda. Though she is determined to make her home happy, she looks at weather changes letting her down in her cocoa production. She dreams of buying a tailoring machine to earn extra income and care for her children like a loving parent. 

Mule has asked for a loan to rent a cocoa garden to harvest and sell.

loans.use: to rent a cocoa garden to harvest and sell.

loans.name: Mariela Lisseth

texts.es:
Mariela es una joven de 19 años de edad, estudió hasta 2º año bachillerato, luego se acompañó, tiene una niña de 1 año de edad su compañero de vida trabaja en el campo como agricultor.


Ella se dedica a trabajar vendiendo ropa de casa en casa esto se lo enseñó una tía que también se dedica a la misma actividad, lo desempeña desde hace 5 años, Mariela se traslada a los lugares cercanos de donde vive para poder vender, esto lo hace durante todo el día para poder tener un ingreso mas a la familia.


Los fondos del crédito serán utilizados para comprar mas variedad de ropa y con esto tener mayor clientela. 

Espera en un futuro tener una tienda en un lugar fijo donde pueda cuidar a su hija y tener el negocio.
texts.en:
Mariela is 19 years old and went to school until the second year of high school. She then started a relationship and has a one-year-old daughter. Her partner works in agriculture.

Mariela has worked for five years selling clothing from house to house. She learned this business from an aunt who does the same. Mariela travels all day long to places near where she lives to sell clothing and earn income for her family.

She is requesting this loan to buy a greater variety of clothing. She hopes to attract more customers.

In the future she would like to have her own store, so that she could care for her daughter while working her business.

loans.use: to buy a greater variety of clothing for her business.

loans.name: Yousef

texts.en:
Yousef is a 26-year-old married man from Khan Younis. He lives with his wife and one small kid. Six years ago, Yousef started his own carpentry workshop business. He makes some furniture and sells it in his store. It is a good business and he earns a good income.

Yousef took a USD Murabaha loan from FATEN. This loan will help him to buy more wood bars for his carpentry workshop. This will increase his productivity and his income.

Yousef appears in the photo.

loans.use: to buy more wood bars for his carpentry workshop

loans.name: Tiv's Group

texts.en:
Tiv is residing in a remote village, located in Presh Vihea province. She is a 42-year-old mother, who has four children, three of whom are dependent on her and currently are going to school.  

Tiv struggles to earn a living through rice farming and bean farming. She also earns additional income by raising pigs for sale and selling snacks to the villagers. Unfortunately, she is able to earn only KHR 22,200 per day, which is barely enough to feed her children.

This is the fourth cycle for Tiv as a borrower of VisionFund Cambodia (Kiva’s partner). She has completed the payment of previous loans and the loans have helped her to gradually improve the living conditions of her family. Now, she leads a group of five members to request a loan of KHR 5,000,000, which contributes the same share of KHR 1,000,000 to each member. 

Tiv plans to use her portion of the loan to install a solar system that will be very beneficial for her family since they are living in a remote area, where electric lines are inaccessible. She hopes that the loan will help her to support her children to finish their studies.

loans.use: to install a solar system.

location.town: Preah Vihear Province, Tbeng Meanchey District

loans.name: Maa Jagat Janani Shg Group

texts.en:
Muni (shown in the photo standing with her hand raised) is a 21-year-old woman who is married and has no children yet. She lives in a small village in the Koraput district of Odisha, India. Muni produces and sells vegetables in the community where she lives. She learned this line of work from her parents who dedicated themselves to this trade for many years. Muni’s work enables her to generate the necessary income for sustaining her family. She says that she enjoys her work because it is honest labor and it helps her feel useful in her community. Muni has more than two years of experience in this trade. She decided to organize a group so that she and her fellow group members could help one another and improve their standard of living. 

Muni will use her loan to buy supplies (such as fertilizer) and to pay for labor so that she can maintain her vegetable plants. She dreams of increasing her vegetable cultivation so that she can improve her income. She, along with her group members, is very thankful to Kiva and its lenders across the globe for this kind help and support.

loans.use: to purchase supplies and pay labor charges for her cropland.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase a new refrigerator, washing machine, and oven.

loans.name: Benkadi Ii Group

texts.fr: Les membres du groupe  BENKADI II  sont des femmes mariées  ayant une moyenne d’âge de  30 ans, 2 enfants et vivant toutes dans des  familles polygames à TIONCOURANI, commune de KADIANA, cercle de KOLONDIEBA, une des préfectures de la  3ème région administrative du Mali. Elles collaborent avec l’institution de microfinance Soro Yiriwaso afin de mener à bien leurs activités agricoles pendant l’hivernage. Elles sont à leur troisième prêt avec l’institution, les prêts passés ont été bien remboursés. La spéculation cultivée est  le riz et l’arachide  avec BIBA la personne debout au milieu sur la photo. Avec son prêt, elle compte acheter des intrants, la semence et payer les frais de labours pour exploiter  2 hectares. La production est vendue au niveau de  KADIANA après la récolte à une clientèle composée d’hommes et de femmes. BIBA compte faire un bénéfice de 95.000FCA qui lui permettra de payer son prêt et aussi d’aider son mari dans les dépenses quotidiennes.
texts.en:
The members of group Benkadi II are married women, who are on average 30 years old, with two children. They all live in polygamous families in Tioncourani, in Kadiana Township, Kolondieba circle (one of the prefectures of Mali's third administrative region). They collaborate with micro-finance organization Soro Yiriwaso in order to complete their farming activities during the rainy season. This is their third loan; previous loans were paid back without issues.

Biba, the person standing in the middle in the photo, cultivates rice and ground nuts. With her loan, she is planning to purchase fertilizers and seeds, and to pay labor costs to plow five acres.

The production is sold in Kadiana after the harvest, to a mixed-gender clientele. Biba is forecasting a profit of 95,000 XOF, which will allow her to pay back her loan and to help her husband with daily expenses.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and seeds and pay plowing costs for the farming season.

loans.name: Jaime Rafael

texts.es:
Jaime tiene 35 años de edad, es un hombre muy dedicado al trabajo de la agricultura y otros oficios, actualmente vive con su compañera de vida y sus 5 hijos entre edades de 3 a 10 años. Su esposa se dedica a los oficios del hogar mientras él sale a ejercer su trabajo como agricultor y en ocasiones como motorista. 


Jaime, tiene cultivado 2 hectáreas de maíz y además de la agricultura, tiene gran experiencia en el manejo de vehículos automotor, es por eso, que lo contratan muchas personas de la comunidad, para que les hagan viajes a la ciudad ya que le tiene gran confianza por su larga experiencia y sus valores.


Con el préstamo se le estará ayudando a Jaime, para que pueda comprar fertilizantes y así  poder fertilizar sus parcelas de maíz, ya que tiene una parte sin fertilizar pues con lo que compró no logro cubrir todo.

En un futuro él desearía poder establecer una pequeña granja de pollos de engorde en donde le apoyaría su esposa.
texts.en:
Jaime is 35 years old, he is a man who works very hard in agriculture and other jobs. He currently lives with his life partner and their 5 children who are between the ages of 3 and 10 years old. His wife takes care of the tasks at home while he goes out to perform his job as a farmer and on occasion as a driver. 

Jaime has planted 2 hectares of corn and, besides farming, also has a lot of experience in the operation of motorized vehicles. Because of this, he gets hired by many people in the community to make trips into town because they have great trust in him due to his long experience and his values.

This loan will be helping Jaime purchase fertilizers which will allow him to fertilize his corn plots.  A part of them has not been fertilized because the amount he purchased was not enough to cover everything.

In the future he wishes to establish a small farm to raise broilers where he would count with the support of his wife.

loans.use: purchase fertilizers allowing him to fertilize his corn plots

loans.name: Maria De Los Angeles

texts.es: María tiene 30 años de edad y habita  en casa propia junto a su esposo y sus dos hijos de 12 años y 6 años de edad quienes actualmente se encuentran estudiando. María se gana la vida por medio de la venta de ropa y zapatos desde hace mucho tiempo. Ella es una mujer emprendedora y visionaria quien desea ampliar su negocio por lo que ha tomado la decisión de solicitar este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en el negocio en la compra de variedad de zapatos y prendas de vestir con el fin  e aumentar las ventas y sus ingresos.
texts.en: María is thirty years old and lives in her own house with her husband and two children, 12 and 6 years old, who are in school right now. Maria has earned her living for awhile by selling clothes and shoes. She is an industrious and visionary woman who wants to expand her business. For that reason, she has taken the decision to request this loan from FUSAI to invest in the business to buy a variety of shoes and clothes with the goal of increasing her sales and income.

loans.use: to buy shoes and clothing for the business

loans.name: Cruz Antonia

texts.es: Cruz de 34 años de edad, vive con su grupo familiar conformado por su esposo y sus hijos, ella se dedica desde hace varios años a la crianza de pollos de engorde, con lo que obtiene de sus ventas logra solventar algunas necesidades que se le presentan en su hogar, Cruz solicita un crédito para la compra de pollos y más concentrado para engordarlos y luego comercializarlos, y asi poder darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Cruz is 34 years old and lives with her family made up of her husband and children. She has worked for several years raising chickens. She uses what she gets from her sales to pay for some of the necessities she has at home. 

Cruz is asking for a loan to buy chickens and feed to fatten them up and sell them, helping her to give her family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy chickens and more feed to fatten them up

loans.name: Raquel

texts.es: Raquel, está soltera, tiene la edad de 36 años y actualmente vive solo en su casa. Ella con el crédito va comprar los insumos para la asistencia de su plantación y comprar abonos y plaguicidas necesarios para obtener una buena cosecha. Ella se dedica desde hace varios años atrás a estos trabajos y espera poder aumentar la producción y generar más ingresos económicos para bienestar propio y mantener un o realizar un ahorro para situaciones en el futuro. Es el primer  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. Ella no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en:
Raquel is 36 years old, single, and lives in her own home.

She has requested this loan to buy fertilizers and pesticides to care for her corn and bean crops. She hopes to obtain a good harvest.

She has done this work for a number of years and hopes to increase her production and earn more income. She would like to improve her living conditions and save some money for situations in the future.

This is the first loan she has received from FUDECOSUR. She has not previously had other loans from state banks, but FUDECOSUR has provided her the loan with better terms and a much lower rate of interest.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and pesticides to care for her corn and bean crops.

loans.name: Hugo

texts.es:
Hugo es un hombre muy trabajador, tiene 46 años de edad y vive en Huanuco junto a su familia. Tiene 4 hijos por quienes lucha día a día para poder brindarles un futuro mejor.
Desde hace 4 años se dedica a la agricultura, cultivando principalmente el cacao, le va muy bien porque es una persona muy responsable, tiene experiencia y conocimientos sobre el cultivo de cacao y por eso ofrece productos de primera calidad y a un precio accesible.
Hugo está agradecido con los prestamistas Kiva porque con el apoyo que le han brindado él podrá comprar insumos como fertilizantes y plaguicidas para poder realizar el mantenimiento de sus cultivos y así producir frutos de excelente calidad. Con esto y las ganancias que pueda obtener por las ventas podrá ampliar sus cultivos y tener más ingresos.
texts.en:
Hugo is very hardworking. He is 46 years old and lives in Huanuco with his family. He has four children. He works very hard every day so he can provide his children a better future.

He has worked for four years in agriculture, growing principally cacao. It is going very well for him, because he is a very responsible person, and he has experience and knowledge about growing cacao. For this reason, he is able to offer high-quality products at affordable prices.

Hugo is grateful to Kiva lenders, because with the support of this loan, he will be able to buy agricultural inputs such as fertilizers and pesticides to care for his cacao trees. He hopes to grow excellent quality beans.

With this loan and the profits he earns from selling his crop, he hopes to plant more cacao trees and increase his income.

loans.use: to buy agricultural inputs such as fertilizers and pesticides to care for his cacao trees.

loans.name: María Celsa

texts.es:
María tiene 35 años de edad, es una mujer muy luchadora, en su vida ha tenido que enfrentar una serie de dificultades, entre ellas la situación económica en que sus padres vivían, razón por la cual decidió abandonar sus estudios de noveno grado. Actualmente vive con sus 2 hijos quienes son menores de edad, ella ha luchado para poder sacarlos adelante, pues su padre tuvo que salir del país para buscar empleo y poder apoyarlos.

María se ha dedicado al comercio desde hace 6 años, ella atendía su pequeña tienda, la cual tuvo que cerrar por falta de capital y por la ausencia de su esposo, lo que hacia difícil de mantenerla activa.
 
Ella necesita el crédito para invertir nuevamente en su antigua tienda, en la que espera tener bebidas refrescantes, pan, golosinas y otros productos que son parte de la alimentación diaria.


Su sueño es que sus hijos puedan tener mejores condiciones de las que ella tuvo, y así sacarlos adelante dándoles la alimentación diaria y el estudio.
texts.en:
Maria is 35 years old and is a very hard working woman. In her life she has had to face a series of difficulties, among them the economic situation in which her parents lived, which was the reason she decided to abandon her studies in the ninth grade. Currently she lives with her two children who are underage, she has worked hard to provide for them as their father had to leave the country to look for employment to be able to support them. 
Maria has been in commerce for 6 years, she used to run a small shop which she had to close due to a lack of capital and the absence of her husband which made maintaining it difficult. 
She needs the loan to invest again in her old shop in which she hopes to have refreshing beverages, bread, candies and other products that make up a part of daily nutrition. 
Her dream is for her sons to have better conditions that she had and in this way help them make progress by providing their daily nutrition and education.

loans.use: invest once again in her old shop in which she hopes to have refreshing beverages, bread, candies and other products that make up daily nutrition

loans.name: Hilda

texts.es:
Hilda tiene 54 años de edad, su nivel académico es bajo pero aprendió a leer y escribir, ella es divorciada, tiene 3 hijos que ya son mayores y han formado sus propios hogares. 

Ella tiene un negocio de costura, trabaja con las escuelas públicas elaborando los uniformes de los niños y niñas, tiene mas de 30 años de realizar este oficio, y así es como sacó adelante a sus hijos. Antes ella tenía ganado y también se dedicaba a la crianza y engorde de cerdos.
 
Hilda necesita el crédito para comprar una vaca parida, y así obtener la leche y la cuajada en la casa.

Ella sueña con mejorar su casa, ver crecer a sus nietos, y que sean personas de bien.
texts.en:
Hilda is 54 years old. She has very little education, but she learned to read and write. She is divorced with three adult children who have their own homes. 
She has a tailoring business. She works with public schools to make school uniforms for boys and girls. She has worked in this field for 30 years and it enabled her to raise her children. She used to have cattle and she also raised and fattened pigs. Hilda needs a loan in order to buy a dairy cow in order to get milk and cheese for her home. She dreams of improving her house and seeing her grandchildren grow and become good people.

loans.use: to buy a dairy cow.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy agricultural products (fertilizers and pesticides) to maintain his crops and expand his sown land.

loans.name: Harriet

texts.en:
Harriet is thirty-five years old and lives in Bundibugyo, Uganda. She is married and has four children.

After realizing some small savings from her cocoa selling, she decided to start selling fish to improve on her income. Due to high demand in the area for fish as the main source of food, she has made enough profits to sustain her and the family. She dreams of educating her children to higher institutions and living a better life.

Harriet needs a loan to buy fish for selling.

loans.use: to buy fish for selling.

loans.name: Sokhorn's Group

texts.en:
Sokhorn is 25 years old and lives with her husband and one child in a rural village of the Moung Russey district. Rice farming is the only main source for her family’s income. She has been farming rice for several years, about fifteen years. The current business earns her family the daily income of about 30,000 KHR, but she is able to save 20,000 KHR each day. 

This is the second loan for Sokhorn with VisionFund. Now she is leading her group to ask for a loan. As the leader, she is going to use her portion to buy fertilizers and seeds for her farmland. She hopes to grow more crops so as to make a living better.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and seeds for her farmland.

loans.name: Godfrey

texts.en:
Godfrey lives in Hoima, Uganda. He is thirty-five years old and married with six children. He has a retail shop, which he started with an aim of diversifying his family income. He earns additional income from building (builder) and farming. 

He hopes to diversify his business. However, seasonal weather is a major setback.

He wants a loan to grow maize and rice.

loans.use: to grow maize and rice.

loans.name: Marta Esperanza

texts.es:
Marta de 40 años de edad, estudió hasta 6º grado, está casada y su esposo se dedica a la compra y procesamiento de leche de ganado y también trabaja en la agricultura, tiene 2 hijos que estudian y son los únicos que dependen de ella.   

Ella tiene el negocio de engorde de cerdos desde hace 23 años, su esposo tiene el mismo tiempo de realizar el procesamiento de leche, es de allí que sale el suero el cual sirve de alimento para los cerdos, en el trabajo se involucran sus hijos, todo con el fin de salir adelante.
 

El crédito que Marta solicita a CrediCampo lo necesita para cancelar 14 cerdos pequeños, el resto del dinero lo ocupará para comprar harinilla para la alimentación de los mismos.
   
Ella planea para un futuro tener una buena crianza de cerdos para no buscar afuera y también darle estudio a su hijo menor para que se gane la vida de una mejor manera.
texts.en:
Marta is 40 years old. She studied through the sixth grade. She is married and her husband buys and processes cow milk and also works in agriculture. She has two children who go to school and they are the only people who depend on her. She has raised pigs for 23 years. Her husband has processed milk for the same amount of time and this produces the serum that she feeds the pigs. Her children are involved in her work as the goal is to get ahead. 

Marta is applying for a loan from CrediCampo in order to pay for 14 small pigs. The rest of the money will be used to buy wheat to feed them. In the future, she plans to breed pigs in order to avoid buying them from outside sources and also to enable her younger son to study so her can earn a living in the best way possible.

loans.use: to pay for 14 small pigs. The rest of the money will be used to buy wheat to feed them.

loans.name: Nary

texts.en:
Nary lives in a village along the Mekong River, about 15 kilometers from Phnom Penh City. She has two children, one son and one daughter who both attend school. 
Nary is a weaver while her husband is a construction worker. She wants to continue her weaving because it is a traditional profession. So, she decided to apply for a loan to buy weaving materials.

loans.use: To buy materials for her weaving business.

loans.name: Weldon

texts.en:
Weldon is a 30-year-old farmer who resides in Elburgon, a village in the highlands part of Kenya in Rift Valley. He is a hardworking farmer who has been doing farming for the past two years. Each year, he has been making tremendous strides in terms of profit margins. Through his passion for farming, Weldon has always been making profits since the day he started farming two years ago.

Weldon is seeking a KES 40,000 loan to purchase a greenhouse, which will help him improve his profit and crop production levels. Weldon already has experience in farming; this gives him a high advantage because he will be able to put the loan to good use in greenhouse farming.

Through this loan, Weldon is positive that his life will improve and that he will be able to get out of the poverty levels that he is currently facing. The greenhouse will improve the crop yields because Weldon will be planting tomatoes and passion fruits and selling them in the local market, hence making more money than he was making earlier.

loans.use: to construct a greenhouse.

loans.name: Rehema

texts.en:
Rehema is a married woman with one child who attends school. She lives at her own house that neither has piped water nor electricity. 

Rehema has operated a beauty salon business for the past four years. Her potential customers are women. 

With the loan, she wants to purchase braids, weaves, hair chemicals, hair oil, shampoo, and hair conditioners. She decided to join Yehu to get financial support to improve her business.

loans.use: to purchase braids, weaves, hair chemicals, hair oil, shampoo, and hair conditioners.

loans.name: Deng's Group

texts.en:
Deng is a 48-year-old widow who lives in a rural village in Dambae district of Kampong Cham province. She has two children. To support her family, she has struggled to grow cassava for thirty years. She is able to earn about 58,000KHR per day to meet the family needs. 

Deng has been with VisionFund for one cycle and completely paid back the loan. Now, she is leading her group to seek another loan to buy fertilizers for her farmland. She hopes to make more rice crops, so as to improve her standard of living.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers for her farmland.

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Tbaung Khmum district

loans.name: Robert

texts.en:
Robert lives in Hoima, Uganda and runs a hardware business where he sells household items made of steel and iron. He supplements the hardware shop with milk selling. 

He hopes to expand his business into new markets. However, high transport costs hinder his business. 

He is a married, hardworking man charged with a responsibility of taking care of eight children aged between 25 and 14; four attend school.

He is accessing credit to buy saucepans and other items to sell.

loans.use: to buy saucepans and other items to sell.

loans.name: Okibat

texts.ru:
Окибат, родилась 1971году в городе Исфаре, в кишлаке Кулькент, в семье рабочих. После окончании школы она сразу вышла замуж за любимого человека. У них была крепкая любовь. У этой счастливой семье родились 3 прекрасных детей. После того, как вышла замуж, начался кризис и с финансовой части начались проблемы. И Окибат  начала продавать детскую одежду.
В течении 5ти лет она занимается  торговлей. Она так хорошо изучила торговлю. Сначала были проблемы с торговлей, но со временем она научилась торговаться и начала хорошо зарабатывать для себя и на семью. С декабря месяца 2012 года она является активным клиентом организации ООО МДО "Арванд". В очередной раз  она хочет взять кредит в Арванде и  расширить свой бизнес для улучшения семейных обстоятельств. На полученный кредит Окибат хочет купить новый ассортимент товара детской одежды.
texts.en:
Okibat was born in 1971 in the city of Isfara, in the rural settlement Kulkent, into a working family. After finishing school, she got married right away to her loved one. They had a strong love, and to this happy family, three beautiful children were born. 

After Okibat got married, the crisis started and they got problems with their financials. Okibat started selling children's clothing. She was working with retail for a period of five years. She learnt retail very well. In the beginning she had problems with the sales, however with time she learnt the trade and started to earn well for herself and her family. 

Okibat has been an active client of the organization "MDO Arvand" since December 2012. Once again, she would like to take a loan from Arvand and expand her business to improve the family's circumstances. Okibat would like to purchase a new assortment of children's clothing for the loan received.

loans.use: to purchase children's clothing

loans.name: Rana Mosa Group

texts.en:
This group is called Rana Mosa. It consists of four women from Hodeidah, Yemen. They applied for a loan of 80,000 YER from AMB.

Ashgan is the leader of the group. She is a 39-year-old married woman living with her family in Hodeidah, Yemen. She completed her elementary education, but she couldn't finish her studies. Ashgan decided to start her own business selling accessories, cosmetics, and perfumes door to door. She has worked in this business for three years. She earns good profits and continues to expand. Ashgan asked for a loan of 20,000 YER from AMB, in order to purchase more of perfumes, accessories, and makeup for resale.

Ashgan looks forward to expanding her business by purchasing a variety of perfumes, accessories and makeup.

loans.use: to purchase more of perfumes, accessories, and makeup for resale.

loans.name: Yim's Group

texts.en:
Yim, age 29, lives in a rural area located in Kampong Cham province’s Prey Chhor district. She has seven children. Yim and her husband are farmers who have been farming rice and raising chickens and ducks for 26 years, in order to make a living. Besides these agribusinesses, her husband also works as a teacher in the local area. 

Yim has been with VisionFund for three cycles and completely paid back the loans, which have helped improve her livelihood from cycle to cycle. Now, she is leading her group to seek a new loan. As the leader, she will use this loan to buy fertilizers and pesticides for her rice paddy. She will also use a portion of it for labor and gasoline, to carry water into the rice field. She hopes this loan will enable her to grow greater quantities of healthy rice and improve her family’s living standard.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and pesticides for her rice paddy.

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Prey Chhor district

loans.name: Hasan

texts.en:
Hasan is a 19-year-old single man from Jabalia city. He lives with his family in a small house. One year ago, Hasan started his own business selling fruits and vegetables from a cart. It is a profitable business and the demand is high. Hasan would like to improve his business. 

Hasan borrowed a USD loan from FATEN. This loan will help him to buy more fruits and vegetables for his resale business. By taking this loan, Hasan will be able to increase his inventory and also his sales. Hasan appears in the photo while he was working.

loans.use: to buy more fruits and vegetables for his resale business.

loans.name: Leomar

texts.en: Leomar is a 33-years-old widow who has four young children. He only generates income by providing transport services to the people in his village. He wants to keep increasing his income to meet the needs of his children. He is now asking for a loan of PHP 5,000 to buy gasoline and maintain the motorcycle. He hopes to ensure safe travel to his passengers and earn good profits for his family.

loans.use: to buy gasoline and maintain his motorcycle.

loans.name: Marites

texts.en:
Marites is 51 years old and married with five children, one in school. She is a very hard-working entrepreneur.  

Marites has a business selling personal care products in the Philippines. Marites requested a PHP 25,000 loan amount through NWTF to purchase more personal care products to sell.

Marites has been in this business for two years. In the future, Marites would like to save enough money to build and expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more personal care products to sell.

loans.name: Virginia

texts.en:
Virginia is 54 years old and married with three children. Virginia works very hard to provide for her family.

Virginia runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 18,000 loan through NWTF to buy more groceries to sell.

Virginia has been in this business for 10 years and sells a variety of items such as sugar, soap, and other groceries. 

In the future, Virginia would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy more groceries to sell.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy farming supplies such as manure and insecticide

loans.name: Fatuma

texts.en: Fatuma is a married mother of two school-aged children. She operates a clothing resale business and dreams of one day owning her own boutique. Fatuma greatly appreciates Kiva lenders for their financial assistance. She is requesting a loan to purchase more bales of clothes for resale. She thanks Yehu for their financial support.

loans.use: to purchase more bales of clothes for resale.

loans.name: Somia Al- Bina Group

texts.en:
This group is called Somia Al- Bina and consists of six women. They all live in traditional families in Sana'a, Yemen. They know one another through friendship and neighborhood connections. They applied for a loan of 330,000 YER from AMB. 
Somia, a 25-year-old married woman, is the leader of the group. Somia lives with her family in their own house. She is very dynamic and vigorous. Her husband is the sole breadwinner of the family. In time, he would like to accumulate enough money to purchase a piece of land. Somia supported him with a lot of her own money. Many years ago, Somia and her husband built their own house on the land they are buying. Now, the family lives in their own house, but it is in need of inside renovation. As a result, Somia is requesting a loan of 60,000 YER from AMB. She will use the loan to purchase construction materials, such as cement, to renovate the house. Somia's dream is to build a second floor for the house.

loans.use: to purchase construction materials, such as cement, to renovate the house from the inside.

loans.name: Hadija

texts.en:
Hadija is a married woman with eight children, three in school and five adults. She owns a house that neither has electricity nor piped water. 

Hadija has operated a business selling cashew nuts at the market for the past 20 years, selling to passersby and neighbors. She cited seasonality as her major challenge in the business.

With the loan, she wants to purchase sacks of cashew nuts for resale.She joined Yehu to boost her business.

loans.use: to purchase sacks of cashew nuts for resale.

loans.name: Lili Group

texts.en:
Imelda is the featured borrower of Lili Group. She joined the other group members to acquire a loan from Kiva's field partner Al Majmoua. They left their homes in the Philippines to work as housekeepers to support their families.
Imelda is a 48-year-old divorced mother of two who works as a housekeeper to support her beloved children in the Philippines. Her acquired loan will be sent to her children to pay school tuition fees.
Imelda is wearing the yellow top in the center of the picture, posing with the two other group members.  Arlene is on the right wearing a pink top and Neresa is on the left side of the picture.

loans.use: To pay for her children's school tuition fees

loans.name: Petronela

texts.en: Petronela is a 46-year-old widow who has two daughters and a son. She works as a hairdresser in a small salon. Her children are Elvi, 23 years old; Erni, 21 years old; and Yan, 13 years old. Her daughter Elvi, works as a non-permanent employee of the Sanitation Department, Erni works as a private employee of a cooperative while Yan is a first grade student in junior high school. As a widow, Petronela must work extra hard to support her three children. Besides working as a hairdresser, she also has a business selling fried corn (jagung goreng) at small kiosk in her neighborhood. Currently, her only son, Yan, is about to start new academic year entering the second grade of junior high school. Yan needs money to pay the school fees, to purchase books, uniforms and other school items. However, Petronela  lacks money to do so. Therefore, she applied for an individual loan of IDR 3,000,000 to fulfill those schooling requirements.

loans.use: to pay her children school fees.

loans.name: Antonia

texts.es: Antonia tiene 49 años de edad y habita en casa propia junto a sus dos hijos de 14 años y 19 años de edad. Antonia se gana la vida por medio de la venta antojitos típicos como: yuca frita, tamales, pasteles de carne, pupusas, etc. El negocio lo tiene desde hace 19 años y es así como logra llevar el sustento a su hogar. Con el deseo de mejorar sus condiciones habitacionales ha tomado la decisión de solicitar este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de tejas, lámina galvanizada, polines y madera para cambiar el techo de la vivienda dado que se encuentra deteriorado.
texts.en: Antonia is 49 years old and lives in a house that she owns with her two children, who are aged 19 and 14 years old respectively. Antonia makes a living selling typical snack foods, such as fried yucca, tamales, meat pastries, “pupusas” (stuffed corn tortillas) and more. Antonia has had the business for 19 years and, with it, she has been able to support her household. With a desire to improve her living conditions, Antonia has decided to apply from this loan from “FUSAI” in order to buy tiles, laminated metal sheeting, purlins and wood, in order to change the roof on her home, which has deteriorated in condition.

loans.use: to buy tiles, laminated metal sheeting, purlins and wood, in order to change the roof on her home.

loans.name: María Ester

texts.es:
María tiene 74 años de edad, no tuvo la oportunidad de estudiar debido a que su familia era muy pobre, pero a pasar de todo ella aprendió a leer y escribir, estuvo casada por un tiempo pero su pareja la abandonó, tiene 3 hijos que ya formaron sus propios hogares, por lo tanto María vive sola.

Ella tiene una granja de pollos que cuida y engorda y luego los aliña para la venta, la necesidad de tener un ingreso para el hogar la motivó a trabajar con especies menores, por lo que hoy en día ha adquirido una buena clientela, para todo tipo de actividades que se realizan, es a ella a quien le encargan los pollos cuando. La granja la tiene en su casa y vende aproximadamente 100 pollos al mes, y cuando no tiene encargo María contrata a alguien para que se los vaya a vender de casa en casa.
     

El préstamo lo necesita para comprar 200 pollos, también comprará concentrado para la alimentación de los pollos, de esta forma se le estará ayudando a María a que tenga el capital de trabajo y tenga como cubrir la demanda de pollos.

Ella sueña con tener lo mas necesario para vivir, por lo que espera trabajar siempre mientras Dios le regale salud y vida.
texts.en:
María is 74 years old and didn't have the opportunity to go to school as her family was very poor. In spite of everything she learned to read and write. She was married for a while but her husband abandoned her. She has 3 grown children, and María lives alone.

She has a chicken farm where she raises, fattens, and sells chickens. The need for an income to support her living expenses motivated her to work with raising a small animal. Today she has a good customer base, and whenever they need chicken it is she whom they seek. Her farm is at her home and she sells approximately 100 chickens per month. When she doesn't have any orders, María contracts someone who sells them house to house.

María seeks a loan to buy 200 chickens and chicken feed, and in this way María will have the working capital to sustain her business and meet her customer demand. She dreams of having what she needs in order to live day to day, and she hopes to work as long as God gifts her health and life.

loans.use: to buy 200 chickens and chicken feed.

loans.name: Yolanda

texts.es: La señora Yolanda es una persona de escasos recursos, es soltera y no tiene hijos, vivía junto con su madre hasta su fallecimiento y con su hermana que ahora se fue a otra ciudad quedando ella sola dedicándose a la costura, tiene experiencia en el rubro y poco a poco fue desarrollándose, ahora se dedica a la confección de prendas de vestir en especial poleras de manga corta, poleras de manga larga y musculosas de hombre vendiendo a personas acorde a la temporada, solicita un crédito para la compra de material y máquina de costura ya que quiere agrandar su taller porque las prendas que realiza son bien comercializadas ya que son aceptadas por el acabado y puntualidad de entrega de cada pedido de esa manera cubrirá todos sus gastos y podrá seguir invirtiendo en capital para su trabajo.
texts.en:
Sra. Yolanda is a person with limited resources. She is single and has no children. Yolanda lived with her mother before her death. Her sister moved to another city, which left her alone to engage in sewing. Yolanda has experience in this line of work and gradually improved her skills. She now produces short-sleeve shirts, long-sleeve shirts, and men’s muscle shirts and sells them to the public according to the season.

Yolanda is requesting a loan in order to buy materials and a sewing machine so that she can expand her workshop. Her clothes are selling well and have been recognized because they are well-made and each order is delivered on time. Yolanda’s income will enable her to cover all of her expenses and allow her to continue investing capital into her work.

loans.use: to buy materials and a sewing machine.

loans.name: Rene Orlando

texts.es:
Rene  es un joven muy trabajador de 22 años de edad, se dedica a los oficios de albañil y en algunas veces apoya a su pareja que presta sus servicios como vendedora en una pequeña tienda ubicada en el mercado municipal, viven junto con sus padres y hermanos.

Rene aprendió el oficio de albañil desde sus 15 años de edad, pues la situación económica en que vivía, obligaba a que desarrollara tal actividad para poder aportar en los gastos del hogar ya que su padre se dedica solamente a la agricultura.
 
Él necesita el crédito para establecer una venta de pizza, él tiene conocimientos sobre este negocio pues trabajó 2 años de ayudante en otro negocio parecido. Por el momento él cuenta con una parte del capital pero no es suficientes para establecer su negocio y es por tal razón que el solicita apoyo. 


Su sueño es poder establecer un negocio fuerte con el que pueda apoyar a su esposa y poder construir su propia vivienda, donde puedan crecer sus hijos con las condiciones necesarias.
texts.en:
Rene is a hard-working 22 year old young man who works as a bricklayer and at times supports his wife as a vendor in a small store located in the municipal market. They live with his parents and siblings. Rene learned about bricklaying when he was 15 years old, and at the time his economic situation found him in a position to have to work in order to support his family's expenses as his father was simply a farmer.

Rene needs a loan to start a business selling pizza. He worked in a similar business for 2 years and has knowledge about this kind of business. At the moment he has part of the capital but it is not enough to start a business so he is seeking a loan. His dream is to be able to establish a strong business with the help of his wife and be able to build their own home where they can raise their children in living conditions that meet their basic needs.

loans.use: to start a business selling pizza.

loans.name: Firuzjon

texts.ru: Фирузчон  родился в городе ИСФАРЕ, ему 42-года, имеет 2-детей. Он очень трудолюбивый человек, занимается откормом и купли-продажей крупно-рогатого скота. Этой своей деятельностью он кормить свою семью и его доход является основной в ее семье. С целью улучшения своей доходности Фируз собирается увеличить количество крупно-рогатого скотов путем дальнейшего откорма и продажи. По этому пользуясь финансовой услугой Арванд, он хочет получить  кредит чтобы купить и откармливать коров. Заранее выражает благодарность  Арванд за финансовую поддержку.
texts.en:
Firuzjon was born in the city of Isfara. He is 42 years old and has two children. He is a hardworking man, who works with breeding and selling cattle. Through this activity he feeds his family and his income is the main income for them. 

With an aim to improve his family's conditions, Firuzjon decided to increase the number of cattle for further fattening and reselling. Therefore he needs Arvand's financial services. He would like to get a loan to purchase and breed cattle. He expresses gratitude in advance to Arvand for the financial support.

loans.use: to purchase cattle

loans.name: Silver

texts.en:
Silver deals in general merchandise, mainly sugar, soap and cosmetics in Hoima, Uganda. He is married with three children and two of them attend school. He started his career as a farmer, but sold his rice and started a retail shop in 2011. The business has grown steadily to date. He is a hard-working man who wishes to give his children a quality education. Limited capital and debtors who take too long to pay sometimes hinder his business. 
He is acquiring credit to buy more sugar, soap and cosmetics to sell.

loans.use: to buy more sugar, soap and cosmetics to sell.

loans.name: Joseph

texts.en:
Beautiful people! Meet Joseph, a 46-year-old happily married father of three boys and one girl. From a remote village in Molo, he has been farming crops and raising poultry for six years, a livelihood that enables him to support his family. Through hard work, Joseph has always been able to put food on the table and ensure that his children get the best education possible. 

Joseph is requesting a KES 40000 loan to purchase a greenhouse that he anticipates will increase his crop yield by 80%. Joseph’s dream is to see his family emerge from poverty and his children get as much education as they can, a chance that he never had because his parents were poor and couldn't send him to school. He says that education is the best gift that a parent can give to his or her child.

loans.use: To buy a greenhouse

loans.name: Krisia Mireya

texts.es:
Krisia tiene 32 años de edad, sacó estudios superiores de Técnico en Computación, pero por el momento no trabaja porque está cuidando a los, niños. Ella está casada, ha procreado 2 hijos y nadie mas depende de ella.   
  
Por el momento Krisia solo tiene ingresos de su padre y del esposo, antes trabajó en un banco desempeñando la profesión que ella estudió, pero uno de sus hijos se enfermó y por lo tanto se ha dedicado a cuidarlo. 

Ella necesita el crédito para mandar a hacer las ventanas de la casa porque por el momento se sienten inseguros por tanta delincuencia que existe en el país, y también para poner un broquel a un pozo artesanal porque en la zona no hay agua  potable. 

Ella sueña con tener una vivienda adecuada para los niños, darles una buena educación para que puedan defenderse en un futuro.
texts.en:
Krisia is 32 years old and studied computing. She is not currently working, however, as she looks after her children. Krisia is married; she has two children but nobody else depends on her.

Krisia’s only income for the moment comes from her father and husband. She previously worked in a bank, practising the profession she learned at college. One of her children, though, took ill, and she now spends her time looking after him.

Krisia needs this loan in order to order windows for her house as she currently feels unsafe in her house because of the crime levels in her country. She will also use this loan to install a shield for the wall that she needs because there is no drinking water in the local area.

Krisia dreams of having a good house for her children, and of giving them a good up-bringing so that they can look after themselves in the future.

loans.use: to order windows for her house and install a shield for the well.

loans.name: Suhrob

texts.ru:
Сухробу 32 года. Он женат и является отцом двоих прекрасных детей. Сухроб очень трудолюбивый молодой человек , который заботится о своей семье и пытается как может создать хорошие условия для жизнедеятельности своей семьи.
Он рано остался без родителей и рано стал самостоятельным человеком способным поддержать своих младших сестер и  свою семью. Он на протяжении более пяти лет является клиентом "Арванд" и пользуется услугами нашей организации, у него хорошая кредитная история. Жена Сухроба также помогает ему и не сидит без дела , она шьет на заказ национальную одежду и тем самым вносит свой вклад в бюджет семьи. 
 Сухроб занимается продажей овощей, фруктов и бахчевых. В сезон созревания урожая он хочет для расширения бизнеса взять кредит и так как доволен услугами "Арванд"-а он повторно обратился в Арванд и заранее благодарит  за поддержке.
texts.en:
Suhrob is 32. He is married and has two beautiful children. He is a very hardworking young man who takes care of his family and tries to create good living conditions for them.

He was left without parents at an early age and became an independent person who was able to support his younger sisters and family. He has been a client of Arvand for over five years and has a good credit history. His wife helps him and contributes to the family budget by taking custom orders to sew traditional clothing. 

Suhrob sells vegetables, fruits, and melons. He wants to expand his business in the ripening season by taking out another loan with Arvand. He is satisfied with their services and thanks the organization in advance for their support.

loans.use: to buy fruit

loans.name: Sat's Group

texts.en:
Sat was selected to be the group leader for a loan from MAXIMA. In the group, there are four members: Sat, Engly, Sas and Kimseng. They live in a village across the Mekong River about twenty kilometers from Phnom Penh City. 

Sat, age 40, is a cleaner for a company. She has six children, three sons and three daughters. Two of her children are married, one is a cleaner, and the others are in school. Her husband is a construction worker.

When she is not at school, one of Sat’s daughters also weaves at home. So, Sat applied for a loan in order to buy weaving materials for her daughter. 

Sat is on the left, next is Sas, then Kimseng and Engly.

loans.use: to buy weaving materials for her daughter’s weaving business.

loans.name: Leonelyn

texts.en:
As a married mother of two children, Leonelyn works hard to support her family.

She earns a living by raising pigs in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from tricycle transportation. Leonelyn is borrowing PHP 16,000 through NWTF, in order to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs.

Leonelyn has been sustaining her business activities through her past five loans from NWTF and, more recently, through Kiva. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream of saving enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs.

loans.name: Analyn

texts.en:
Analyn is a 31-year-old married woman with two children, both in school. She is a very hard-working entrepreneur, running a metal shop business in the Philippines. Analyn requested a PHP 15,000 loan amount through NWTF to buy new tools and equipment.

Analyn has been in this business for two years. In the future, Analyn would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy new tools and equipment.

loans.name: Magdalena

texts.en:
Magdalena is 27 years old and married with two children, one of whom is in school. She is a very hard working entrepreneur.

She has a bag-making business in the Philippines, and she requested a PHP 10,000 loan amount through NWTF in order to buy additional raw materials for her bag-making.

Magdalena has been in this business for four years. In the future, she would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy additional raw materials for her bag-making.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy seedlings and supplies.

loans.name: Fatuma

texts.en:
Fatuma is a married woman with two children, one in school and one underage. She owns a house that neither has electricity nor piped water. 

Fatuma has operated a business selling cashew nuts at the market for the past three years, selling to passersby and neighbors. She cited seasonality as her major challenge in the business.

With the loan, she wants to purchase sacks of cashew nuts and use the rest of the money for transportation costs .She joined Yehu to boost her business.

loans.use: to purchase sacks of cashew nuts and use the rest of the money for transportation costs

loans.name: Jackson

texts.en:
Hello lenders! Jackson is 40 years old and lives in a small town called Molo, which is located in the Rift Valley of Kenya. He has three children and has been doing mixed farming for four years.  His primary source of income is milk, eggs, tea and crops farming. Through mixed farming, Jackson has been able to single-handedly raise his family, because his wife is not employed.
 
The most profitable part of his mixed farming is dairy farming, but the biggest challenge facing Jackson is lack of finances. Jackson is a very hard-working farmer, given that he is able to raise animals while also crop farming. This would be a tall order for most farmers.

Jackson is asking for a loan of KES 40,000 to purchase a motorbike that he will use to transport his farm produce to the market. Due to the poor feeder roads in the area, most farm produce reaches the market when it is not fresh. Then, customers will not buy the goods or they are sold at a throw away price. Jackson's income is impacted and he is not be able to take proper care of his family. This loan will have a turnaround effect on Jackson and his family, by providing them with basic human needs.

Jackson has confidence that this loan will help his business grow and, as a result, the profits generated will be used to improve the living standards of his family. Also, people in his community will benefit, as he will be able to employ more staff on his farm.

loans.use: to buy a motorcycle.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy pigs.

loans.name: Abdulla

texts.ru:
Абдулла мудрый и трудолюбивый мужчина в возрасте 54 лет. Он женат и имеет четверых детей. Со своей дружной семьей он живет в сельской местности. У него и его жены образование среднее. Так как их семья многодетная у жены Абдулла дома хлопот много и поэтому она является домохозяйкой. Старший сын Абдуллы находится в РФ на заработках. Сам Абдула старается много работать, чтобы приносить в дом заработок, который будет тратиться на удовлетворение нужд семьи.

Чтобы иметь постоянный доход на достойное проживание, Абдулла занимается своим делом. Он занимается разведением и продажей скот. Он покупает крупно рогатый скот и продает его.
