Также семья Абдуллы продает молоко, полученное от скота. В данный момент Абдулла хочет увеличить количество скота, чтобы иметь больше дохода для своей семьи. Поэтому он обратился в Арванд с просьбой получить кредит на покупку скота. Абдулла благодарит Арванд за поддержку.
texts.en:
Abdulla is a wise and hardworking man of the age of 54. He is married and has four children. He lives in a rural village together with his friendly family. He and his wife have secondary education. As they have many children, Abdulla's wife has a lot of work at home and therefore she is a housewife. Abdulla's eldest son is in the Russian Federation as a migrant worker. 

Abdulla works a lot in order to bring home earnings, which will be used to meet the needs of the family. In order to have a stable income for living costs, Abdulla has his own business. He works with breeding and selling cattle. He purchases cattle and sells them. Abdulla's family also sells milk from the cattle. 

Currently Abdulla would like to increase the number of cattle, in order to get a larger income for his family. Therefore he turned to Arvand with a loan request to purchase cattle. Abdulla thanks Arvand for the support.

loans.use: to purchase cattle

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase the tools and machines that he needs for his auto repair shop

loans.name: Telma Maribel

texts.es:
Telma tiene 28 años de edad, estudió hasta bachillerato, la falta de recursos económicos no le permitió seguir, por lo que se dedicó al comercio,  está acompañada, su pareja es policía y trabaja en la misma zona donde vive, y aún no han procreado hijos.


Telma tiene una tienda en la que vende todo lo necesario para la cocina, ya tiene cinco años de realizar esta actividad, la necesidad la llevó a iniciar una fuente de ingresos extras, por lo que decidió poner la tienda, no tiene otra actividad a la que se dedique, la tienda la tiene en su casa por lo que no tiene que recorrer distancias, una hermana atiende cuando ella no está y el horario de atención es de 6:00 am a 8:00 pm. 



El préstamo lo necesita para invertir en el negocio, comprará más productos para la venta, ya que cuando compra por mayoreo le dan descuentos especiales en los productos.

Sus sueños son incrementar las ventas y  poner un chalet en la parada de buses.
texts.en:
Telma is 28 years old, she studied to the end of high school but the lack of economic resources meant she could not continue, so she began to earn a living in business. She has a partner who is a policeman and works in the area where they live. They do not yet have any children.

Telma has a shop in which she sells everything needed for the kitchen. She has been running it for five years. She needed an extra source of income, which is why she decided to set up the shop. She does not have any other work, she runs the shop from her home so does not have to travel. A sister minds the shop when she is not there. It opens from 6am until 8pm.

She needs the loan to invest in her business, to buy more products to sell, as when she buys wholesale she gets special discounts on products.

Her dreams are to increase her sales and have a stall at the bus stop.

loans.use: to invest in her business. She will buy more products to sell.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to settle her engagement fees.

loans.name: Ayub

texts.en:
Ayub is a single young man of 24 years. He is still living with his parents and his two brothers and two sisters. 

His sister Fenti is 22, and works as a shopkeeper; Melki, his 17-year-old brother, dropped out of school when he was in the second year of senior high school; Yudi, a second brother, is 15, and studying in the third year of junior high school, and his sister Vivi, 9, is in the fourth grade at primary school. His father Marthen is a 41-year-old plumber and his mother Yuliana is a 39-year-old housewife. 

As the oldest child in the family, Ayub has been working hard to support his family all his life. After saving for a motorcycle, he started an "ojek" business (taxi motorcycle driver). Fortunately, less than a month ago, he has got a new job as credit staff in a local cooperative. 

However, he still needs some extra money to pay his motorcycle’s installments and assist with his family’s expenses. Therefore, he applied for an individual loan of IDR 3,000,000 to assist him.

loans.use: to pay his motorcycle’s installments and assist with his family’s expenses

loans.name: Fernando Antonio

texts.es: Fenando tiene 39 años de edad y habita en casa propia junto a su compañera de vida y sus hijos. Fernando es un honbre muy trabajador y dedicado a su familia quien con mucho esfuerzo lleva el sustento diario. Fernando es albañil  y desde hace mucho tiempo trabaja en esta área. Él ha tomado la decisión de solicitar este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la construcción de una letrina para lo cual necesita materiales como arena, cemento, ladrillo, lamina y madera.
texts.en:
Fernando is 39 years old and resides in his own home along with his life companion and their children. He is a hardworking man who is devoted to his family. Fernando does his best to provide for their daily needs. He is a bricklayer and has worked a long time in this trade.

Fernando decided to request this loan from FUSAI so that he could invest in the construction of a latrine. He needs materials such as sand, cement, bricks, metal sheets, and wood.

loans.use: to buy construction materials for building a latrine.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more sheep for his barn

loans.name: Mesaidi

texts.en:
Mesaidi appreciates her previous Kiva loan that improved her living standards.

She is requesting a loan to purchase more stock of charcoal and firewood. Her previous loan enabled her to expand her business and earn a higher income. She thanks Yehu for their financial support.

loans.use: to purchase more stock of charcoal and firewood.

loans.name: Vendrea

texts.en:
Vendrea is a married woman with six children. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. She is 42 years old and has three children who are in school.

She has a clothing sales business in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 11,000 loan amount through NWTF in order to buy additional clothing like bags, pants, and blouses.

Vendrea has been in this business for five years. In the future, she would like to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy additional clothing like bags, pants, and blouses.

loans.name: Oltin

texts.ru:
Олтин трудолюбивый и жизнерадостный мужчина в возрасте 42 лет. Олтин живет со своей большой семьей в сельской деревушке. Он женат и имеет 4-х детей, которых вместе с женой растят и воспитывают в своем большом доме. У Олтина имеется высшее образование, но чтобы быть вместе со своей семьей он отказался работать вдали от дома. Жена его не имеет высшего образования и является домохозяйкой. 

Олтин работает фермером. У него есть свой участок  земли, где он трудится со своими взрослыми детьми. Они выращивают овощи: помидоры, огурцы, капусту, морковь и т.д. Олтин выращивает овощи как для себя и своей семьи, так же и для продажи. Это хороший доход для Олтина и его семьи.  В данный момент Олтин обратился в Арванд за кредитом. Ему нужно приобрести минеральные добавки для урожая. Олтин заранее благодарит Аврванд за поддержу, и надеется на положительный результат.
texts.en:
Oltin is a hardworking and happy man of the age of 42. Oltin lives with his large family in a rural village. He is married and has four children, who he raises together with his wife in their large home. Oltin has higher education, but in order to be together with his family, he refuses to work far away from home. His wife does not have higher education and is a housewife. 

Oltin works as a farmer. He has his own plot of land, where he toils together with the grown-up children. They grow vegetables: Tomatoes, cucumbers, cabbage, carrots and so on. Oltin grows vegetables for himself and his family, and also to sell. This is a great income for Oltin and his family. 

Currently Oltin has turned to Arvand for a loan. He needs to purchase mineral supplements for the harvest. Oltin thanks Arvand for the support in advance, and hopes for a positive result.

loans.use: to purchase mineral supplements

loans.name: Sandra

texts.es:
Sandra está en el último año de la carrera de Ingeniería Agrónoma, que ella sueña poder usar para poder ayudar a las personas que lo necesitan.
Ella se está sacrificando para que el día de mañana pueda ser una profesional útil a la sociedad y a las demás personas.
Pide este préstamo para poder cubrir sus gastos de tesis, y de esa forma poder seguir con sus estudios como lo viene haciendo.
texts.en:
Sandra is in her final year before earning a degree in Agricultural Engineering. Her dream is to use her education so that she can help people who are in need. She is making sacrifices so that someday she can become a professional who is useful to society and to other people.

Sandra is requesting this loan so that she can cover her thesis expenses. This will enable her to continue her studies in the same manner as before.

loans.use: to pay expenses related to her thesis.

loans.name: Von's Group

texts.en:
Von was selected to be a group leader for a loan from Maxima. In the group, there are two members, Von and Sanh, and they live in a village across the Mekong River about twenty kilometers from Phnom Penh City. 

Von, age 27, is a weaver. She has been married since 2012 and just has one young daughter. Her husband is a construction worker. She wants to continue her weaving because it is a traditional profession business. So she decided to apply for a loan to buy weaving materials.

Von is on the right and Sanh is on the left.

loans.use: To buy weaving materials for her weaving business.

loans.name: Platinium Group

texts.en:
Haidee is the featured borrower of Platinium group. She got together with the other group members to acquire a loan from Kiva's field partner Al Majmoua, because they have became good friends since they left their hometown in the Philippines to work as housekeepers in order to develop their beloved families' living.

Haidee is a 41-year-old divorced mother of six, whom she works hard to provide with the necessities of life. Haidee's acquired loan will be sent to the Philippines to pay for her children's increasing school and university tuition fees. She is the second lady from the right side of the picture with black top.

As for the other group members, Lelian is the first from the left with yellow top, Jeannie is the first from the right with orange top, and Olga is the lady at the center of the picture with blue top, while Jacqueline is the second from the left with pink and black top.

loans.use: To pay for her children's increasing school and university  tuition fees

loans.name: Holyar

texts.ru:
Холяр очень трудолюбивый мужчина. Ему 64 года. Он женат и имеет пятерых детей. Всю подсознательную жизнь Холяр жил и трудился, выращивая мелкий и крупно рогатый скот. Он этим трудом вырастил, воспитал  и дал образование всем своим пятерым детям. Его жена всегда была рядом и помогала ему в этом.

Даже сейчас будучи в возрасте Холяр ухаживает за своей небольшой отарой, чтобы помогать своим детям финансово. Молоко полученное от скота они сами употребляют, также продают соседям. Сейчас Холяр хочет увеличить количество своего скота для расширения своего бизнеса. По этой причине он обратился в Арванд с просьбой о выдачи кредита. Он хочет получить кредит на покупку скота для дальнейшего выращивания и продажи. Холяр надеется на положительный результат и заранее благодарит Арванд  за финансовую поддержку.
texts.en:
Holyar is a very hardworking man. He is 64 years old. He is married and has five children. Holyar has lived and worked through his whole life, breeding sheep, goats and cattle. He raised and educated all of his five children to this work. His wife has always been next to him and helped him with it. 

Even now at his age, Holyar cares for his small flock, in order to help his children financially. He uses the milk from the cattle himself, and also sells it to his neighbors. Currently Holyar would like to increase the number of cattle to expand his business. For this reason he turned to Arvand and requested a loan. 

Holyar would like to get a loan to purchase cattle for breeding and selling. He hopes for a positive result and thanks Arvand in advance for the financial support.

loans.use: to purchase cattle

loans.name: Yeny Marisol

texts.es:
Yeny es una joven emprendedora, tiene 24 años de edad, es soltera y vive en Rupa Rupa junto a su familia. 
Es madre soltera pero eso no ha sido impedimento para salir adelante y brindarle lo mejor a su hijo.
Desde hace casi 1 año se dedica a la venta de pollitos y le va muy bien porque es responsable, trabajadora, y tiene muchas ganas de salir adelante. su mayor sueño es llegar a ser mayorista en la venta de pollos para poder tener más ingresos.
Yeny está agradecida con los prestamistas Kiva porque con el apoyo que le han brindado ella podrá comprar más pollos y ampliar la jaula en la que guarda a los animales, de esta manera tendrá mayores ingresos con los que mejorará la calidad de vida de su familia.
texts.en:
Yeny is a Young entrepreneur, she is 24 years old, single and lives with her family in Rupa Rupa. She is a single mother, but this has not stopped her from forging ahead and offering her son the best.

A year ago she began to sell chicks, and this is going very well because she is responsible, hardworking, and is determined to succeed. Her greatest dream is to become a wholesaler of chickens to increase her income.

Yeny is grateful to the Kiva lenders because with the support they have offered to her she will be able to buy more chickens and extend the cage in which she keeps the animals. In this way she will obtain a better income with which to improve her family’s quality of life.

loans.use: to buy chickens to expand her business.

loans.name: Eliberto

texts.es: Eliberto, tiene la edad de 61 años, está casado y vive con su esposa dos  hijos y un nieto  actualmente. El quiere comprar almacigo para la resiembra de su cafetal y también algunos insumos. El cuenta con el terreno y lo que quiere es resembrar las zonas más dañadas para así aumentar la cosecha próxima y crecer como un caficultor de la zona. El pretende con estas mejoras generar mayor producción de café y así también le genere ganancias para seguir adelante con su proyecto y mejorar su bienestar Es el primer préstamo que recibido de FUDECOSUR. El no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en: Eliberto is 61 years old, married, and lives with his wife, two children and grandson. He would like to buy seedlings to replant his coffee fields, as well as some other agricultural inputs. He has land, but what he would like to do is replant the most damaged areas so he can increase his next harvest and his position as a coffee grower in the area. He hopes that with these improvements he can produce more coffee and more profits. He hopes to continue working to get ahead and improve his family's living conditions. This is his first loan with FUDECOSUR. He has not previously had other loans from state banks, but FUDECOSUR has provided him this loan with better terms and a much lower rate of interest.

loans.use: to buy coffee seedlings to replant damaged areas of his fields.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more slippers to expand her business.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy palm oil , onions, margi, salt, pepper, fish, etc.

loans.name: Jeffry

texts.es: Jeffry , un hombre emprendedor , tiene 23  años de edad, es soltero y vive con los padres   actualmente, el solicito un préstamo con el anhelo de  comprar insumos como abonos, y fumigantes, el desea dar asistencia a los cultivos de café, con la finalidad de mantenerlas en buenas condiciones durante su desarrollo, para obtener un producto de buena calidad , la única delimitación que este caballero tiene es la falta de dinero  para continuar creciendo, ya que de esta actividad económica dependen para poder salir adelante, por lo que él hace una solicitud  de  crédito , y es el primer  préstamo que ha  recibido de FUDECOSUR. El no registra otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja……
texts.en: Jeffry is a young entrepreneur. He is 23 years old, single, and lives with his parents. He is requesting this loan to buy agricultural inputs such as fertilizers and pesticides. He would like to care for his coffee plants to keep them in good condition during their development and to produce a good-quality product. Jeffrey depends on his coffee crop to keep striving to get ahead, but he needs money to look after it, which is why he is requesting this loan. This is his first loan with FUDECOSUR. He has not previously had other loans from state banks, but FUDECOSUR has provided him this loan with better terms and a much lower rate of interest.

loans.use: to buy agricultural inputs such as fertilizers and pesticides to care for his coffee plants.

loans.name: María Evangelina

texts.es:
María está casada, tiene 3 hijos que la apoyan junto a su esposo en las actividades que realiza. 


Ella trabaja en la elaboración del almuerzos y tamales, la actividad la realiza desde los 12 años cuando su madre le enseñó a elaborarlos, y por lo tanto ahora María cuenta con mucha experiencia en este trabajo.


El préstamo lo necesita para comprar mercadería para la preparación de almuerzos y otro tipo de comestibles para la venta, además con este préstamo comprará una vaca para incrementar su número de animales vacunos y así producir mayor cantidad de leche y sus derivados.


Sus planes son comprar mas ganado y arreglar el techo de su vivienda ya que la madera está un poco arruinada por las termitas y desea en un futuro cambiarla por material de hierro.
texts.en:
María is married and has three children who, along with her husband, support her in the work she does.


She works preparing lunches and tamales, which she has been doing since she was 12 years old and her mother taught her to make them, and so now María has a lot of experience with this work.

She needs the loan to buy products for preparing lunches and other foods to sell. She will also buy a cow with this loan, in order to increase her number of bovine animals and so produce more milk and milk products.

Her plans are to buy more cows and to fix the rood of her house, as the wood is a bit damaged from termites and she would like to change it for an iron one in the future.

loans.use: to buy products to make lunches and other foods to sell, as well as to buy a cow

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more palm oil, native rice, and cooking seasoning to expand her business.

loans.name: Yosef Al- Asoad Group

texts.en:
This group is called Yosef Al-Asoad and consists of four women who are all hard-working. They live in Sana'a, Yemen. They have taken a loan 120,000 YER. 

Salwa is 30 years old and married, with two children. Her oldest child is five years old and the youngest one is only one year old. She is an uneducated woman, but she knows her advantage very well. She has a strong determination to improve her standard of living. She began with a small amount of money which she took from  her husband. Salwa invested that money in her own business. 

She has worked at her business for many years selling makeup and accessories in order to help her husband in the expenses of the family. She sees this business as profitable for her. For further expanding, Salwa requested a loan of 30,000 YER from AMB in order to purchase more accessories, makeup, and cosmetics to sell to the women in her area.

She expects a boost in her income. She looks forward to renovating the first floor and building another floor in order to make their house more comfortable and spacious.

loans.use: to purchase more accessories, makeup, and cosmetics to sell.

loans.name: Luisa

texts.es: Doña Luisa finalizó la construcción del cuarto en su vivienda, que era para lo que había solicitado el crédito anterior. Esta vez solicita el crédito para construir un portón principal en su casa, y de esta manera garantizar la seguridad de su familia, ya que el barrio donde habita es bastante peligroso. Doña Luisa trabaja como doméstica en una casa de habitación, su compañero de vida es carpintero y le ayuda con los gastos del hogar. Sus tres hijos son mayores y cada uno de ellos trabaja.
texts.en: Doña Luisa finished the construction of a room in her home, which was what her previous loan was for. This time, she asks for a loan to construct a main entry door for her house, guaranteeing the security of her family; the neighborhood where she lives is quite dangerous. Doña Luisa works as a house cleaner; her life partner is a carpenter and helps her with household expenses. Her three children are adults and each of them works.

loans.use: to buy metal gables, iron, welding material, paint

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more sheep for his barn

loans.name: Sopharn

texts.en:
Sopharn (in photo) lives on an island in the Mekong River about fifteen kilometers from Phnom Penh City. She has been married since 2000 and has one young son. 

Sopharn is a weaver, while her husband is a security guard. He also does farming when he is free. 

Sopharn’s family does not have enough electricity to use because they only use battery. Facing this, she decided to apply for a loan to buy a solar home system for family use.

loans.use: To buy a solar home system for family use.

loans.name: Víctor Manuel

texts.es:
Víctor de 63 años de edad estudio hasta 2 grado debido a las condiciones económicas; pero él decidió ir a los círculos de alfabetización que se desarrollaron en la comunidad,  también está casado su esposa es ama de casa y son padres de 7 hijos de los cuales todos están acompañados  y viven en hogares distintos, actualmente solo vive con su esposa.  
   
Victor se a dedicado a la agricultura desde que era niño, comento que él aprendió con un tío debido a que tuvo la necesidad de llevar el sustento diario a su mamá y sus hermanos, porque su papá no estaba con ellos, también se dedica al cultivo de sandía y de melón en pequeñas cantidades el cultivo lo tiene a un kilómetro de la casa y le toca viajar a pie tiene que subir una loma para llegar al lugar donde siembra maíz.   
	
El préstamo lo utilizara para comprar semilla, abono, pesticidas, herbicidas, ya que viene la temporada de siembra y debe de pagar arrendamiento de 10,500 metros cuadrados de tierra donde cultiva; porque no son del sino  de un vecino debido a la oportunidad que me brinden con el préstamo podre cultivar manzana y media


Su propósito es comprar su pequeño pedazo de tierra para cultivarla, ver crecer a mis nietos y poderles ayudar económicamente para que continúen sus estudios.
texts.en:
Victor is 63 years old. He was able to go to school only until second grade, due to his family's financial conditions, but he goes to the literacy circles that take place in his community. He is married, and his wife is a housewife. They have seven children, all of whom are married and live in their own homes, so Victor now lives only with his wife.

Victor has worked in agriculture since he was a boy. He says he learned this from an uncle, because Victor needed to support his mother and brothers, because his father was not with them. Victor grows corn in a field that is one kilometer from his house. He travels to the field on foot and has to climb a hill. He also grows watermelons and other melons in small quantities.

He is requesting this loan to buy seeds, fertilizers, pesticides and herbicides, and to pay the rent on the 10,500 square meters of land he cultivates. Now is the planting season, and thanks to the opportunity provided by this loan, Victor plans to cultivate a field and a half. He rents the land from a neighbor.

Victor would like to buy his own small plot of land to cultivate, as well as see his grandchildren grow up and help them financially so that they can continue to go to school.

loans.use: to buy seeds, fertilizers, pesticides and herbicides, and to pay the rent on the 10,500 square meters of land he cultivates.

loans.name: Salina

texts.en:
Hello! Meet Salina, a 69-year-old granny, who is a very hardworking farmer.  She has been a farmer for the past 10 years since she retired from working as a primary school teacher. Salina is a single mother and has been taking care of her family all throughout the years. She is a small-scale farmer but she wants to improve her living conditions through large scale farming.

Salina is requesting a 42,400 KES loan to purchase a cow. The cow will enable her to produce milk to sell at the local market and also to neighbors. Salina will also use the manure from the cow to improve the soil to plant vegetables. Her loan will let her comfortably take good care of her family and reduce her need to beg anyone for assistance. Salina’s projections are that by the end of the year she will be able to buy two cows and also increase her vegetable production and milk-selling business.

loans.use: to buy a dairy cow

loans.name: Chan Roeun

texts.en:
Chan Roeun lives on an island of the Mekong River about 15 kilometers from Phnom Penh City. She has one son and one daughter and both of her children are in school. Chan Roeun used to be a weaver, but she stopped weaving and has started a new business carrying meat and vegetables on her motorbike to sell in her village. Her family does not have electricity and they use a battery to provide power.

Chan Roeun is requesting a loan to buy a solar home system to provide power for her family to use.

loans.use: to buy a solar home system to provide power for her family to use

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase cooking oil, rice, and seasoning to expand her cookery business

loans.name: Rosa Dimas

texts.es:
Rosa tiene 65 años de edad, estudió hasta sexto grado, está acompañado y su pareja se dedica a los oficios domésticos, tiene tres hijos los cuales ya se acompañaron y ninguno vive con Rosa.

Él toda su vida se ha dedicado a la agricultura y aprendió por herencia de los padres, actualmente siembra maíz y frijol, el lugar está a tres cuadras de su casa y se va caminando. 

El crédito lo necesita para comprar insumos agrícolas ya que sembrará 1 hectárea de maíz y ½ de frijol, comprará fertilizantes, veneno, abono para que los cultivos produzcan en mayor cantidad.

Su sueño es que el cultivo no se pierda para sacarle ganancias y mantener a su familia.
texts.en: Rosa is 65 years old and is in a relationship. His partner looks after the household work. They have three children, all of whom are now in relationships and live on their own. Rosa has worked his whole life in agriculture, which he learned from his parents. At the moment he grows corn and beans in a field that is 450 meters from his house. He travels to and from the field on foot. He is requesting this loan to buy agricultural inputs to plant one hectare of corn and a half hectare of beans. He will buy fertilizers, pesticides and manure so that he has a large harvest. His dream is that his crop does well and he earns a profit to support his family.

loans.use: to buy agricultural inputs such as fertilizers, pesticides and manure to plant one hectare of corn and a half hectare of beans.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase cigarettes, assorted drinks, and biscuits to expand her business

loans.name: Ana Celia

texts.es:
Ana de 65 años de edad,  no estudio, esta casada, su pareja trabaja la agricultura, tiene 6 hijos de los cuales 4 están acompañados y tienen sus propios hogares y solamente 2 viven con ella; pero trabajan, no dependen de ella, ademas viven 2 nietos con ella que están estudiando. Solamente tres personas dependen de ella. 

Ana trabaja con ganado de repasto, lo ha hecho por mas de 15 años y lo aprendió de sus padres y decidió trabajar con ganado para tener un ingreso económico mejor, antes vendía carne de res (negociando). La distancia donde tiene su ganado esta a 2 cuadras de su casa y se traslada a pie, se involucran dos hijos y un nieto con el ganado, el horario es variado. 

Con el préstamo comprara vacas lecheras, le mejorara mucho con el préstamo ya que puede comprar mas ganado, y así tener mayor ganancia y por lo tanto le mejorara la calidad de vida.  Sus sueños son crecer con mas ganado y a la vez poder tener vacas lecheras, para su familia desea lo mejor y a los nietos que estudien y se preparen académicamente.
texts.en:
Ana is 65 years old, married, and has six children. Her husband works in agriculture. Four of her children are in relationships and have their own homes. Her other two children live with her, but they work and are not dependent on her. She also has two grandchildren that live with her, who go to school. Ana has three people who are her dependents.

Ana has worked for more than 15 years with cattle that she grazes on pasture. She learned this work from her parents. She decided to work with cattle to improve her income. Previously she sold beef.

The pasture where she has her cattle is 300 meters from her house, and she travels to and from it on foot. She has two of her children and a grandson help her with the cattle. Her work schedule is variable.

She is requesting this loan to buy dairy cows. She hopes to increase her profit and improve her family's quality of life.

Her dream is to continue growing her cattle and dairy cow business, improve her family's living conditions, and see her grandchildren continue to go to school and prepare themselves academically.

loans.use: to buy dairy cows.

loans.name: Gulxar

texts.en:
Gulxar is 42 years old. She is married with two sons and a daughter. Gulxar is an internationally displaced person (IDP) and lives with her family in an IDP settlement. She works with animal husbandry and raises cows, sheep, and other animals. For the past 10 years, she has been selling meat, milk, and wool. Her husband is a laborer and the family’s monthly income is 80 AZN. The demand for meat and milk is very high in Azerbaijan as there are lots of different kinds of delicious dishes in Azerbaijan cuisine that include meat (dolma, kebab, dushbere, qutab, khash) and milk (cookies, pies, and sweets). 

Gulxar is requesting a 600 AZN loan to buy more livestock. Her condition is very hard and she needs to increase income to help her family. This will be Gulxar’s first loan and she believes that only Kiva will help her.

loans.use: to buy more livestock

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy firewood and charcoal in larger quantities

loans.name: Wilbert Alberto

texts.es:
Wilbert de 45 años de edad, estudió hasta bachillerato pero no logró finalizar, aunque no lo termino, está casado y su esposa se dedica a los oficios domésticos, tiene una hija que estudia tercer grado y nadie mas vive con ellos.

Desde hace 17 años, Wilbert es pastor de una iglesia de la comunidad y no tiene un horario establecido para desempeñarse en ese cargo. 

Él necesita el crédito para mejorar su vivienda, ya que en época de invierno tiene problemas y el agua ingresa a su hogar, comprará bloque hierro y láminas. 

Su sueño es seguir teniendo vida para predicar, ver crecer a su hija y que algún día sea una profesional.
texts.en:
Wilbert is 45 years old and married. He went to high school, but did not finish. His wife looks after the household work. They have a daughter who is in third grade. No one else lives with them.

For 17 years, Wilbert has been the pastor of a church in his community. He does not have a fixed schedule for carrying out his duties.

He is requesting this loan to buy cement blocks, iron and corrugated metal roofing to repair his house, which was damaged during the winter when water was able to get in.

His dream is to continue living so that he can preach, to see his daughter grow up, and to one day be a professional.

loans.use: to buy cement blocks, iron and corrugated metal roofing to repair his house.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy hair extensions and other working material to improve the quality of her hair dressing salon

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy cocoa for selling.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more sheep for her barn

loans.name: Rashad

texts.en:
Rashad is a 44-year-old married man with four children. His oldest child is 15 years old and the youngest one is 3 years old.  He is living with them in Sana'a, Yemen. He is a very active and responsible man. He has a university education.

Due to high rates of unemployment in the country, Rashad couldn't find a job to look after his family. He didn't surrender to his condition but decided to work in one of Sana'a's hotels. He worked as a waiter in a high hotel. From that business, Rashad could accumulate a good amount of money, and he opened a sewing store and worked as a tailor.

In his store, Rashad is sewing all kinds of stylish men's clothes. He makes modest profits. For further expansion, Rashad applied for a loan of 100,000 YER from AMB in order to purchase large amounts of fabrics to meet all the demands of his customers.

Rashad looks forward to further expanding his business through opening other branches in the capital city of Sana'a.

loans.use: to purchase large amounts of fabrics to meet all the demands of his customers

loans.name: Lukiya

texts.en:
Lukiya is a forty-year-old woman married with four children living in Bundibugyo, Uganda. From her cocoa plantation she has managed to raise some small savings to start up a food stall in the market to supplement her income.

As a hardworking mother, she joined a women's group to get small loans to boost her business and make ends meet. Lukiya is requesting a loan to buy eggs, soap, maize flour and palm oil to sell.

loans.use: to buy eggs, soap, maize flour and palm oil to sell

loans.name: Noe Agustín

texts.es:
Noe  de 49 años de edad, estudió hasta noveno grado, está acompañado y solo 3 hijos viven en casa, estudian en la escuela y son los únicos que dependen de él.


Noe se dedica al comercio de leche y a la agricultura, el negocio de leche lo realiza desde hace 10 años, el oficio se lo enseñó su padre, ya que a su padre le gustaba tener ganado, Noe se levanta desde muy temprano a ordeñar las vacas y luego llegan a comprar la leche. 


Él necesita este crédito para comprar una vaca, pretende vender una que ya está bastante vieja y que ya dio lo suficiente, y con el préstamo va a complementar el dinero para comprar la otra vaca.


Sus sueños son tener un corral con muchas vacas lecheras para obtener ganancias y pagarles el estudio a sus hijos, pues sueña con verlos convertirse en profesionales.
texts.en:
Noe is 49 years old, studied through the ninth grade, and in a relationship. Only three of his children live at home since they are in school. His children are the only ones who are dependent on him.

Noe sells milk and is also a farmer. He has been in the milk business for 10 years since this was a trade that he learned from his father, who also owned cattle. Noe wakes up very early so that he can milk the cows and sell the output later.

He needs this loan in order to buy a cow. He intends to sell one because it is old and has surpassed its output capacity. The loan will be added to his existing funds so that he can buy another cow. His dream is to have a corral that can hold several dairy cows so that he can generate profits and pay for his children’s education. He would like to see them become professionals.

loans.use: to buy a dairy cow.

loans.name: Rose

texts.en: Rose is only thirty-two years of age, married with six children living in Bundibugyo, Uganda. As a loving mother, she is inspired to work harder because of the need to see her children attain the best education. For fifteen years she has noticed that farming is doing better for her family to attain a good living. She dreams of expanding her cocoa selling to big cocoa agents and other new markets despite the limitation of seasonality changes that limit her plans. Rose will use the loan to  buy cocoa to sell.

loans.use: To buy more cocoa to sell.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase cigarettes, pure water, and biscuits to expand her business

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy rice, flour, sugar, groundnuts, etc. in wholesale to add to her current ones.

loans.name: Rashad

texts.en:
Rashad is a 30-year-old married man and has one daughter. His family is IDP (Internally Displaced Persons) and they live in an IDP settlement. His wife is a housekeeper. Rashad grows vegetables (greens, potatoes, onions, tomatoes and so on) and fruit trees (apples, pears, etc.). His monthly income is 150 AZN and he has nine years of experience in this field. He gets an additional small income working as a driver.

People living in IDP settlements have higher demands for such products as fresh fruits and vegetables. They prepare juice, fruit pies, etc. and make different kinds of salads.

Rashad needs to improve the conditions of his garden. He applied for a 1000 AZN loan to buy garden tools and fix it. He wants to get more money in order to improve his family's hard life.

loans.use: to buy garden tools and fix his garden

loans.name: Tugume

texts.en: Tugume runs a restaurant in Hoima, Uganda. She is 45 years old, and married with nine children aged between 25 years to 1 year, and four attend school. Motorcycle transportation (boda boda) supplements her income.  She desires to build another commercial building for her last-born son. However, limited capital hinders her desired dream. Tugume is acquiring a loan to buy another motorcycle for her business.

loans.use: to buy another motorcycle for her business.

loans.name: Jose Onecifor

texts.es:
José, vive con su esposa de 47 años de edad y sus hijos de 19 y 24 años de edad, comparten juntos el calor de un hogar sólido y unido; se dedica a vender ropa usada, sandalias, chancletas y billetes de lotería, está actividad la realiza desde hace mucho tiempo y es así como genera ingresos para costear los gastos familiares.
Con el capital comprara variedad de ropa, sandalias, chancletas y billetes de lotería,  en diferentes tallas, estilos y colores, espera aumentar sus ingresos, atraer nuevos clientes y cancelar con buen record crediticio su deuda.
Su sueño es ampliar su negocio y terminar de cancelar una propiedad que ha adquirido.
texts.en:
José lives with his 47 year old wife and their children of 19 and 24 years of age. They share the warmth of a solid and united home.  He sells used clothing, sandals, flip-flops and lottery tickets. He has been doing this activity for a long time and it is how he makes his earnings to cover the household expenses. 

With the money he will buy a variety of clothing, sandals, flip-flops, in different sizes, styles and colors and lottery ticket. He hopes to increase his earnings, attract new customers and pay back the loan with a good credit record.

His dream is to grow his business and to finish paying off a property that he acquired.

loans.use: to buy a variety of clothing, sandals, flip flops and lottery tickets.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy a large quantity of charcoal and firewood to add to her current stocks.

loans.name: Aloys

texts.en:
Aloys is aged 30. He has requested a Kiva loan to pay for warehouse construction. This loan will help in the construction of the warehouse or store for their maize produce that is waiting for their harvest to be bought by the buyers. This constructed infrastructure will help even the entire farmers to have a secure store of their produce in the future. UOB’s farmers/clients are benefiting to the production financing which is significantly increasing their yield or production. 

The agriculture sector accounts for 37% of Rwanda's gross domestic product, generates 65% of Rwanda's export revenue, and employs approximately 90% of Rwandans (as of 2009). Despite the importance of agriculture to Rwandans and their economy, financial institutions view lending to fund agricultural activities as a high-risk proposition because the profitability of these activities is affected by weather, natural disasters, and price fluctuations. For this reason, farmers in Rwanda remain underserved by financial institutions. Urwego Opportunity Bank is expanding into this market and is happy to provide Kiva lenders with the opportunity to support Rwandan farmers.

loans.use: to pay for  warehouse/store construction for maize production.

loans.name: Claudine

texts.en:
Claudine is 32 years old. She is married with three years. This is a new loan product for UOB. This loan will help in the construction of a warehouse, or storage place, for their maize produce. They are waiting for their harvest to be bought, by the buyers. This infrastructure being built will help the entire farmers to have secure storage for their produce, in the future. UOB’s farmer/clients have been benefiting from the financing of farming supplies, which is significantly increased their yield, or production. But during the post-harvest processes, they are suffering more from poverty as they have to wait for the buyer to pay them. 

The agriculture sector accounts for 37% of Rwanda's gross domestic product, generates 65% of Rwanda's export revenue, and employs approximately 90% of Rwandans (as of 2009). Despite the importance of agriculture to Rwandans and their economy, financial institutions view lending to fund agricultural activities as a high-risk proposition because the profitability of these activities is affected by weather, natural disasters, and price fluctuations. For this reason, farmers in Rwanda remain underserved by financial institutions. Urwego Opportunity Bank is expanding into this market and is happy to provide Kiva lenders with the opportunity to support Rwandan farmers.

loans.use: To pay for construction of a warehouse/storage place for maize

loans.name: José Selvin

texts.es:
José tiene 25 años de edad, estudió hasta segundo año de bachillerato, está acompañado y su pareja se dedica a los oficios domésticos, tiene un hijo de dos meses y en su casa vive con sus padres y hermanos. 

José se dedica a la carpintería desde hace 4 años, y lo aprendió en unos cursos que impartían en el instituto, actualmente es empleado en una carpintería y el horario es de 7:30 am a 5: pm 

Él necesita el crédito para construir un cuarto en casa de sus padres con el fin de tener privacidad y comprará bloques, arena, cemento, hierro y pagar mano de obra. 

Su sueño es tener una casa propia y seguir trabajando fuerte para mantener a su familia.
texts.en:
Jose is 25 years old, and studied through the second year of technical school.  He is married and his wife works at household work.  He has a two year old son, and lives in a house with his parents and his brothers.

Jose has earned a living at carpentry for the past four years, which he learned in some classes given at the institute.  He is currently employed as a carpenter, working from 7:30 AM to 5 PM.

He needs a loan to build a room in his parents' home in order to have some privacy, and will buy cement blocks, sand, cement and iron and pay for labor.
His dream is to have his own house and continue working hard to support his family.

loans.use: to build a room in his parents' house; he will buy cement blocks, sand, cement, and iron and will pay for labor

loans.name: Konotieyele Group

texts.fr:
Le groupe KONOTIEYELE est composé de femmes mariées, elles ont en moyenne 34 ans et 3 enfants. Elles vivent toutes dans des familles traditionnelles dans la ville de Konobougou, commune Konobougou, préfecture de Barouéli, Région de Ségou (quatrième région administrative de la République du Mali).
Elles se sont connues à travers des liens de parenté, de voisinage et d’amitié. Elles font le commerce de céréales, de l’habillement, de fruits et légume et de poisson. Les femmes du groupe KONOTIEYELE sont à leurs vingt troisième prêts solidaires.
Dans le but de satisfaire la demande énorme de leurs clientèles, elles font recours à SORO YIRIWASO.
Ces montants seront utilisés pour acheter leurs marchandises déjà citées.
La cliente MAI, deuxième de la droite vers la gauche est actuellement vendeuse de sel. Elle compte acheter 50 sacs, de sel chez les grossistes à Bamako. La vente se fait en gros et en espèce au marché hebdomadaire à une clientèle mixte. Elle compte réaliser un bénéfice mensuel de 90 000Fcfa, qui sera réinvesti dans son activité.
texts.en:
The Konotieyele Group is made up of married women with an average age of 34 and three children each. They all live within the frameworks of traditional families in the town of Konobougou, in the commune of Konobougou, Barouéli Prefecture, Ségou Region (the fourth administrative area of the Republic of Mali). They all know each other through the bonds of family, community and friendship. They earn a living from the buying and selling of cereals, clothing, fruits, vegetables and fish.

This will be the twenty-third loan for the women of the Konotieyele Group. In order to satisfy the enormous demand from their customers, they have turned to Soro Yiriwaso. The requested loan amount will go towards the aforementioned merchandise.

Mai is the second woman from the right to the left. She currently works as a salt vendor. She plans on buying 50 sacks of salt from the wholesalers in Bamako. She sells her stock in bulk for cash at the weekly market to a mixed customer base. She plans on making a monthly profit of 90,000 FCFA, which will be reinvested into her business.

loans.use: to purchase salt

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy agricultural products, specifically manure and fertilizers since she will be sowing one hectare of corn

loans.name: Lina

texts.en: Lina is a 38-year-old, married mother of three children. She owns a small business, where she sells physiotherapy kits for the disabled. She has 16 years of experience in this domain.  Her husband works in a construction business specialized in concrete work. Two of her children are enrolled in private schools to make sure that they can have a brighter future through acquiring the best education.  Schooling tuition fees are on top of her other living expenses to settle, so for this reason she is acquiring a loan from Kiva's field partner Al Majmoua, to pay for her children's increasing school tuition fees. As for the future, Lina wishes to expand her business, to be the number one in her region.

loans.use: to pay for her children's increasing school tuition fees.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy manioc and red oil

loans.name: Dora Alicia

texts.es: Dora tiene 50 años de edad y habita en casa propia junto a su compañero de vida y su hija de 14 años de edad quien a la fecha se encuentra estudiando. Dora se gana la vida mediante la venta de pollos. Ella es una mujer muy trabajadora de quien muchas personas dan buenas referencias de su integridad. Dora solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de lámina galvanizada y madera para reparar el techo de la galera en su vivienda.
texts.en:
Dora is 50 years old and lives in her own house with her partner and her 14 year old daughter who is in school.  Dora earns her living selling chickens.  She is a very hard-working woman and many people speak well of her integrity.  

Dora is asking for this loan from FUSAI to buy galvanized metal sheets and wood to repair the roof of her home's porch.

loans.use: to buy galvanized metal sheets and wood to repair the roof of her porch

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: repairing her home.

loans.name: Jean D'amour

texts.en:
Jean D'amour is 28 years old, married and has three children. He is a member of an agricultural cooperative who will benefit from a new loan product offered by UOB. This loan will help in the construction of a warehouse which will act as a store for the cooperative’s harvested maize that hasn’t been built yet. A structure like this will actually help the entire community in the future to securely store their produce.

UOB’s farmer clients often endure hardship while waiting for buyers to pay them for their crops. This 1,236,906 RWF loan will play a big role in avoiding the hardship affecting farmers during the period between harvest and profit.

The agriculture sector accounts for 37% of Rwanda's gross domestic product, generates 65% of Rwanda's export revenue, and employs approximately 90% of Rwandans (as of 2009). Despite the importance of agriculture to Rwandans and their economy, financial institutions view lending to fund agricultural activities as a high-risk proposition because the profitability of these activities is affected by weather, natural disasters, and price fluctuations.

For this reason, farmers in Rwanda remain underserved by financial institutions. Urwego Opportunity Bank is expanding into this market and is happy to provide Kiva lenders with the opportunity to support Rwandan farmers.

loans.use: To pay for the construction of a warehouse for maize harvest.

loans.name: Thacienne

texts.en:
Thacienne is 28 years old. This loan will help in the construction of the warehouse which will act as a store for their maize produce and that are waiting for their harvest to be bought by the buyers. This constructed infrastructure will help even the entire farmer to have a secure store of their produce in the future. UOB’s farmers clients are benefiting to the production financing which is significantly increase their yield or production, during the post-harvest processes are more suffering poorness as they have to wait the buyer to pay them. 

The agriculture sector accounts for 37% of Rwanda's gross domestic product, generates 65% of Rwanda's export revenue, and employs approximately 90% of Rwandans (as of 2009). Despite the importance of agriculture to Rwandans and their economy, financial institutions view lending to fund agricultural activities as a high-risk proposition because the profitability of these activities is affected by weather, natural disasters, and price fluctuations. For this reason, farmers in Rwanda remain underserved by financial institutions. Urwego Opportunity Bank is expanding into this market and is happy to provide Kiva lenders with the opportunity to support Rwandan farmers.

loans.use: To pay for the  construction of warehouse for maize produce

loans.name: Dieudonne

texts.en:
Dieudonne is 26 years old. He is a father four children and only two children goes to school. With this new loan will help in the construction of the warehouse which will act as a store for their maize produce and that are waiting for their harvest to be bought by the buyers. This constructed infrastructure will help even the entire farmers to have a secure store of their produce in the future. UOB’s farmers clients are benefiting to the production financing which is significantly increase their yield or production, during the post-harvest processes are more suffering poorness as they have to wait the buyer to pay them. 

The agriculture sector accounts for 37% of Rwanda's gross domestic product, generates 65% of Rwanda's export revenue, and employs approximately 90% of Rwandans (as of 2009). Despite the importance of agriculture to Rwandans and their economy, financial institutions view lending to fund agricultural activities as a high-risk proposition because the profitability of these activities is affected by weather, natural disasters, and price fluctuations. For this reason, farmers in Rwanda remain underserved by financial institutions. Urwego Opportunity Bank is expanding into this market and is happy to provide Kiva lenders with the opportunity to support Rwandan farmers.

loans.use: To pay for the warehouse  construction for maize produces

loans.name: Benkadi 1 Group

texts.fr:
Les 10 membres du groupe BENKADI 1 sont des femmes mariées  ayant une moyenne d’âge de 43 ans et ont en moyenne 3 enfants et vivant la plupart  dans des  familles traditionnelles à FATIA un village dans le cercle de SIKASSO 3ème région administrative du Mali. 
Elles collaborent avec l’institution de microfinance Soro Yiriwaso afin de mener à bien leurs activités agricoles pendant l’hivernage. 
Elles sont à leur septième prêt de campagne avec l’institution de microfinance soro yiriwaso, les prêts antérieurs ont été bien remboursés.
La spéculation cultivée est le mil  avec madame MINATA débout à la deuxième position de la droite vers la gauche sur la photo dans ce groupe de femme BENKADI 1. 
Avec son prêt, elle compte acheter, des semences, 2 sacs de 50 kg d’engrais, 2 bidons d’herbicide et payer les frais de labour  pour entretenir  0,75 hectare. 
Après la récolte la production est vendue au niveau du village, aux marchés de SIKASSO à une clientèle composée d’homme et de femme au comptant et à crédit. 
Elle compte réaliser un bénéfice moyen de  85 000 FCFA par campagne.
Ce bénéfice lui permettra de payer d’une part son prêt et son intérêt et d’autre part aider son mari dans les dépenses quotidiennes de la famille.
texts.en: The ten members of the Benkadi 1 Group are married women with an average age of 43 and an average of three children each. The majority of them live within traditional family frameworks in Fatia, a village in Sikasso Cercle, the third administrative region of Mali. They are collaborating with the Soro Yiriwaso microfinance institution so that they can see through their agricultural activities during the winter period. This is their seventh loan with Soro Yiriwaso, with whom their previous loans were paid back in full. The group's main produce is millet. The group's representative is Minata, the woman standing second from the right in the photo taken of the entire Benkadi 1 Group. With this loan, she is planning on buying seeds, two 50-kg sacks of fertiliser and two cans of herbicide, as well as paying for the labour costs to maintain three-quarters of a hectare of land. After the harvest, the produce is sold on a village level as well as at the markets of Sikasso to a customer base made up of both men and woman, accepting both credit and cash as payment. She is planning on making an average profit of 85,000 FCFA per season. These profits will allow her to pay off part of the loan and its interest and to also help her husband with their family's daily living expenses.

loans.use: to pay for fertiliser, labour costs, farming inputs and seeds

loans.name: Mary

texts.en: Mary deals in fresh foods such as cabbages, tomatoes, onions and cassava in Hoima, Uganda. She is a 33-year-old, hardworking, single mother. She has three children aged between 18 to 6 years, and two attend school. She started her business to take care of her family's basic necessities. She dreams of building her own house. However, bad debtors and the high rate of perishability of her products hinder her business. She will use the loan to buy more onions, tomatoes and vegetables to sell.

loans.use: to buy fresh foods to sell.

loans.name: Roberto Antonio

texts.es:
Roberto de 59 años de edad, estudió hasta bachillerato, está acompañado y su pareja se dedica a los oficios domésticos, tiene 3 hijos que viven con ellos y estudian, su mamá de la tercera edad también vive en casa y todos dependen de Robero. 

Él trabaja en la agricultura y cuida una yunta de bueyes, trabajo que ha hecho siempre por tradición familiar. Ademas cuida y da mantenimiento a las propiedades de familiares. El lugar de trabajo le queda cerca de la casa y sus hijos le ayudan en los tiempos libres cuando no estudian. 

El préstamo lo necesita para pagar la preparación del terreno con maquinaria agrícola y para comprar fertilizantes para la siembra de 1 hectárea de maíz. 

Su sueño mas grande es seguir trabajando en la agricultura.
texts.en:
Roberto is 59 years old and has a high school education.  His is married and his spouse is a homemaker.  They have three children who live with them and attend school.  His elderly mother also lives with them, and they are all dependent on Roberto.  He works as a farmer and he takes care of a pair of oxen, work that he has always done given his family's traditions.  He also takes care of and maintains his family's properties.  His place of work is located near his home and his children help him in their free time when they are not studying.

He is in need of this loan to pay to prepare the land with agricultural machines and to purchase fertilizers to plant one hectare of corn.  His biggest dream is to continue working in agriculture.

loans.use: pay to prepare his land with agricultural machines and to purchase fertilizers to plant one hectare of corn.

loans.name: Manrique

texts.es:
Manrique tiene 33 años de edad, estudió hasta 3° grado de educación básica, está casado y su esposa se dedica a los oficios domésticos, tiene 3 hijos que dependen de Manrique.

Él trabaja en una empresa de agua potable, ye tiene 1 año y medio. Ademas se dedica a la siembra de maíz en la época de lluvias, esto lo hace desde pequeño. Su padre era agricultor y de él heredó este oficio, el lugar de agua potable está a 2 km de distancia de su casa y el lugar del cultivo le queda a 1 km de distancia.

El préstamo solicitado es para pagar una deuda que adquirió cuando nació su último  hijo ya que fue prematuro, y el resto del dinero lo ocupará para el alquiler de 1 hectárea de tierra y comprar insumos agrícolas para la siembra de maíz. 

Con el préstamo espera tener solvencia con los compromisos, tendrá el capital de trabajo para sembrar el maíz que es el sustento de la familia.
texts.en:
Manrique is 33 years old and has a third grade education.  He is married and his wife is a homemaker.  They have three children who depend on Manrique.  He works for a drinking water company, and he has been there for a year and a half already.  He also works planting corn during the rainy season, which he has done since he was very young.  His father was a farmer and he inherited the business from him.  The water company is located 2 kilometers from his home and his crops are located 1 kilometer away.  

The loan he is seeking will be used to pay off a debt he acquired when his last son was born prematurely.  The rest of the money will be used to lease one hectare of land and purchase agricultural supplies to plant corn.  With the loan he hopes to have solvency in his commitments, and have working capital to plant corn that will provide for his family.

loans.use: to pay for a debt he acquired when his last child was born premature and the rest of the money will be used to rent one hectare of land and buy farm supplies to plant corn.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase blocks, iron, sand, cement and gravel.

loans.name: Misael

texts.es:
Misael tiene 48 años de edad, estudió hasta 3° grado, está acompañado y su pareja se dedica a los oficios domésticos, de Misael solo depende su esposa ya que sus hijos son mayores y han  formado sus propios hogares.

Misael trabaja como jornalero agrícola y en construcciones, trabaja la agricultura solo como subsistencia, con su familia aprendió esta forma de vida y fue necesario esforzarse para salir adelante, además él vende frutas de temporada en su comunidad. 

 El préstamo lo necesita para cultivar una hectárea de maíz y para darle mantenimiento al cultivo asegurando así el grano para consumo de su familia y forraje para unos terrenos que tiene. 

Él espera a futuro poder hacer mejoras en su casa ya que actualmente es de adobe y la quisiera construir de bloque o ladrillo.
texts.en:
Misael is 48 years old and has a third grade education.  He is married and his spouse is a homemaker.  Only his wife depends on him now that his sons are adults and have made their own homes.  Misael works as a day laborer in agriculture and construction.  He only works in agriculture for subsistence.  He learned this way of life from his family and it was necessary for him to strive to get ahead.  He also sells seasonal fruit throughout his community.  

The loan he is seeking is needed to plant one hectare of corn and to care for his crops in order to ensure that his family can consume it, and to forage some plots of land that he has.  He hopes that in the future he will be able to improve his home as it is currently made of adobe and he would like to build it out of blocks or bricks.

loans.use: plant one hectare of corn and to care for his crops.

loans.name: José David

texts.es:
José de 63 años de edad, estudio hasta 2° grado de educación básica, esta casado, su pareja trabaja, tiene un negocio de tamales. Tiene 2 hijos que están acompañados y tiene sus hogares. 

El cliente trabaja la agricultura y lo ha hecho por mas de 44 años, lo aprendió de su padre y las circunstancias de la vida hicieron que el se dedicara a este trabajo, trabaja también con ganado bovino. Antes solo era empleado jornal. La distancia esta como a 3 km y viaja a pie o en carreta, le apoya una hija. Su horario es de 6:00 am a 12:00 md y después trabaja con el ganado. 

El préstamo que esta solicitando, es para comprar semilla de maíz, abono, pesticidas, herbicidas y pago de mano de obra,  le mejorara su negocio con el préstamo ya que la producción de granos básicos sera mejor y por lo tanto le generara mejores ingresos económicos y así poder tener mejor calidad de vida. La necesidad satisfecha es que puede comprar los insumos agrícolas de una vez. 

Sus sueños son seguir trabajando de la mejor manera para tener mejores ingresos económicos para su familia.
texts.en:
José is 63 years old and has a second grade education.  He is married and his spouse has a business selling tamales.  They have two children who are married and have their own homes.  He works in agriculture and he has done so for over 44 years.  He learned the trade from his father, and the circumstances of his life made him devote himself to this work.  He also works with cattle.  He used to only be a day laborer.  His land is about 3 kilometers away and he either walks there or takes a cart.  One of his daughters helps him.  He works from 6am to noon and he then works with his cattle.  

The loan that he is seeking will be used to purchase corn seeds, manure, pesticides, herbicides and pay for labor.  This will improve his business since his basic grain production will increase and this will generate greater earnings for him so that he can improve his quality of life.  This loan will allow him to purchase all of the agricultural supplies at once.  His dream is to continue working in the best manner so that he can improve his earnings for his family.

loans.use: purchase corn seed, manure, pesticides, herbicides and pay for labor.

loans.name: Marvin

texts.es:
Marvin tiene 46  años de edad, está casado y tiene dos hijos, él se dedicaba a realizar actividades agrícolas, pero hoy en día trabaja como motorista para una institución del gobierno, es una persona muy trabajadora, tiene dos vacas que ordeña de las cuales obtiene leche y sus derivados.


  El trabajo de la ganadería lo realiza desde que era muy pequeño, él solo vivía con su mamá ya que ella fue madre soltera y fue quien le enseñó a defenderse en la vida, por eso Marvin se dedicaba a realizar esas tareas, él se traslada desde su cantón hasta una ciudad del oriente del país en autobús. 


Él solicita este crédito para comprar una vaca parida  y para comprar concentrado lechero para su alimentación.


El anhela poder ofrecerle una mejor calidad de vida a su familia,  y que no les falte lo indispensable .
texts.en:
Marvin is 46 years old, is married and has two children. He works in agriculture, but these days he is working as a driver for a government institution. He is a hard-working person. He has two cows that he milks from which he obtains milk and dairy products.

He has worked with livestock since he was quite small. He lived alone with his mother as she was a single mother. She taught him how to get along in life. So Marvin does this work. He travels from his canton to a city in the east of the country by bus.

He is requesting this loan to buy a pregnant cow and to buy concentrated feed to feed her. He hopes to be able to offer a better quality of living for his family so that they don't lack anything necessary.

loans.use: to buy a pregnant cow and concentrated feed for the cow.

loans.name: Dilber Medaris

texts.es:
Dilber de 22 años de edad, estudio hasta 9° grado de educación básica, esta casado, ella trabaja en venta de hot dog, negocio propio. Tiene un hijo que vive en casa.

Por su parte Dilber, tiene un negocio de tienda, lo ha hecho por 2 años y lo aprendió de sus patrones y decidió para tener un ingreso económico adicional; ademas es empleado, antes solamente era empleado. La tienda la tiene en su casa y a su empleo viaja en bus, se involucra su esposa en el negocio de tienda. Su horario de empleado es de 7:00 am a 5:00 pm. 

El préstamo que esta solicitando, es para comprar azúcar, frijoles, maíz, sal, pan, galletas, dulces, embutidos, detergentes, etc. para surtir su tienda.

Sus sueños son poder tener una tienda completa con todo el producto y a su hijo poder darle estudio. Le ayudara el préstamo ya que ahorita tiene la oportunidad de poder surtir un poco su tienda. Las ganancias las utiliza para ir pagando el préstamo, ya que tiene otros ingresos económicos para el sustento de su familia. Espera ampliar su tienda y solo lo lograra con su esfuerzo, el apoyo de su esposa y el apoyo de Credicampo.
texts.en:
Dilber, 22 years old, attended school until the 9th grade.  He is married and his wife works selling hot dogs, a business she owns. They have a son.  For his part, Dilber has a store business. He had done the work for 2 years, learning from his employers and then decided to earn additional income.  In addition, he is employed. Formerly he was simply an employee. 

His store is in his home and he travels to his job by bus. He has involved his wife in helping to run the store. His schedule as an employee runs from 7 a.m. until 5 p.m.

The loan he is requesting is to purchase sugar, beans, corn, salt, bread, cookies, sweets, sausages, detergents, etc. in order to stock his store.

His dreams are to have his store completed stocked with all kinds of products and that he will be able to provide his son with an education.  The loan will help him because now he will be able to add a little to the inventory in his store.  He will use the profits to repay the loan because he has other income to support his family. He hopes to expand his store and he will only succeed in doing so through his own efforts and support from his wife and Credicampo.

loans.use: to purchase sugar, beans, corn, salt, bread, cookies, sweets, sausages, detergent, etc.,  to stock his store.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase mangoes, bananas and pears to expand her business.

loans.name: Mariana Del Transito

texts.es:
Mariana de 54 años de edad, solamente estudio 1° grado, esta casada, su pareja trabaja la agricultura y con ganado, tiene 5 hijos de los cuales 2 viven en EEUU y 2 están casados y tienen sus hogares. Solamente un hijo vive en casa con ella pero trabaja. 

Mariana trabaja la agricultura, lo ha hecho por mas de 10 años y lo aprendió de unos amigos y decidió hacerlo para tener granos básicos para su familia. Tiene vacas lecheras, antes solo se dedicaba a oficios domésticos en casa. La distancia esta como a 1 km y viaja a pie. Se involucra su esposo y un hijo. Su horario de trabajo en la agricultura es de 6:00 am a 12:00 md. 

El préstamo que esta solicitando, es para comprar fertilizantes, pesticidas, herbicidas, pago de mano de obra.  El préstamo le mejorara su cultivo, ya que podrá tener mejor producción y así ofrecerle una mejor calidad de vida. La necesidad satisfecha es la de comprar los insumos agrícolas y tenerlos para utilizarlos en el momento oportuno. Sus sueños son poder trabajar mas, ya que también necesita zacate para el alimento de su ganado.
texts.en:
Mariana is 54 years old, married, and has five children. Two of her children live in the United States and two are already married and have their own homes. Her husband works in agriculture and with livestock. Mariana went to school only until first grade. Only one son still lives with Mariana, but he works.

Mariana has worked in agriculture for more than 10 years. She learned this work from some friends. She decided to start growing basic grains so she would have them for her family. She also has dairy cows. Previously Mariana only did the household work at home. The field she cultivates is one kilometer from her house, and she travels there on foot. She has involved her husband and her son in her work. Her schedule for her agricultural work is 6 a.m. to noon.

She is requesting this loan to buy fertilizers, pesticides and herbicides and to pay for labor. She hopes with the loan to improve her crops, increase her production and improve her quality of life. She needs to buy these agricultural inputs now so that she has them ready to use at the moment when they are needed.

Her dream is to be able to work more, because she also needs hay to feed her cattle.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers, pesticides and herbicides and to pay for labor.

loans.name: Carlos Antonio

texts.es:
Carlos es un joven emprendedor, tiene 21 años de edad, es soltero y vive en Parcona junto a su familia.
Está estudiando la carrera profesional de Ingeniería Agropecuaria en la Universidad de la ciudad donde vive. En la actualidad trabaja como taxista, transportando a las personas a diversos destinos de la ciudad, le va muy bien porque es trabajador, responsable y porque siempre actúa de acuerdo a las normas dictadas.
Carlos está muy agradecido con los prestamistas Kiva porque con el apoyo que le han brindado él podrá comprarse un celular para que su familia ya no se preocupe por él mientras trabaja, de esta manera estará en constante comunicación y podrá trabajar tranquilo.
texts.en:
Carlos is a young entrepreneur. He is 21 years old. He is single and lives in Parcona with his family.

He is studying in a professional course in agricultural engineering at the university in the city where he lives. He now works as a taxi driver, transporting people to various destinations in the city. It is going very well for him because he is hard-working and responsible and because he always acts according to the established rules.

Carlos is very grateful to the Kiva lenders because with the support that they have offered him, he will buy a cell phone so that his family will not worry about him when he works. In this way he will be in constant communication and will be able to work serenely.

loans.use: to buy a cell phone

loans.name: Matias

texts.es: Matias tiene 49 años de edad y habita en casa propia junto a su esposa y sus tres hijas de 27 años, 15 años y 8 años de edad. Matias trabaja en una hacienda cercana a su localidad desde hace 28 años lo cual le permite llevar el sustento a su hogar y dar a su familia lo necesario. Matias solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la reparación del cuarto de cocina dado que se encuentra deteriorado. Con el crédito solicitado comprará lámina galvanizada y madera. Espera poder constar con este financiamiento y de esta forma dar inicio a la mejora lo antes posible.
texts.en:
Matias is 49 years old and lives in a house he owns with his wife and three daughters, who are 27, 15 and 8 years of age. Matias has been working on a farm near his community for 28 years. This has enabled him to support his household and give his family what it needs.

Matias is requesting this loan from FUSAI to invest in repairing his kitchen, which has deteriorated. With this loan, he will purchase galvanized sheets and wood. He hopes to be able to count on this funding and in this way start improvements as soon as possible.

loans.use: to purchase galvanized sheeting and wood to repair his kitchen.,

loans.name: Luisa Amanda

texts.es: Doña Luisa seguirá con la inversión en mejoras para su hogar. El crédito solicitado será para instalar piso de cerámica en la sala de su vivienda. Comprará cerámica y cemento. Doña Luisa es comerciante de plásticos junto a su esposo, el negocio es ambulante, ofrecen productos en pulperías y zona franca. Tiene 3 hijos los cuales son independientes a ella. Espera poder cumplir con este crédito en tiempo y forma para seguir mejorando su vivienda.
texts.en: Luisa continues to invest in improvements to her home. She is requesting this loan to install a ceramic floor in the main room of her house. She will buy ceramic tiles and cement. Luisa works along with her husband selling plastics from place to place. They sell their products in small grocery stores and in the free trade zone. She has three children who are all now independent. She expects to be able to make her loan payments on time so that she can continue to improve her home.

loans.use: to buy ceramic tiles and cement to install a ceramic floor in the main room of her house.

loans.name: Ricardo De Jesus

texts.es: Ricardo de 61 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposa y sus 6 hijos, el se dedica desde hace 25 años a la agricultura especialmente a la siembra de maíz y frijol, comercializa sus productos en los alrededores de la zona, con lo que obtiene de sus ventas logra solventar algunos gatos de su hogar, Ricardo está solicitando un crédito para la compra de semillas, fertilizantes,  abonos, controles de plagas,  etc. y mejorar el terreno donde va a empezar a sembrar que es el que muestra la fotografía.
texts.en:
Ricardo is 61 years old. He lives in his own house with his wife and their six children. For 25 years he has worked in agriculture, especially in planting corn and beans. He sells his products in the surrounding ares of the zone. With what he obtains from his sales, he manages to pay some of his household expenses. 

Ricardo is applying for a loan to purchase seeds, fertilizers, compost, pest controls, etc., and to improve the land where he is going to begin to plant, which is shown in the photograph.

loans.use: to buy seeds, fertilizers, compost, pest controls, etc., and to improve the land

loans.name: Ana Griselda

texts.es:
Ana tiene 23 años de edad,  ha estudiado Bachillerato secretariado, está acompañada y su pareja trabaja de albañil, tiene un hijo de tres años y es el único que depende de Ana.

Ana es empleada en una empresa de telecomunicaciones desde hace años, ella decidió buscar trabajo debido a la situación económica y para obtener ingresos mensuales, el trabajo le queda cerca a diez minutos de su casa.


El préstamo lo utilizará para comprar medicinas para su padre el cual sufre de una enfermedad grave y de esa forma lograra cubrir la urgente necesidad.

El sueño de Ana es seguir trabajando para darle todo lo necesario a su hijo y ayudarle a su padre en lo que pueda.
texts.en:
Ana is 23 years old. She has a secondary school degree in secretarial work. She has a partner, and he works as a mason. She has a three-year-old son, who is the only one who depends on Ana.

Ana has been employed at a telecommunications business for several years. She decided to look for work due to the economic situation and to obtain monthly income. Her work is about ten minutes from her house.

She will use the loan to buy medicines for her father, who is suffering from a serious illness, and in this way she will be able to satisfy the urgent need.

Ana's dream is to continue working to give everything necessary to her son and to help her father as much as she can.

loans.use: to buy medicines for her father, who is suffering from a serious illness

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy palm oil, onions, margi, salt, pepper, fish, etc. at wholesale to add to her business

loans.name: Jaime Ernesto

texts.es: Jaime tiene 44 años de edad y habita en casa propia junto a su compañera de vida y sus dos hijos de 12 años y 19 años de edad. Jaime se dedica al cultivo de maíz y maicillo desde hace mucho tiempo. Jaime es un hombre visionario quien con el deseo de mejorar sus condiciones de vida y las de su familia ha tomado la decisión de solicitar este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de lámina galvaniza y madera para terminar el corredor de la vivienda.
texts.en: Jaime is 44 years old. He lives in his own house with his life companion and their two children, ages 12 and 19. Jaime has worked growing corn and sorghum for a long time. Jaime is a visionary man who, with the desire to improve his living conditions and those of his family, has made the decision to apply to FUSAI for this loan to invest in sheets of galvanized metal and wood to finish the hallway of his house.

loans.use: to buy sheets of galvanized metal and wood to finish the hallway of his house

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more gallons of palm oil to expand her business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase flagstones and cement.

loans.name: Raed

texts.en: Raed is a Palestinian guy from the city of Gaza.  He is 37-years-old, married and a father of two children. Raed chose to take a loan from ACAD so he can expand his business which is butcher shop. Because this butcher shop is the only source of income for his family, he decided to expand it by buying another butcher machine to keep up with the increasing demand of his customers.  Concerning the challenges to him, competition is the main challenge. Finally, Raed wants to thank ACAD and Kiva for their help,“Thank you.”

loans.use: to buy  butcher machine for his butcher shop

loans.name: Exidio

texts.es:
Exidio de 37 años de edad, estudio hasta 6° grado de educación básica, esta casado, su pareja trabaja en oficios domésticos y a la vez con un negocio de tamales, tiene 4 hijos que viven en casa y solamente 3 hijos estudian, nadie mas vive en casa. Solamente cinco personas dependen de él. 

El cliente tiene un negocio de carpintería desde hace más 14 años como negocio propio, lo aprendió en un taller de carpintería, y decidió independizarse para tener mejor rentabilidad, hace viajes con su pick up; antes solamente era empleado. El negocio lo tiene en su casa. Se involucra un hijo, su horario es de 7:00 am a 12:00 md y de 1:00 pm a 6:00 pm. 

El préstamoq ue esta solicitando, es para comprar una maquina rooster y un juego de brocas para carpintería, le mejorara mucho porque tendrá su propia herramienta y ya no pagara alquiler y por lo tanto tendrá mejores ingresos económicos y así mismo mejor calidad de vida. Sus sueños son en cuanto al negocio, poder tener todas las herramientas necesarias para ofrecer diferentes diseños a sus clientes y en cuanto a sus hijos que estudien y se preparen academicamente.
texts.en:
Exidio is 37 years old; he studied up to grade 6 of primary school. He is married, his spouse is a homemaker and runs a tamales business. They have 4 children who live at home, and only 3 of them go to school, nobody else lives with them. Only 5 people depend on him.

For more than 14 years he has had his own carpentry business. He learned it from a carpentry shop and decided to become independent to have more profitability. He makes trips in his pick-up, whereas before he was only an employee. He has the business in his home. His son is involved and his work hours are from 7:00 am to 12:00 pm and 1:00 pm to 6:00 pm.

The loan he is requesting is to buy a Red Rooster brand machine and a set of drill bits for carpentry.
