This will help him a lot because he will have his own tool and will no longer have pay to rent it and thus he will have better economic earnings and at the same time improve his quality of life.  His dreams when it comes to his business is to have all the necessary tools to offer different designs to his customers and in terms of his children for them to study and prepare themselves academically.

loans.use: to buy a Red Rooster brand machine and a set of drill bits

loans.name: Soukayna

texts.en:
Soukayna is a 48-year-old married mother of two, the sole earner of her family since her husband doesn't work.

Soukayna has been working as a tailor since 2004, to support her family in their living. She runs her business from her house because she can't afford to open a separate shop, and it is better for her to stay next to her family members at all times.

She is well known in her region with the special talents she has, and is supported by most of her customers.

Soukayna is acquiring a loan from Kiva's field partner, Al Majmoua, to buy a better and updated tailoring machine to develop her business and improve her production.

loans.use: To buy a better and updated tailoring machine to develop her business and improve her production

loans.name: María Ventura

texts.es:
María tiene 65 años de edad, está acompañada, el nivel de estudio que ella tiene es de primer grado no pudo seguir con sus estudios ya que la escuela le quedaba demasiado lejos, su compañero de vida trabaja en la agricultura y también sus hijos, lo cual estos dependen económicamente de ellos. 

Ella se dedica a la crianza de cerdos desde hace más de 20 años  ya que su madre se dedicaba a esta actividad y fue por ella que aprendió, el trabajo lo realiza en la comunidad  todos los días junto a su esposo . 

El crédito  lo necesita para comprar algunos cerdos, también para comprar abono para sus cultivos, con lo cual generará mayores ingresos para ella y su familia. 

Su sueño es que sus hijos puedan tener su propia casa, el terreno ya lo tiene y solo hace falta construir
texts.en:
María is 65 years old and is in a relationship. She was only able to go to school until the first grade because the school was too far away. Her life partner works in agriculture and so do her children, who are still financially dependent on them.

María has raised pigs for more than 20 years. She learned this work from her mother, who also raised pigs. She does her work everyday in her community, along with her husband.

She is requesting this loan to buy some pigs and some fertilizers for her crops. She hopes to improve her income for her family.

Her dream is for her children to have their own house. They already have the land, so the house just needs to be built.

loans.use: to buy some pigs and some fertilizers for her crops.

loans.name: Mgeni

texts.en:
Mgeni is married and has three children, two in school and one underage. She owns a house that has neither electricity nor piped water. Her greatest monthly expenses are school fees and food. 

She has operated a fish and firewood selling business for the last four years, selling at the market to her neighbors and passersby. She faces a major challenge of seasonality in her business. 

With the loan she wants to purchase fish and firewood for her business. She decided to join to acquire financial services for her business.

loans.use: to purchase fish and firewood for her business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchasing more vegetables.

loans.name: Aminah

texts.en:
48-year-old Aminah sells fresh foods, mainly Irish potatoes, beans and onions in Hoima, Uganda. 

She is charged with the responsibility of taking care of two children, ages 18 and 16. 

Aminah is accessing credit to buy more beans and onions to sell.

She hopes to expand her business into new markets, although she complains of lack of a refrigerator to store her products much longer, in addition to bad debtors hindering her profitability index.

loans.use: to buy more beans and onions.

loans.name: Mwanasha

texts.en:
Mwanasha, a married mother of three children, all of whom are in school, lives in her own house that has neither electricity nor piped water. Her greatest monthly expenses are school fees and household consumables.

For over five years, Mwanasha has operated a tailoring and khanga (women's wrap clothes) business, making garments and curtains and selling khangas. She cites seasonality as her major challenge. 

With this loan, Mwanasha wants to purchase women's wrap clothes (lessos), cloth materials and sewing threads for her business. She decided to join Yehu to access loans to boost her enterprise.

loans.use: to purchase women's wrap clothes (lessos), cloth materials and sewing threads for her business.

loans.name: Look-Up Group

texts.en:
Group member Susuana belongs to this group called Look-up. They are people who are hard working and are into soft drinks, seamstress, slippers, provisions, ornaments, cooked foods and general goods.

Susuana is 49-years-old and lives with her husband and three children. She alternates her daily activities with the soft drinks. Susuana sells different types of drinks: Fanta, Coca Cola, Sprite, Alvaro, etc. She is taking her time with the business which is going well thanks to the determination she puts in each day. 

Susuana wants to continue working in order to carry on supporting her family in this way. Susuana is asking for this loan in order to buy different types of drinks: Fanta, Coca Cola, Sprite, Alvaro, etc. for her business.

Susuana is very grateful for the loan offered and is committed to making the repayments, so are other members of this group.

loans.use: To buy different types of drinks; Fanta, Coca Cola, Sprite, Alvaro, etc. for her business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy supplies for making honey, such as sugar, and to improve the place where he makes it.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase cigarettes, gari and groundnuts to expand her business.

loans.name: Salvador

texts.es:
Salvador de 30 años de edad, vive junto a su compañera de vida y sus hijos, se dedica a trabajar en la agricultura, trabajo que aprendió de su padre desde muy pequeño, por esta razón no pudo asistir a la escuela, ya que tenia que ayudar a su papá con los cultivos para tener el sustento diario.

La parcela donde Salvador siembra se encuentra a 10 metros de su casa, por lo cual no se le dificulta el traslado de su hogar al trabajo

L crédito lo utilizara en la compra de semilla, veneno, abono, un motor para una bomba achicadora

El sueño de Salvador es ahorrar para comprar una parcela y poder aumentar sus cultivos, ya que aumentando sus cultivos, también aumentaran sus ingresos y mejorara su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Salvador is 30 years old. He lives with his life companion and their children. He works in agriculture, work that he learned from his father when he was very young. For this reason, he was not able to go to school, since he had to help his father with the crops in order to have daily sustenance.

The parcel of land that Salvador plants is 10 meters from his home, and so he has no difficulty going from his home to work.

He will use the loan to buy seeds, poison, compost, and a motor for a bilge pump.

Salvador's dream is to save to buy a parcel of land and to be able to increase his plantings, since increasing his plantings would also increase his income and improve his quality of life.

loans.use: to buy seed, poison, compost, and a motor for a bilge pump

loans.name: Enemecio

texts.es:
Enemecio tiene 62 años de edad, es una  persona que  dedica a la labranza de la tierra, él tiene muchos conocimientos sobre manejos de cultivos, su esposa se dedica a los oficios domésticos, sus hijos ya formaron sus hogares y por lo tanto no dependen de Enemecio.

Él tiene experiencia en la agricultura desde cuando era un niño, su padre lo instruyó por el buen camino, Enemecio se levantaba muy  de mañana para ir con su padre al campo, y es así como aprendió las actividades agrícolas.


El préstamo será utilizado para comprar insumos agrícolas para sus cultivos, esto permitirá obtener muy buenos resultados en sus producciones, también favorecerá  la  calidad de vida de su familia.


Enemecio planea a futuro tener mayor cantidad de tierra cultivada para obtener mejores ingresos para él y su familia y a si beneficiar con la cosecha a su comunidad con la venta de productos agrícolas .
texts.en:
Enemecio is 62 years old. He works farming the land, and has a lot of knowledge about how to manage crops. His wife looks after the household work. His children have already established their households and are no longer financially dependent on him.

Enemecio's experience in agriculture started when he was a young boy, when his father showed him the right way to do things. Enemecio used to get up very early in the morning to go with his father to the fields. This is how Enemecio learned his agricultural work.

He is requesting this loan to buy agricultural inputs for his crops. He hopes to improve his production, as well as his family's quality of life.

In the future, he would like to cultivate more land to improve his family's income. He would also like to have a good harvest to benefit his community by selling his agricultural products.

loans.use: to buy agricultural inputs for his crops.

loans.name: Mairamkan

texts.ru: Майрамкан 41 год, замужем, мать 5 детей. У Майрамкан среднее образование, в качестве основного дохода для своей семьи, она на протяжении 21 года занимается животноводством и полеводством, на сегодняшний день в ее хозяйстве имеется 2 дойные коровы, 30 овец, а также на земельном наделе растет 30 яблонь и 25 сливовых деревьев, урожай от которых реализуют осенью оптовым покупателям. Ежемесячный доход от реализации молочных изделий, в частности молока, курута, сюзьмы и топленого масла составляет около 8,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Майрамкан обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 130,000 сом (KGS) на покупку телят. Данные мероприятия позволят расширить хозяйство и улучшить условия проживания семьи.
texts.en:
Mairamkan is 41 years old, she is married and is the mother of 5 children.  Mairamkan has a high school education, as the main source of income for her family she has been raising livestock and farming for 21 years.  Today she has two milk cows, 30 sheep, and also grows 30 apple and 25 plum trees on the family plot, she sells the harvest in the fall to wholesale customers.

Her monthly income from selling dairy products, including milk, kurt and suzma (sour milk products), and ghee is around 8,000 som (KGS).  In order to further grow her business, Mairamkan turned to Bank "Bai Tushum" for a loan of 130,000 som (KGS) for the purchase of calves.  This will allow her to expand her business and improve the living conditions of her family.

loans.use: to buy calves

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy mechanical merchandise for his business.

loans.name: Shaikul

texts.ru: Шайкул 64 года, замужем, 3 детей, есть средне-специальное медицинское образование. Животноводством занимается с 1996 года, на сегодняшний день в своем хозяйстве имеет 4 коровы, 2 лошади и 25 овец.  Есть все условия для содержания скота, корм и сено заготовлены. Шайкул знает технологию ведения животноводческой деятельности и умеет вкладывать средства по назначению. Ее ежемесячный совокупный доход составляет около 6,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства она обратилась в Банк "Бай-Тушум" за кредитом в сумме 70,000 сом (KGS) на покупку бычков. Шайкул намерена увеличить поголовье скота, а доходы от кредита позволят ей накопить средства на постройку дома.
texts.en: Shaikul is 64 years old, she is married and has 3 children, she has a vocational medical education.  She has been raising livestock since 1996, today she has 4 cows, 2 horses and 25 sheep.  She has everything needed to raise livestock; feed and hay are stocked.  Shaikul knows the technicalities of raising livestock and knows how to invest resources as needed.  Her monthly income is around 6,000 som (KGS).  In order to further grow her business she turned to Bank "Bai Tushum" for a loan of 70,000 som (KGS) for the purchase of calves.  Shaikul is determined to increase her livestock count and the profits from the loan will allow her to save money to build a house.

loans.use: to buy calves

loans.name: Lala

texts.en: Lala is self-employed, from Arpy village of the Vayots Dzor region. She lives there with her husband and 21-year-old son. The family is extensively involved in animal husbandry. Jointly with her husband and son, Lala keeps cattle and hens. They also run a farm. Lala and her husband have been engaged in agricultural activities for 20 years already. Their agribusiness needs some investments to function more efficiently. The requested loan of USD 2,600 will be a huge support for them. Lala will purchase 1 cow and 1 calf, buy fuel and pay the workers. Lala and her family hope for the lenders' support and goodwill. Let's help this hard working family as they really try hard to make ends meet.

loans.use: to purchase livestock, pay for fuel, and compensate the workers for their job

loans.name: Mwanasha

texts.en:
Mwanasha is a married woman who has been blessed with two school going children. She lives at her own house that neither has electricity nor piped water. Her greatest monthly expenses are food and school fees.

Mwanasha has operated a charcoal and cashew nuts selling business, selling from home to her neighbours and villagers. Her greatest monthly challenge is high cost of transportation.

She is requesting a loan to purchase charcoal and cashew nuts for resale.She joined Yehu to get financial support.

loans.use: to purchase charcoal and cashew nuts for resale.

loans.name: Ohoud Group

texts.en:
Ohoud is a group which comprises of four members of women who live in Sana'a, Yemen. They applied for a loan of 70,000 YER from AMB.

Afrah is the leader of the group. She is a 40-year-old divorced woman, living with her children in her own house. She has a University education and as of recently, she is an employee in a public sector with a national television channel. Afrah's house lacks of many food materials. This condition negatively affects her children. For this reason, she applied for a loan of 40,000 YER from AMB in order to purchase food materials for her house.

Afrah looks forward to preparing her house with all kinds of foods materials. She plans to open a savings account in AMB to help her in improve the living standards of her family.

loans.use: to purchase food materials for her house.

loans.name: Deogracious

texts.en: Twenty-four year old  Deogracious is married with one child and lives in Bundibugyo Uganda. With all the support from his family in cocoa farming, they have persisted with all the conditions to grow more to sell for their survival. He has managed to run all the family requirements including medical bills, fees payment, and the welfare of his family. He dreams of constructing a residential house for his family.  Deogracious is asking for a loan to buy cocoa for selling.

loans.use: To buy cocoa for selling

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy clothes and cloths to add to her stock for resale

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more palm oil, rice, and cooking season to expand her business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more cooking oil, gari, and cooking season to expand her acheke business.

loans.name: Jad10 Group

texts.en:
Emma is the featured borrower of the Jad10 Group. She got along with the other group members to acquire a loan from Kiva's field partner, Al Majmoua, because they have always been neighbors and friends.

Emma is a 58-year-old widowed mother of two. She works in handmade crafts and souvenirs for the past twenty years to support her children. After her husband passed away, she was left alone with the responsibility of supporting her precious family.

She is acquiring a loan in order to increase her business merchandise with special, newly released arts and crafts collection. She will develop her work with special themes that will attract customers' attention and increase her income.

Emma is the lady at the center of the picture, Wafaa is on the far left, and Mirna is the first from the right.

loans.use: to increase her business merchandise with a special, newly released arts and crafts collection.

loans.name: Norma Maria

texts.es: Norma de 45 años de edad  es muy trabajadora y responsable, vive en casa propia con su esposo y sus dos hijos, ella se dedica al cultivo de granos básicos como maíz y frijol  desde hace 13 años, con lo que gana de sus ventas logra solventar algunas  de  las necesidades que se le presentan en  su hogar, Norma solicita un crédito para la compra de insumos como: fertilizantes, abonos, controles de plagas, herbicidas, etc. y así poder continuar con sus cultivos para tener junto con su familia una mejor calidad de vida sin limitación alguna.
texts.en:
Norma, of 45 years of age, is a hardworking and responsible woman. She lives with her husband and two children at their own house. 

For 13 years she has worked in the cultivation of staple grains, like corn and beans. With the income from her sales, she manages to pay for some of the household needs. 

Norma is requesting this loan to buy supplies, like: fertilizers, manure, products for pest control, herbicides, and others. With this help, she will be able to continue with her crops, and in this way provide for herself and her family a better quality of life, without any limitations.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers, manure, products for pest control, herbicides, etc.

loans.name: Richard

texts.en: Richard is a 37-year-old married man living in Bundibugyo Uganda. When he realized that the previous loan helped him to attain his dream, he diverted into farming to improve on his household income. Though faced with the problem of poor roads, he is determined to try out another business to expand his source of income. Richard is accessing a loan to buy cocoa to sell this peak season.

loans.use: to buy cocoa to sell this peak season.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay the cost of getting construction materials

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchasing more palm oil, native rice, and cooking seasoning.

loans.name: Zabibu

texts.en: Zabibu is a married woman with four children living in Bundibugyo, Uganda. She trades in cloth selling, (primarily women's wear) but also sells cocoa as a side business to increase her income.  She is a hardworking woman, though the prices of her products are affected by seasonality changes. Zabibu's future plan is to expand her business to a renowned boutique around her area.  She is asking for a loan to buy clothes to sell.

loans.use: to buy clothes to sell.

loans.name: Annaisathya Shg Group

texts.en:
Annaisathya Self Help Group is managed by the local NGO, People Action for Transformation (PAT), in Tamil Nadu, India. Susila is 30 years old and the leader of this group. She lives in Nagamangalam village. Susila lives in her own house with her husband Marimuthu and their two children. Her husband is a daily wage worker. 

The group members have taken loans from PAT before and repaid them on time.  

Susila needs a loan to purchase a smokeless stove, which is better than the traditional stove as it emits less smoke and needs less time to cook. The traditional stove emits a lot of smoke. The smoke consists of carbon dioxide, which affects her as well as her children's health. 

The other members are also requesting a loan to purchase a smokeless stove as they face the same problem as Susila. The smokeless stove is the solution to their problems.

loans.use: to purchase a smokeless stove
